{"code":1,"isDone":false,"toInsertArticleList":[{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Swingers star Siobhan, 67, says she was gang raped at 17 leaving her scared to have sex until she was 57 years old","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12489761/swingers-star-siobhan-67-gang-raped/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>SWINGERS star Siobhan told how she was gang raped aged 17 &#8211; leaving her scared to have sex until she was 57 years old.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Viewers praised Siobhan for her brave admission in the Channel 4 documentary about the Liberty Elite <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12482882/swingers-channel-four-liberty-elite-club/\">swingers</a>&#8216; club as she opened up about her horrific ordeal.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489776\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Screenshot-2020-08-24-at-23.03.54.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489776\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Swingers star Siobhan, 67, says she was gang raped at 17 leaving her scared to have sex until she was 57 years old</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Many of the Liberty Elite members described their reasons for turning to swinging, with most admitting they&#8217;d struggled to find happiness in a relationship.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But Siobhan, 67, said she had been put off sex for 40 years following the harrowing sexual assault that took place when she was a teenager.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;I don&#8217;t think I did like sex until I was 57. Being gang raped when I was 17 really didn&#8217;t help. Got in with the wrong crowd, there were seven of them, they would take one of us into the wood and basically all rape us one by one. And then you&#8217;d go back and they&#8217;d take the next girl and do the same with her. You could fight and scream as mych as you want but you were in a wood and no one could hear. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It screws you up and you learn not to trust men. You have all those feelings that you had when it was happening, anger, fear, pain, all of those and they stay with you. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I became a Christian, I joined a local church, I didn&#8217;t have sex for 40 years. I prayed, &#8216;Dear God help me with this.&#8217; I got to the point where I thought, &#8216;if there is a God, he doesn&#8217;t give a s**t about me&#8217;.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486048\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Screenshot-2020-08-24-at-15.06.22-1.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486048\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Channel 4</figcredit></figure>Siobhan tells filmmakers she was last gifted flowers when a friend popped round to show her the size of his penis[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Earlier in the programme Siobhan had left viewers gobsmacked using X-rated language as she spoke of her insatiable sex drive and showed off her &#8220;playroom&#8221; and bag of sex toys.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Siobhan told filmmakers she was gifted flowers when a friend popped round to show her the size of his penis.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;The most sessions I&#8217;ve had in a day is probably three or four,&#8221; Siobhan says in the documentary.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;One reason why I may not have married is I think I may get bored just with one person.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Her &#8220;playroom&#8221; has floral bedsheets and looks like a normal spare room with violet painted walls and teddy bears on the bed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There, she has as many as eight men in their 20s over for debauched orgies.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12485952\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Screenshot-2020-08-24-at-15.04.52.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12485952\" width=\"960\" height=\"824\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Channel 4</figcredit></figure>Siobhan, 67, shared the intimate details of her swinger sex life in a new Channel 4 documentary called Swingers[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;When I first did this I couldn‚Äôt believe a twenty-year-old would want to have sex with a sixty something year old, but they do, and I‚Äôm happy to oblige,&#8221; she says.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She adds: ‚ÄúSwinging is very empowering. I‚Äôm in charge of my life, and swinging is part of that life. The main thing is being in control of my sex life.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\"><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\"><p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\">Anyone else warmed to Siobhan? SUV","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489344/cops-wife-dies-stuck-in-backseat-police-car/","description":"<p>THE wife of a police officer died last week in what authorities believe to be a freak accident after she got stuck in her husband&#8217;s car on a sweltering day. </p>\n<p>Investigators believe Clara Paulino, 56, crawled into the back of her husband&#8217;s patrol SUV, which was parked in front of the family&#8217;s <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/florida/\">Miami Shores, Florida</a>, home, on Friday, and got stuck there for several hours, <a href=\"https://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/crime/article245182295.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">according to the Miami Herald</a>. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489343\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 860px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/082420-Miami-Shores-Miami-police-officer-wife-dies-in-SUV.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=850\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489343\" width=\"850\" height=\"478\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>NBC6</figcredit></figure>A cop&#8217;s wife reportedly died after getting stuck in the back of her husband&#8217;s patrol SUV[/caption]</p>\n<p>Her husband was reportedly sleeping inside the home after finishing a midnight shift.</p>\n<p>Authorities said Paulino was not able to honk the horn to wake him up or get help because of a partition between the front and back seats in the police car.</p>\n<p>Investigators believe Paulino climbed into the marked Ford Explorer SUV in search of something when the car door closed and the self-locking mechanism &#8211; which is standard in police vehicles to keep detained suspects inside &#8211; went off. </p>\n<p>Temperatures in the area were in the 90s on Friday and <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/police/\">police</a> believe Paulino got stuck in the vehicle around 1pm.</p>\n<p>Her family found her body around 5.30pm.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/miami/\">Miami-Dade County</a> detectives found her fingerprints all over the SUV, indicating she was desperately trying to get out, the Miami Herald reported.</p>\n<p>Her husband, Arstides Paulino, a 25-year veteran of the force who has reportedly worked the midnight shift for about two decades, apparently came home and went right to bed, leaving the SUV unlocked.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>The Miami-Dade Medical Examiner‚Äôs Office will rule on the cause of death, however, authorities said that Paulino had a history of <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/health/\">health</a> problems, which may have contributed to her death inside the vehicle.</p>\n<p>Miami-Dade Police Lieutenant Carlos Rosario said the case is still &#8220;very preliminary.&#8221;</p>\n<p>&#8220;There&#8217;s still a lot of work to be done,&#8221; he said. &#8220;But right now, it&#8217;s an unclassified death.&#8221;</p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 20:57:47 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/082420-Miami-Shores-Miami-police-officer-wife-dies-in-SUV.jpg?strip=all&w=850","linkMd5":"150b6450b900fdfb21611fca6b202964","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn34@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-47-824_c188681fca063627.webp","destWidth":850,"destHeight":478,"sourceBytes":94822,"destBytes":94822,"author":"Laura Gesualdi-Gilmore","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/082420-Miami-Shores-Miami-police-officer-wife-dies-in-SUV.jpg?strip=all&w=850":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn34@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-47-824_c188681fca063627.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106292},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Coronavirus infection rates falling in worst hit areas including Oldham and Pendle ‚Äì but cases nearly double in Stoke","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12488406/coronavirus-infections-falling-worst-hit-oldham/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>CORONAVIRUS infection rates are falling in eight of England&#8217;s top ten worst impacted areas &#8211; including Oldham, Pendle and Blackburn.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Government data shows the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">coronavirus</a> figures per 100,000 people are tumbling in many parts of the country &#8211; but there have been worrying rises in places like <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/stoke-on-trent/\">Stoke-on-Trent</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"‚ö†\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> Read our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12383728/coronavirus-uk-news-deaths-live-latest-schools/\">coronavirus live blog</a> for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/CM-MAP-UK-HOTSPOTS-v3-1.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/CM-MAP-UK-HOTSPOTS-v3-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12489596\" width=\"960\" height=\"869\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>Data charting the seven day rise and fall of cases for all of England&#8217;s 314 local authorities shows hope for the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12362839/oldham-worst-hit-coronavirus-area-england-three-watch-list/\">country&#8217;s worst hit areas</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/politics/12463008/oldham-lockdown-update/\">Oldham still has the highest figures</a> with 60.7 cases per 100,000, but the August 21 figure tumbled from 95.3 on August 14.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This was a real change as 144 new cases were confirmed last week, compared to 226 the week previous. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Pendle and Blackburn with Darwen also saw figures decline, recording infection rates of 55.4 and 51.4 which had dropped from 87.9 and 88.2.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Leicester, Manchester, Bradford, Rochdale and Northampton all also saw figures decline over the same period to round out the top ten.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, Swindon and Bury  &#8211; the seventh and tenth worst impacted areas &#8211; both saw small increases with jumps from 39.6 to 40.1 and 31.9 to 33.0.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Stoke saw coronavirus new cases almost double, jumping from 18.3 to 28.9 &#8211; a real change from 47 new cases to 74.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The increase comes days after the council issued a lockdown warning for the city as they pleaded with residents to obey social distancing rules. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Redditch saw the largest rise, going from 4.7 to 29.3, a jump from four cases to 25, while Oadby and Wigston also climbed from 26.3 to 31.6. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489593\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603442370-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489593\" width=\"960\" height=\"642\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>A postman delivers mail in Oldham amid the lockdown[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488831\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603445024.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488831\" width=\"960\" height=\"639\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>A mobile advertising vehicle displaying a coronavirus high risk area warning in Oldham[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Abi Brown, leader of Stoke-on-Trent City Council,&#160;urged people to stick to the rules after 12 cases were found in one day last week.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;You can‚Äôt look at the national news without another city-wide lock-down coming into force or being discussed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;We don‚Äôt want to be the next one ‚Äì the next seven days is a critical time for the city so let‚Äôs all play our part, protect our loved ones and avoid lockdown.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Oldham residents have been warned not meet anyone outside of their household &#8211; but officials assured it would avoid a full lockdown.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Pubs, restaurants and offices can remain open, but extra restrictions on social interaction are about to come into force.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>People can still go to work and use childcare as normal, but won&#8217;t be permitted extra social meet-ups from midnight on Saturday.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12486897\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12486970\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Jim McMahon, MP for Oldham, said: &#8220;The sooner we bring the virus rates down, the sooner we can meet extended family and friends again.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I know we have all made sacrifices, and I know many of you have really been affected by the virus and the lockdown restrictions. Stay safe and look out for each other.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said &#8220;a widespread economic lockdown would have been wrong&#8221; and would have needlessly closed businesses down when they weren&#8217;t a factor in spreading the virus.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Whitehall had been pushing for tougher measures but were hit by a backlash from regional leaders keen to avoid <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12427116/leicester-coronavirus-lockdown-lifted-tomorrow-infections-fall/\">what happened to Leicester</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The latest figures estimate that 20,299 people have symptomatic coronavirus in the UK.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Europe is seeing a rise in cases as the UK government reintroduced quarantine measures for countries such as Spain and France.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488842\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000597817146.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488842\" width=\"960\" height=\"621\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>A woman wears a protective mask in a shop in Stoke[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, Professor John Clancy, of Birmingham City University, has warned current fears of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12479052/zero-coronavirus-cases-for-a-month-in-most-of-england-and-second-national-lockdown-not-necessary/\">cities in Britain returning to lockdown are based on &#8220;dodgy data&#8221;</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He argued the figures show some 91 per cent of neighborhoods in England have recorded zero coronavirus cases in a month.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The expert said: &#8220;So-called ‚Äòspikes‚Äô are occurring here, there, and everywhere up and down the country because new testing regimes are causing them either with false positives, picking up residual infections or (usually more likely) suddenly increased testing in specific areas.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>‚Äú‚ÄòJust in case‚Äô lockdowns are simply not an acceptable response to dodgy data. And lockdowns cause deaths.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Professor Clancy, who is also the former leader of Birmingham City Council, warned current testing numbers are &#8220;low and unreliable&#8221; and local officials risk &#8220;over-reacting&#8221; to apparent spikes.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added officials should only be alarmed if there is a spike in deaths, saying they are &#8220;sadly&#8221; the &#8220;most reliable&#8221; figure during the pandemic.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/DD-COMPOSITE-R-RATE-MAP-21-AUGUST-3.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/DD-COMPOSITE-R-RATE-MAP-21-AUGUST-3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=620\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488836\" width=\"620\" height=\"413\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>Fears have surfaced of&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12469700/britain-national-lockdown-warning-bumpy-autumn/\">second nationwide coronavirus lockdown</a>&#160;as officials warned the end of the year will be &#8220;bumpy&#8221; for Britain.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Sage advisory group said Britain‚Äôs reproduction number was between 0.9 and 1.1, with senior sources warning ‚Äúmore nationwide measures‚Äù may be needed.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A senior government source told&#160;<a href=\"https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2020/08/21/national-lockdown-could-necessary-uk-follows-trajectory-spain/\">The Telegraph</a>: &#8220;We‚Äôre looking at a pretty bumpy autumn and winter and that‚Äôs going to go in the direction of increased cases and increased outbreaks.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another source added: ‚ÄúIf&#160;it doesn‚Äôt get contained it may be that some things that have been open, you need to think about whether measures need to be taken to reverse things.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container could follow countries like Spain, Europe‚Äôs fastest rising caseload, with 142 cases per 100,000 people.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The number of&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12451618/spain-france-germany-coronavirus-lockdown-u-shape-rises/\">daily cases in the holiday hotspot have risen</a>&#160;from 150 when lockdown eased on June 21 to more than 3,000.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>National figures showed four people died from coronavirus today in England, as the&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12477187/one-person-dies-coronavirus-england/\">UK confirmed 853 new cases</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a storm of a winter second wave of Covid-19 coinciding with a No Deal Brexit.</p>\n\n\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 19:47:03 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png","linkMd5":"84b46c75f4109911c20c7c91eabc01df","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn13@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-46-615_8c2ee998bba5b6ed.webp","destWidth":72,"destHeight":72,"sourceBytes":595,"destBytes":1080,"author":"Henry Holloway","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn13@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-46-615_8c2ee998bba5b6ed.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/CM-MAP-UK-HOTSPOTS-v3-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn81@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-41-55-833_84a4f065ddd40e3b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603442370-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn67@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-42-03-534_6bfde34446a9af5d.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603445024.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn14@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-55-890_02e3353e7e212984.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn65@2020_2/2020/08/25/00-41-57-258_d6a44448b37332f2.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn43@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-42-04-045_7efee1dc82290bc3.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000597817146.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn61@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-52-070_40938fe3a29dd239.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/DD-COMPOSITE-R-RATE-MAP-21-AUGUST-3.jpg?strip=all&w=620":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn91@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-42-01-715_13d533ab46c7e6c4.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106301},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Longtime Hollywood actor and Serpico star Allan Rich dead at 94 after complications from progressive dementia","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12490308/longtime-hollywood-actor-allan-rich-dead-94-complications-progressive-dementia/","description":"<p>LONGTIME Hollywood actor Allan Rich has died at the age of 94.</p> \n<p>The late actor passed away over the weekend at the Lillian Booth Actors Home in Englewood, New Jersey following complications from progressive dementia.</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12490409\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 648px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12490409 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603910763.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=638\" alt=\"\" width=\"638\" height=\"960\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Getty Images\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> The character actor sadly passed away over the weekend[/caption]</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12490410\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12490410 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603911300.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"625\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Alamy\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> Allan passed away at the Lillian Booth Actors Home in Englewood, New Jersey[/caption]</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12490412\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12490412 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603911298.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"635\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Alamy\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> He was known for his work as a character actor[/caption]</p> \n<p>Some of Allan‚Äôs memorable roles include playing District Attorney Herman Tauber in Sidney Lumet‚Äôs Serpico (1973), NBC president Robert Kintner in Robert Redford‚Äôs <em>Quiz Show</em> (1994), Demi Moore‚Äôs attorney in Barry Levinson‚Äôs&nbsp;Disclosure&nbsp;(1994) and a judge in Steven Spielberg‚Äôs&nbsp;Amistad&nbsp;(1997).</p> \n<p>Additionally, he appeared on a 2004 episode of HBO‚Äôs&nbsp;<em>Curb Your Enthusiasm</em>.</p> \n<p>In the episode, he memorably played a Holocaust survivor who clashed with a contestant from the competition TV show&nbsp;Survivor.</p> \n<p>Allan was blacklisted in Hollywood during the post-war era after he attempted to free a black man from Mississippi who had been wrongly convicted of rape.</p> \n<p>The act branded him as a communist and led to his abrupt firing from the NBC series Philco Playhouse.</p> \n<p>No one would hire Allan in Hollywood, so he went on to work as a stockbroker in New York City and opened an art gallery on Madison Avenue.</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12490414\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 646px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12490414 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603910761.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=636\" alt=\"\" width=\"636\" height=\"960\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   2013 NBCUniversal Media, LLC\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> Allan was famously blacklisted from Hollywood[/caption]</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12490416\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12490416 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603910760.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"659\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Getty Images - Getty\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> He returned to acting in the 1960s[/caption]</p> \n<p>Allan returned to acting in the 1960s and went on to appear in a number of films and shows including The Rockford Files, Hawaii-Five-0, Judging Amy, NYPD Blue and CSI.</p> \n<p>His first television credits after being blacklisted were on a 1963 episodes of ABC‚Äôs Naked City and CBS‚Äô East Side/West Side.</p> \n<p>He later worked with Dustin Hollman in an off-Broadway production of Ron Ribman‚Äôs Journey of the Fifth Horse in 1966.</p> \n<p>The actor developed his own acting technique, which he taught to a number of stars early on in their careers including Sharon Stone, Jamie Lee Curtis, Rene Russo and Alan Thicke.</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12490417\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12490417 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603911304.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"682\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Alamy\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> He shared his acting technique in his 2007 book[/caption]</p> \n<p>He later wrote about the technique in his 2007 book A Leap From the Method.</p> \n<p>In addition to his work as an actor, Allan co-founded the nonprofit organization We Care About Kids.</p> \n<p>The organization produced and distributed short films that educated students about how to combat prejudice.</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12490418\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12490418 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603910759-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"769\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Getty Images - Getty\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> Allan co-founded the nonprofit organization We Care About Kids[/caption]</p> \n<p> \n <!--googleoff: all--> \n <div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n  <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n   <div class=\"col sun-col-6\"> \n    <div 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Who is Becki Falwell and who did she have an affair with?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489311/becki-falwell-jerry-falwell-jr-giancarlo-granda-affair/","description":"<p>BECKI Falwell, the wife of Evangelical leader Jerry Falwell Jr., had an affair with Giancarlo Granda, a pool boy that was hired to work for the couple after they met at a hotel in Miami.</p>\n<p>Granda claims that Becki&#8217;s husband participated in their sexual encounters, but <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1360012/jerry-falwell-jr-becki-tilley-giancarlo-granda-affair/\">Falwell Jr.</a> denies any involvement. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489306\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603857243-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489306\" width=\"960\" height=\"695\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Jerry Falwell jr and wife Becki Falwell[/caption]</p>\n<p>Falwell Jr. stands by his claim that the affair was extramarital and that he was badly impacted by his wife&#8217;s behavior.</p>\n<h2>Who is Becki Falwell? </h2>\n<p>Jerry Falwell Jr. married wife Becki Falwell in 1987.</p>\n<p>The Falwells have three children together: Jerry Falwell III, Caroline Grace, and Charles Wesley.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489307\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603857273-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489307\" width=\"960\" height=\"768\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>The Falwell family[/caption]</p>\n<p>Like her husband, Becki is a staunch Republican and serves on the advisory board on Women for Trump, a group of women that are advocates for <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/donald-trump\">Trump&#8217;s</a> reelection. </p>\n<h2>Who is her husband Jerry Falwell Jr.? </h2>\n<p>Jerry Falwell Jr. is the son of late evangelical pastor Jerry Falwell Sr, who founded Liberty University in Lynchburg, <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/virginia\">Virginia</a>.</p>\n<p>Falwell Jr. is a staunch Republican and open Trump supporter, considered a widely influential figure in the American Christian conservative circle.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489308\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600787227-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489308\" width=\"960\" height=\"686\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP or licensors</figcredit></figure>Falwell&#8217;s father was a famous conservative pastor [/caption]</p>\n<p>He served as president of Liberty, but<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1274719/jerry-falwell-jr-indefinite-leave-liberty-university/\"> took a leave of absence</a> after he posted an inappropriate photo to <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/instagram\">Instagram</a> posing next to a pregnant woman with and his jeans unzipped and bare stomach protruding. </p>\n<p>He has now resigned the post.</p>\n<p>Falwell said the aftermath of <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1360012/jerry-falwell-jr-becki-tilley-giancarlo-granda-affair/\">learning about wife Becki&#8217;s affair was like &#8220;living on a rollercoaster.</a>&#8220;</p>\n<p>In a statement provided to the <a href=\"https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/washington-secrets/exclusive-falwell-says-fatal-attraction-threat-led-to-depression\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Washington Examiner</a>, Falwell said he lost 80 pounds due to mental stress.</p>\n<h2>Who did she have an affair with?</h2>\n<p>Becki once developed an &#8220;inappropriate relationship&#8221; with a pool boy that worked at one of their&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/florida\">Florida</a>&#160;properties.</p>\n<p>Although Falwell did not name the man, the&#160;Examiner&#160;identified him as Giancarlo Granda.</p>\n<p>The affair was said to be short-lived and Falwell and his wife reconciled quickly.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489309\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603869344.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489309\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>Giancarlo Granda[/caption]</p>\n<p>Falwell invested $1.8million into a property deal with Granda so that he could open a youth hostel in Miami beach, but years later Granda became &#8220;increasingly aggressive&#8221; and tried to extort the family out of more money, threatening to reveal the affair, according to the Examiner.</p>\n<h2>What did Granda say about the affair?</h2>\n<p>Granda denies making any threats towards the family and said that the &#8220;whole truth&#8221; would come out, according to the Examiner.</p>\n<p>He told <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/investigates/special-report/usa-falwell-relationship/?utm_medium=Social&#38;utm_source=twitter&#38;utm_medium=Social&#38;utm_source=twitter\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Reuters</a> he was 20 years old when the affair began after meeting the couple at the Fontainebleau Miami Beach hotel in March 2012.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489310\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603875193.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489310\" width=\"960\" height=\"689\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Falwell&#8217;s lawyer says Falwell categorically denies Granda&#8217;s claims[/caption]</p>\n<p>Granda said that after he was invited to work for the family, he would have sex with Becki while husband Jerry watched.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúBecki and I developed an intimate relationship and Jerry enjoyed watching from the corner of the room,‚Äù Granda said in an interview with the outlet. </p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container and at the Falwells‚Äô home in Virginia.</p>\n<p>The affair dissolved when the couple and Granda became embroiled in a business dispute.</p>\n<p>A lawyer for Falwell, Michael Bowe, told Reuters the invite‚Äô","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12488405/prince-andrew-snuck-ghislaine-maxwell-bafta/","description":"<p><strong>PRINCE Andrew took ‚Äòpimp‚Äô Ghislaine Maxwell to an exclusive Bafta event in LA where they mingled with Steven Spielberg, The Sun can exclusively reveal.</strong></p> \n<p>The disgraced royal is understood to have snuck Jeffrey Epstein‚Äôs alleged madam into the Britannia Awards in 2000 at The Century Plaza Hotel in Beverly Hills without an invite and asked for her to be sat at a top table ‚Äì causing a headache for organisers.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488717\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603131368.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" </figcredit>\n</figure>Maxwell was pictured with screen stars Denise Richards and Jessica Capshaw[/caption] \n<p>A respected guest who attended the event said: ‚ÄúHe kept looking over his shoulder and we were told ‚ÄòOh, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/prince-andrew/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Andrew</a> has brought a woman with him, and she needs a good seat‚Äô.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúEveryone was introduced to the mysterious <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/ghislaine-maxwell/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Miss Maxwell</a> and she ended up sitting on a top table with the British Consulate-General and other distinguished guests.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Photographs from the November 4 soiree show <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12461720/ghislaine-maxwell-intimate-details-deposition-spread-wildfire-unfair-trial/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Ghislaine, who is now languishing in a New York jail on sex trafficking charges</a>, posing and gossiping with Denise Richards and Jessica Capshaw.</p> \n<p>She wore a slinky figure-hugging gold halter-neck dress, while the Duke opted for a classic black tuxedo for the event.</p> \n<p>Andrew, now 60, attended as a special guest to give Spielberg his award and organisers found him difficult from the beginning, the insider claimed.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúHe was seated in a special area beforehand and when he was asked to go through the hotel to meet Spielberg he said, ‚ÄòWhy can‚Äôt he come to me?‚Äô‚Äù they said.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúEveryone had to explain it was because of security at the hotel and the way things were planned out for the ceremony.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúAndrew would regularly be invited to Bafta events in LA and he was often a complete pain, full of self-importance.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Bafta Los Angeles presented the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence In Film to Spielberg in front of a number of other film luminaries, including Pierce Brosnan and Russell Crowe.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n  <div class=\"col .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>A source close to the Duke of York hit back, saying: ‚ÄúMember of royal family attends awards ceremony with friend some 20 years ago? </p> \n<p>‚ÄúAre you really asking for a quote on that? </p> \n<p>‚ÄúYou‚Äôve taken leave of your senses. Lost all sense of perspective.‚Äù</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488766\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000588092679.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488766\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  EPA\n </figcredit>\n</figure>A source claimed organisers found Prince Andrew difficult and ‚Äòfull of self-importance‚Äô[/caption] \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n  <video data-video-id=\"6184096144001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\" data-player=\"default\" data-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\" data-embed=\"default\" class=\"video-js\" controls=\"\" style=\"width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; right: 0; left: 0;\"> \n  </video> \n  <script src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- End of Brightcove Player --> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<p><strong>GOT a story? Valle","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603131368.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn66@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-46-634_e10a0f85e91f5a31.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/9ae97230-e2d3-4134-ab61-4c8ada7f671a.jpg?strip=all&w=628":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn81@2020_2/2020/08/25/00-41-54-860_ca75aec96908db61.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000588092679.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn31@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-42-03-085_e9bb52fae348bcf4.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106298},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Sheridan Smith reveals she almost died after Graham Norton publicly humiliated her at the Baftas","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12489563/sheridan-smith-almost-died-humiliation-graham-norton-baftas/","description":"<p>SHERIDAN Smith has revealed she almost died after being left humiliated when Graham Norton mocked her at an awards ceremony.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/sheridan-smith/\">The star </a>‚Äî who had been suffering from anxiety ‚Äî was sat among the packed audience at the 2016 Bafta TV awards.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489601\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 662px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000236573021.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=652\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489601\" width=\"652\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty - Contributor\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Sheridan Smith has revealed she almost died after being left humiliated when Graham Norton mocked her[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489612\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603872937.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489612\" width=\"960\" height=\"539\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Graham Norton was hosting and made a joke about Sheridan being a drunk\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>She was in the running for a gong that evening but ended the night in hospital after collapsing. She was rushed to A&amp;E after suffering five seizures that saw her stop breathing.</p> \n<p>Now, four years on, she reveals her agony in an ITV documentary, Sheridan Smith: Becoming Mum.</p> \n<p>Fighting back tears, Sheridan, 39, recalls: ‚Äú<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/graham-norton/\">Graham Norton</a> was hosting and made a joke, basically at my expense, about me being a drunk.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI was so humiliated, you know, it‚Äôs a room full of your peers. And people you want to work with, or have worked with.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489613\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603820100.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489613\" width=\"960\" height=\"542\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Sheridan reveals her agony in an ITV documentary, Sheridan Smith: Becoming Mum\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>‚ÄúThat night for me was like the final straw, before my brain totally went off the deep end.‚Äù</p> \n<p>At the time, Sheridan‚Äôs West End production of Funny Girl was halted due to ‚Äútechnical difficulties‚Äù.</p> \n<p>Some fans believed it was down to her drinking after she reportedly slurred lines ‚Äî unaware she was heartbroken that her father, Colin, had been diagnosed with cancer.</p> \n<p>Launching the awards show, BBC chat star Norton said: ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs get started because, of course, the sooner we begin, the sooner we can have a couple of drinks‚Äâ.‚Äâ.‚Äâ.‚Äâor as they say in theatrical circles, a couple of glasses of technical difficulties.‚Äù</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489615\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603820102.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489615\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Sheridan pictured at 8 months pregnant with her French bulldogs Ronnie and Reggie\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489617\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603820101.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489617\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  The actress said she became addicted to anti-anxiety tablets\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>The actress and singer ‚Äî a nominee for BBC One drama The C Word ‚Äî said that swipe tipped her over the edge. She added: ‚ÄúWhat people didn‚Äôt realise was that I‚Äôd become addicted to anti-anxiety tablets.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThat night, I took myself off to a hotel on my own.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúIn my crazy mind I thought, ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt wanna be in rehab ‚Äî I‚Äôll do it myself‚Äô so I went there and I just stopped my tablets.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúWhat I didn‚Äôt realise is, that if you stop the tablets abruptly, you seizure. And, to cut a long story short, I got seizures five times and got rushed into A&amp;E.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489724\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000460707508.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489724\" width=\"960\" height=\"639\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Sheridan, pictured as Sam in ITV‚Äôs Cleaning Up, reveals she was rushed to hospital\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489620\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 611px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603820103.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=601\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489620\" width=\"601\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Sheridan talks about her mental health battles on her new show\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>‚ÄúWeirdly, a friend of mine rang me and she came to the hotel. It‚Äôs a miracle that she did. It was like someone was looking out for me.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúShe‚Äôs the one who got me breathing again.‚Äù</p> \n<p>On the show, which airs next Tuesday, Sheridan talks about <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/9355819/sheridan-smith-unsure-start-family-jamie-horn/\">her mental health battles </a>and her fear that it could impact on her new life as a first-time mother.</p> \n<p>The star of Cilla and Gavin &amp; Stacey gave producers exclusive access to her life in the four months up to the birth of son Billy in May. She and fianc√© Jamie Horn, 31, had to scrap plans for a natural birth as Billy arrived early, forcing Sheridan to have an emergency caesarean section.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489621\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 618px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000444623146.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=608\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489621\" width=\"608\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty - Contributor\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The documentary sees Sheridan having therapy for the first time[/caption] \n<p>She says: ‚ÄúThe biggest worry, certainly if you‚Äôve had mental health issues in your past, is that it will rear its ugly head again.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI would hate for the wheels to come off during pregnancy or post pregnancy with postnatal depression or anything like that.‚Äù She adds: ‚ÄúI just hope I‚Äôm a good mum.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Sheridan is seen reading a letter from a supportive mother who says she cannot stop thinking something will go wrong and that she does not deserve to be a parent.</p> \n<p>The star responds: ‚ÄúI feel exactly all those emotions.‚Äù She also confesses she is still on medication to combat depression and anxiety, and had a desperate dilemma when she thought it could harm her baby.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489689\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 716px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/403129ea-5a38-424c-af0f-0be170774e56.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=706\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489689\" width=\"706\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Over the past three years, she‚Äôs done more TV including BBC1‚Äôs The Moorside and ITV‚Äôs Cleaning Up[/caption] \n<p>Sheridan says: ‚ÄúWhen I got pregnant, I read online I shouldn‚Äôt be taking any medication. So I stopped.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThen I spoke to my doctor and said, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm freaking out‚Äô and started having panic attacks again and not being able to get out of the house.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúAnd he said, ‚ÄòWell, don‚Äôt stop the medication. You can‚Äôt just choose to stop it. You‚Äôre not there yet‚Äô. I‚Äôve still got the underlying issues. So I went back on the medication and that was the right thing to do.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúBut I had constantly worried that it would affect the baby.‚Äù</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489691\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 779px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/716d93bf-d1c7-4655-9be1-bd5ffec4ddd7.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=769\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489691\" width=\"769\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Sheridan‚Äôs dad Colin died in December 2016 and the actress says she didn‚Äôt handle it well[/caption] \n<p>The documentary sees Sheridan having therapy for the first time, to explore issues which she believes could stem from her childhood and the death of her sibling when he was 18 and she was eight.</p> \n<p>She is seen crying and asks the crew to stop filming as she says: ‚ÄúIt was all perfect until my brother Julian got unwell. He was diagnosed with cancer and spent a couple of years on the couch unwell. I‚Äôd do little performances for him. He‚Äôd encourage me to sing and dance for him and I‚Äôd massage his feet.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI have lots of lovely memories of him. I really looked up to him as he was my big, big brother.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúWhat I vividly remember, which is kind of annoying now, which I try to black out, was the night that he died and all the screaming.</p> \n<h2>‚ÄòIt was like a bomb went off in my head‚Äô</h2> \n<p>‚ÄúI‚Äôve never really asked my family about it, because I don‚Äôt want to upset them. You just get on with it. This is why I think therapy might have been a good thing because you don‚Äôt know what you hold in from your childhood.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Her dad Colin died in December 2016 and Sheridan explains: ‚ÄúI just didn‚Äôt handle the news well at all. Maybe it was because it was what my brother died of as well.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúIt caused a bit of an explosion mentally. It was like a bomb went off in my head.‚Äù</p> \n<p>The meltdown came as she peaked as a West End star, playing Fanny Brice in Funny Girl. Having appeared on TV shows such as The Royle Family and Two Pints of Lager and a Packets of Crisps, she was also lauded in the lead role of Elle Woods in London musical Legally Blonde from 2009.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489627\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 601px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000460480901.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=591\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489627\" width=\"591\" height=\"959\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  ITV\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Actress Sheridan says she just wants to be a good mum[/caption] \n<p>But it was during the hit run that she started to suffer anxiety.</p> \n<p>Sheridan said: ‚ÄúI was going to different psychiatrists, getting different diagnoses. I then started self-medicating, drinking a lot and it was like a vicious circle. I could just see my whole life unravelling.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Over the past three years, she‚Äôs done more TV including BBC1‚Äôs The Moorside and ITV‚Äôs Cleaning Up. Last year she made a return to the West End as the narrator in Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> by Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford </a>as they enjoyed their lengthy summer holiday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A spokesperson for the daytime show said that the new series will focus on celebrating the best that Britain has to offer, with brand new travel, beauty, cooking and animal segments.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In the new four-part series ‚ÄòBest of British‚Äô, This Morning will embark upon a stunning tour of Britain with actor Nigel Havers.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Nigel will be visiting different locations to learn of our nation‚Äôs history, from boats and cars to coastlines, and of course all things culinary.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489360\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/8a24504d-37a0-4099-84b9-7e207a70cf0b.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489360\" width=\"960\" height=\"525\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>There will be new segments added to the daytime show[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489373\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000599509291-9.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489373\" width=\"768\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The pair have enjoyed a lengthy summer break[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Nigel said: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a genuine pleasure to be able to take the time out to tour Britain for This Morning viewers this September. I‚Äôve packed some hand sanitiser, a picnic blanket and an umbrella just in case!‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Resident chef Gino D‚ÄôAcampo will finally be back in the studio and chef John Torode will be taking us on an adventure in his new segment Torode‚Äôs Skeleton Coast.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Here he will visit local producers including a blueberry farm, a flour mill and a cider farm from Dorset along the great Jurassic Coast.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>John said: ‚ÄúDorset is one of my favourite parts of the country and I feel very lucky to have been able to get out and explore the mighty Jurassic Coast during this time.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489368\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/cd7b2a40-1e91-4b2a-95fd-1cb9b26a7d3e.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489368\" width=\"960\" height=\"522\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Eamonn and Ruth have been keeping Holly and Phil&#8217;s seats warm[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúI cannot wait to share some gorgeous recipes from the area. Not to mention that viewers will get the chance to judge my kayaking skills‚Ä¶ So watch Torode back out on the road.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The new series comes amid reports that<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12473442/holly-willoughbys-could-quit-this-morning-for-prime-time/\"> Holly&#8217;s reign on This Morning could be coming to an end after 11 years</a> following rumours within ITV Studios that change is afoot at its flagship daytime show.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The queen of daytime telly, 39, shook the industry earlier this month <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12351677/holly-willoughby-quits-showbiz-agency-shared-this-morning-phillip-schofield/#:~:text=HOLLY%20Willoughby%20has%20quit%20the,in%20an%20all%2Dfemale%20team.&#38;text=Instead%20of%20joining%20a%20rival,her%20new%20company%20Roxy%20Management.\">by quitting celeb agency YMU</a> ‚Äî home to her co-host Phillip Schofield and Ant and Dec ‚Äî and setting up her own company, Roxy Management.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489374\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 678px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000596088434-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=668\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489374\" width=\"668\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images</figcredit></figure>Holly could be gearing up to leave daytime telly[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Despite denials from <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/holly-willoughby/\">Holly‚Äôs </a>team that she is leaving the sofa, having reportedly signed a lucrative new ITV contract earning close to ¬£1million a year, she has paved the way for a primetime exit.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A well-paced industry source said: ‚ÄúHolly is unique in that women like her and want to be her friend and men are attracted to her as she‚Äôs so beautiful. She has universal appeal.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúBeing a working mum-of-three means parents can relate to her, and she seemingly understands everyday struggles.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489380\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 472px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000591083927-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=462\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489380\" width=\"462\" height=\"576\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The star recently quit the 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Husband who thought coronavirus was a ‚Äòfake crisis‚Äô has lost his pastor wife to virus after ignoring rules","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489155/husband-thought-coronavirus-fake-crisis-lost-wife/","description":"<p>A WOMAN has died from coronavirus after she and her husband believed internet claims that the virus was a hoax. </p>\n<p>Brian Lee Hitchens, and his wife Erin Hitchens, did not follow any <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/health/\">health</a> guidance related to <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/coronavirus/\">coronavirus</a> even though Erin suffered from asthma and a sleeping disorder, the <a href=\"https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-53892856\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">BBC</a> reported. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489151\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 550px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603891792.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=540\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489151\" width=\"540\" height=\"542\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Facebook</figcredit></figure>Erin Hitchens died after contracting coronavirus after she and her husband believed claims that the virus was a hoax[/caption]</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/839804/florida-coronavirus-government-hoax-man-contracts-disease/\">The couple was diagnosed with coronavirus in May</a> after reading claims that it was &#8220;fabricated, linked to 5G, or similar to the flu.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Erin, a pastor in <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/florida/\">Florida</a>, died at age 46 earlier this month from heart problems related to coronavirus.</p>\n<p>Brian, a taxi driver, told BBC that they did not follow health and social distancing guidelines early during the pandemic because of false claims seen online.</p>\n<p>He still worked and collected his wife&#8217;s medicine without wearing a mask or social distancing. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489153\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 470px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000583367946.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=460\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489153\" width=\"460\" height=\"343\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>WPTV</figcredit></figure>The couple did not follow health and social distancing guidelines early during the pandemic[/caption]</p>\n<p>&#8220;This is a real virus that affects people differently,&#8221; he said. &#8220;I can&#8217;t change the past. I can only live in today and make better choices for the future.&#8221; </p>\n<p>Brian told BBC that he wished he listened in the beginning and hopes his wife forgives him. </p>\n<p>&#8220;She&#8217;s no longer suffering, but in peace. I go through times missing her, but I know she&#8217;s in a better place.&#8221; </p>\n<p>When diagnosed with the virus, Brian <a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/brianlee.hitchens/posts/3241584752540091\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">warned others on Facebook</a> of how he and his wife were misled by false information. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489154\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 699px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603891892.png?strip=all&#38;w=689\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489154\" width=\"689\" height=\"387\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>GoFundMe</figcredit></figure>Brian wrote on Facebook that he knew he gave his wife the virus[/caption]</p>\n<p>&#8220;Many people still think that the Coronavirus is a fake crisis which at one time I did too and not that I thought it wasn&#8217;t a real virus going around but at one time I felt that it was blown out of proportion and it wasn&#8217;t that serious,&#8221; he wrote.</p>\n<p>&#8220;This thing is nothing to be messed with please listen to the authorities and heed the advice of the experts,&#8221; Brian added. &#8220;We don&#8217;t have to fear this and by heeding the advice doesn&#8217;t mean that you fear it that means you&#8217;re showing wisdom during this epidemic time.&#8221;</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div he gave the virus to his wife. </p>\n<p>&#8220;So just think about what I said and if you have to go out please use wisdom and don&#8217;t be foolish like I was so the same so the same thing won&#8217;t happen to you like it happened to me and my wife.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Brian started a <a href=\"https://www.gofundme.com/f/tuftt8-medical-and-personal-bills\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Trump says China ‚Äòwill own the US‚Äô if Joe Biden wins US election as he blasts presidential rival at RNC","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489609/trump-china-will-own-us-biden-wins-election/","description":"<p>PRESIDENT Donald Trump claims that China will &#8220;own this country&#8221; if Joe Biden wins the 2020 presidential election this fall. </p>\n<p>On the first day of the <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1361311/trump-nominated-reelection-republicans-convention-twelve-more-years/\">Republican National Convention</a>, Trump spoke in Charlotte, North Carolina and told a crowd of supporters that China will own the Untied States if Biden is elected. </p>\n<p><strong><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"‚ö†\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /></strong></strong> <strong>Follow our<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1186278/us-election-2020-trump-biden-latest-news/\"> US election 2020 live blog </a>for the latest news &#38; updates</strong> </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489606\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603875205.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489606\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>President Trump claims that China will &#8220;own this country&#8221; if Biden is elected[/caption]</p>\n<p>During a <a href=\"https://www.foxnews.com/media/trump-biden-china-decouple-trade-deal\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Fox News interview</a> on Sunday, the president reiterated his statement and said China &#8220;owns Joe Biden.&#8221;</p>\n<p>&#8220;They own him and they want me to lose so badly,&#8221; he said. </p>\n<p>In Charlotte, Trump claimed that &#8220;we built China&#8221;, giving the country anywhere from 200billion to 550billion over the past 25 years. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489607\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603252651.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489607\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy Live News</figcredit></figure>Trump told Fox News that China &#8220;owns Joe Biden&#8221;[/caption]</p>\n<p>&#8220;They took advantage of us because we didn&#8217;t have smart enough people to see,&#8221; he said. </p>\n<p>In recent months, Trump has criticized China&#8217;s relations with the United States, particularly through the social media app called <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/lifestyle/tech/1358564/tiktok-trump-ban-app-lawsuit-usa/\">TikTok</a>.</p>\n<p>Trump signed an initial order against TikTok on August 6, invoking a corporate blacklist against trading with Chinese parent firm ByteDance.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489608\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000584028097-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489608\" width=\"960\" height=\"671\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP or licensors</figcredit></figure>Trump has recently criticized China&#8217;s relations with the United States, through TikTok[/caption]</p>\n<p>Then just a week later, Trump gave ByteDance a September deadline to find a US buyer for TikTok.</p>\n<p>This deadline was later extended to November 12, after which point TikTok faces a national ban.</p>\n<p>Several tech companies have been linked to a TikTok buy-out, including Microsoft, Apple and Twitter.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div country.&#8221;</p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 21:38:15 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Model Claudia Schiffer hit her landmark 50th birthday‚Ä¶ but hasn‚Äôt aged at all","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12489378/claudia-schiffer-confident-at-50/","description":"<p>PLAGUED by shyness and nerves throughout her career, it‚Äôs a wonder how Claudia Schiffer became a household name at all.</p> \n<p>But as she turns 50 today, it‚Äôs clear the model is more confident than ever.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489253\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000599238325.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000599238325-e1598302615739.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=600\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489253\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  The stunning model reveals she‚Äôs ‚Äòmore confident than ever‚Äô on her 50th birthday\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Married to a hotshot film producer, building her own business empire and still dazzling with her beauty, Claudia is finally at ease with herself.</p> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a reason we have cakes and parties on our birthdays, and I feel the same way about getting older each year.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI am so happy to be turning 50 and have never felt more confident or happy. I don‚Äôt try to look or feel younger. I embrace now.‚Äù</p> \n<p>The blonde bombshell was first scouted aged just 17 while partying in a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11733711/nursery-teacher-arrested-murder-old-jobs/\">Dusseldorf nightclub</a> with a pal. Despite shooting to fame, the 5ft 11in teen was plagued with doubt over her modelling career.</p> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúI thought they were making a mistake and would find out I was the wrong girl and send me home once I arrived in Paris.‚Äù</p> \n<h2>FINALLY AT EASE</h2> \n<p>But soon, Claudia was one of the most in-demand models on the ‚Äô90s catwalks, modelling for <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12397872/gucci-chanel-louis-vuitton-most-ripped-off-brands-spot-real-fake/\">Chanel</a>, Versace and Yves Saint Laurent and fronting an ad campaign for Guess Jeans.</p> \n<p>In her career, she has appeared on more than 1,000 magazine covers. But Claudia admitted she struggled with being in the spotlight.</p> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúThe nerves before a catwalk show could be intense sometimes. I enjoyed them when they were over and we were all celebrating, but before I did not enjoy it.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúAnd getting there, I literally had to convince myself to go to each one. It was a very fast learning curve. Suddenly I was thrown into this world. I just thought, ‚ÄòClose your eyes and jump in‚Äô.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Known as the good girl of modelling, Claudia wasn‚Äôt tempted by the drink and drugs which swirled around the industry.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489258\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603261275.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603261275.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=634\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489258\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Claudia snapped in 1989 walking for Chanel\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty Images - Getty\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489293\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000463604144-e1598301979515.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000463604144-e1598301979515.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=616\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489293\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  The stunning model showed off her impressive figure in this catwalk snap from 1994\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúIn the beginning I didn‚Äôt even notice. I came from such a clean home. I was so naive. People would tell me afterwards that everybody in the studio was stoned except me, and I had no idea.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI don‚Äôt like to lose control over myself. I don‚Äôt like the feeling of not controlling what I‚Äôm saying or thinking.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Although she was relatively conservative by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/models/\">model standards</a>, Schiffer soon became a sex symbol with her sultry looks.</p> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúIt was insane, like being a rock star. You couldn‚Äôt get to your car unless a path was carved for you.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúPeople would cut holes in the fashion tents and try to take pictures of us. We had security at every fashion show.‚Äù</p> \n<h2>‚ÄòALL THE GHOSTS IN OUR HOUSE ARE LOVELY‚Äô</h2> \n<p>At the height of her <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/10406097/the-sun-most-popular-website/\">popularity</a> she even employed a guard to keep an eye on her lingerie.</p> \n<p>Claudia said: ‚ÄúWhen I was out on the runway I‚Äôd come back and my underwear would be gone ‚Äî my bra, my knickers, gone!‚Äù</p> \n<p>While she could have her pick of any men, aged just 23, she found love with magician <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10809719/david-copperfield-more-fun-classic/\">David Copperfield</a> ‚Äî 13 years her senior ‚Äî after appearing on stage as his assistant.</p> \n<p>During their five-year engagement, David lived in New York and Claudia in Monaco. The pair eventually split in 1999. She soon met Lock, Stock and Snatch producer Matthew Vaughn, and in 2002 they married at St George‚Äôs Church in Shimpling, Suffolk.</p> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúI just thought there‚Äôs no perfect man out there. Then I met him. He had everything I wanted in a man. He completely swept me off my feet.‚Äù</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489254\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268354.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268354.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489254\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Claudia reuinted in 2017 with her ‚Äô90s supermodels Carla Bruni, Naomi Campbell, Cindy Crawford and Helena Christensen for a Versace show\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty Images - Getty\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489249\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603261363.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603261363-e1598302264716.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=557\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489249\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Claudia walking for the Karl Lagerfeld fashion show in Paris, France (1994)\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489351\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603839369.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603839369.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=877\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489351\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Claudia with her hotshot producer hubby Matthew Vaughn and their kids\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Solarpix\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Claudia decided to quit the catwalk and focus on starting a family. She soon welcomed Caspar, now 17, Clementine, 15, and Cosima, ten, into her brood.</p> \n<p>Matthew, 49, Claudia and their children live in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12442419/claudia-schiffer-mansion-luxury-accommodation-dogs/\">Coldham Hall</a>, a 14-bedroom haunted tudor mansion in Suffolk.</p> \n<p>Claudia said: ‚ÄúA medium told us that actually, all the ghosts in the house are lovely. No one needs to be scared.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Rather than enjoy her estimated ¬£45million net worth and settle into country life, Claudia has embarked on new challenges.</p> \n<p>She has acted in movie comedies Richie Rich and Love, Actually, launched make-up and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/archives/news/396087/national-pottery-2/\">ceramics</a> lines and partnered on a capsule collection with shoe brand Aquazzura.</p> \n<h2>ETERNAL YOUTH</h2> \n<p>She produced Elton John biopic Rocketman last year under the name <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/7876604/claudia-schiffer-dog-kills-sheep/\">Claudia Vaughn</a> and forthcoming spy comedy The King‚Äôs Man, directed by her husband.</p> \n<p>But she hasn‚Äôt strayed far from her modelling roots, which she credits with helping her come out of her shell.</p> \n<p>Claudia said: ‚ÄúI‚Äôd probably still be a very shy person who had no idea I could overcome that by experiencing many things.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI would probably be in a job where you can be in the background, in a bank or behind the scenes. Modelling was my therapy. I learned how to communicate.‚Äù</p> \n<p>In 2019, Claudia returned to modelling by posing nude on the front of Vogue Italia. In January this year she was the cover girl for <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/10728871/russian-vogue-model-mysterious-naked-balcony-injuries-cant-speak/\">Russian Vogue</a>, looking as youthful as in her heyday.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489250\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603261516.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603261516-e1598301765482.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=597\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489250\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Stunning Claudia sported this fancy number in 1995 for Versace\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489242\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603820480.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603820480.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489242\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Claudia posted this throwback ahead of her 50th birthday\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Instagram\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Claudia once claimed the key to her young looks was lager on her tresses. She said: ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt scientifically proven but some people say drinking beer makes hair shiny and strong.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúYou‚Äôre better off with a do-it-all serum ‚Äî but a little beer can‚Äôt hurt.‚Äù On top of lathering with lager, Claudia also favours men‚Äôs cosmetics.</p> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúMy favourite is <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/5844221/avon-is-selling-a-version-of-cliniques-primer-lipstick-and-its-11-50-cheaper/\">Clinique</a> for Men face scrub, because it has enough grittiness to actually make a difference and gives skin a refreshing tingle.‚Äù</p> \n<p>But despite her seemingly eternal youth, the runway veteran is happy to let the next generation of supermodels dominate the catwalk.</p> \n<p>She said: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve had many wonderful compliments in my time. But then you get to the next stage and you move on.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n  <div class=\"col </div>\n <!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt have to be called beautiful your entire life. It‚Äôs a nice memory, but then the next generation starts. For me, it‚Äôs a natural thing to do, to hand over, to not be envious or jealous.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI can‚Äôt think of anything worse than if you said, ‚ÄòThere‚Äôs a magic pill and it‚Äôs going to make you look 20 again‚Äô.‚Äù</p> \n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-instagram\">\n <blockquote class=\"instagram-media\" data-instgrm-captioned=\"\"
