08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Girl‚Äôs miraculous rescue by ferry workers after she is swept out to sea on giant inflatable unicorn","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12488636/girl-sea-inflatable-unicorn-greece-ferry/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>A YOUNG girl was rescued by ferry workers after she was swept out to sea on a giant inflatable unicorn.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The youngster, believed to be aged 4 or 5, is lucky to be alive after she floated about half a mile away from the Greek coast she and her parents were visiting on Sunday.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488735\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/5572cda9-a5be-48ec-b805-dce0f520fa81.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488735\" width=\"960\" height=\"626\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>The little girl floated out to sea on an inflatable unicorn off the town of Antirio in the Gulf of Corith.[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489035\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 890px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/2abdf1dc-66a0-4fb6-9e2a-ad1ba4761ffe.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=880\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489035\" width=\"880\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The little girl is lifted out of the water to safety by the ferry workers</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The little girl had been playing in the ocean off the town of Antirio in the Gulf of Corith before she bobbed out to sea.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>When her panicked mum and dad realised she had drifted out of their reach they called on a local ferry to help out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The captain of the boat spotted her and was filmed slowly approaching the youngster who somehow managed to stay sitting calmly on her blow-up steed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>An amazing video captured the moment she was safely plucked from the sea and rescued by the ferry team.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://greekcitytimes.com/2020/08/25/girl-floating-on-unicorn-saved-by/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Greek City Times reports</a> she was eventually handed safely over to her worried parents.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It comes after the ferry boat recently picked up an elderly man who was swept away while dozing on an inflatable mattress.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Earlier this month a six-year-old boy was <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12350302/boy-airlifted-hospital-north-wales-inflatable/\">airlifted to hospital after reportedly being swept out to sea on an inflatable swan in North Wales.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The little boy was found face-down and unconscious in the water after a hero builder swam in to rescue him off the coast of Black Rock Sands.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col weekend","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12489198/alex-jones-tears-one-show-colleague-sudden-death/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>HEARTBROKEN Alex Jones fought back tears tonight as she paid tribute to a young The One Show colleague who died suddenly at the weekend.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 43-year-old presenter dedicated the end of the show to Charlie Mott, one of the BBC programme&#8217;s researchers.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489227\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Alex fought back tears as she paid tribute</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Closing this evening&#8217;s episode of the show, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/alex-jones/\">Alex </a>told viewers: &#8220;Now, before we go, we just wanted to pay tribute to one of out colleagues Charlie Mott, who sadly died at the weekend.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Everybody on the team is absolutely devastated. He was hugely talented and such good company. We miss him so much.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Clearly overwhelmed with emotion, the star added: &#8220;Our thoughts are with his family and we are sending lots of love from all of us here.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489234\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 210px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603894148.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=200\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489234\" width=\"200\" height=\"200\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Linkedin</figcredit></figure>Charlie tragically passed away at the weekend[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>As a mark of respect for Charlie, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/the-one-show/\">The One Show</a> did not include their upbeat theme music as the credits rolled after the show.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Instead, the closing frames aired in complete silence.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Charie is thought to be just three years out of University, having graduated from Bournemouth in 2017.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489267\" 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"UK weather ‚Äì Storm Francis hits UK as drivers battle through flash floods with 70mph gales & more torrential rain on way","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12487369/uk-weather-tomorrow-storm-francis/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>STORM Francis has hit the UK, leaving drivers battling through flash floods and with more torrential rain on way.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A 700 mile-wide &#8216;Canadian low pressure vortex‚Äô  is bringing 70mph winds and some of the worst school summer holidays weather for 50 years.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489942\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 350px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603902936.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=340\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489942\" width=\"340\" height=\"521\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Snapchat</figcredit></figure>Drivers making it home through the early evening deluge[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12487999\" width=\"960\" height=\"703\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">¬†Satellite images show the 700 mile-wide Storm Francis&#8217; &#8216;Canadian low pressure vortex.&#8217;</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489941\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603883978.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489941\" width=\"960\" height=\"676\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>London News Pictures</figcredit></figure>Commuters get caught in torrential rain in Putney in South West London[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490055\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 770px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603902935-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=760\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490055\" width=\"760\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter / @ClareBKing</figcredit></figure>Parts of London saw a risk of serious flooding[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Forecasters are predicting heavy rainfall &#8211; up to 3.5 inches in places &#8211; during a 36-hour weather window.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Drivers in London were forced to negotiate torrents of water on the road as Storm Francis arrived with avengence in the early evening on Monday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Eight flood alerts are already in place in England and Wales and ten in Scotland.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Shredded tents, blackouts and travel problems from toppled trees and floods are risks as millions are on UK breaks away from home, amid wind gusts usually seen in winter.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>FLOOD ALERTS</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The Met Office has issued a new wind warning for all of Wales and most of England until Wednesday, as well as two heavy rain warnings for southern Scotland, north Wales and northern England.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Chief Meteorologist Andy Page said: &#8220;The UK is in for another unseasonably wet and windy spell with Storm Francis arriving on Tuesday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;There will be strong winds and heavy rain, especially in the west of the UK.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12487369/uk-weather-tomorrow-storm-francis/?preview_id=12487369&#38;preview_nonce=6b8f7e629a&#38;preview=true\">Storm Francis</a> is expected to clear by Wednesday lunchtime, leaving a brighter and more settled outlook for the remainder of the day, the Met Office said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After Francis&#8217; two-day buffeting, more wet and windy conditions follow from Thursday into the Bank Holiday weekend, when the Met Office is even forecasting summer frost, most likely in the North.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489944\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603902932.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489944\" width=\"960\" height=\"889\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter / @ClareBKing</figcredit></figure>A street in London in the wake of Storm Francis hitting [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488107\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/CM-RAIN-MAP-24-AUG.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488107\" width=\"960\" height=\"726\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Storm Francis will lash Britain with rain</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488039\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603454589-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"The Met Office has issued yellow weather warnings for wind and rain on Tuesday\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488039\" width=\"960\" height=\"768\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alistair Grant Freelance / wxcharts</figcredit></figure>The storm is forecast to hit Britain on Tuesday morning [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490083\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 832px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603902933-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=822\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490083\" width=\"822\" height=\"854\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter / @ClareBKing</figcredit></figure>More bad weather is on its way say forecasters[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The arrival of storm Francis follows a similar period of unseasonable weather towards the end of last week, coinciding with the arrival of Storm Ellen.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Nicola Williams, 15, was swept to her death in the Rhymney River in Llanrumney, Cardiff, and a 50-year-old holidaymaker die in the sea near Helston, west Cornwall, after getting into difficulties.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Nicola Maxey of the Met Office said: &#8220;Since 2015 when we started naming storms, we have never had to name a storm in August &#8211; and now we&#8217;ve had two in a few days.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;There are a lot of people on holiday in the UK at the moment, going camping and on walking breaks, many in coastal locations where the winds are likely to be stronger, so it is worth checking on the Met Office website ahead of time.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container &#8220;unusual&#8221; for August, but would have to go some way to beat the current record wind gust speed of 87mph recorded at The Needles on the Isle of Wight in August 1996.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Likewise, the wettest August on record in the UK was in 1912 when 167.3 mm was recorded across the country as a whole.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Between August 1 and 22, the UK as a whole had seen some 72.7mm of rainfall </div>\n <!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>In 2017 I‚Äôm A Celebrity host Ant needed rehab for drink and prescription drug addiction.</p> \n<p>Lisa stood by him but in January 2018 he announced he was ending the marriage.</p> \n<p>After the split he started dating his former PA, Anne-Marie Corbett. They now live together.</p> \n<p>Lisa was granted a decree nisi in October, with the marriage officially ended by April‚Äôs decree absolute.</p> \n<p><strong>GOT a story? noopener\">exclusive@the-sun.co.uk</a></strong></p>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 21:46:17 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/5c45e744-6f8f-41fe-9642-2755ddef257a.jpg?strip=all&w=822","linkMd5":"8c41a1b87d9385b8ac3e4cf3480a74c0","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn61@2020_2/2020/08/25/00-41-46-956_12d2d46eb74e362d.webp","destWidth":822,"destHeight":960,"sourceBytes":107380,"destBytes":107380,"author":"Clara Gaspar","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/5c45e744-6f8f-41fe-9642-2755ddef257a.jpg?strip=all&w=822":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn61@2020_2/2020/08/25/00-41-46-956_12d2d46eb74e362d.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/188049d7-7455-48c3-b339-77c4315f00a4.jpg?strip=all&w=572":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn47@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-42-02-356_3d3dc64073c43027.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000378128041.jpg?strip=all&w=657":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn14@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-51-162_e9ac7e069c2bd84b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603776838.jpg?strip=all&w=774":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn59@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-42-06-028_001e12a7debd9d9b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603776837.jpg?strip=all&w=767":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn72@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-42-02-832_ed97c4f7a13ebbdc.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603776836.jpg?strip=all&w=905":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn6@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-53-633_2f87ee3301ecb6eb.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106285},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"BBC sparks uproar after banning words from Land of Hope and Glory & Rule Britannia for Last Night of the Proms","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489411/bbc-ban-words-land-of-hope-and-glory-proms/","description":"<p><strong>BBC luvvies sparked uproar on Monday by saying they will ditch the words from Land of Hope and Glory and Rule, Britannia! for Last Night of the Proms.&nbsp;</strong></p> \n<p>Boris Johnson had slammed ‚Äúwoke‚Äù plans to axe the patriotic sing-along climax from next month‚Äôs bash altogether.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489550\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603859938-2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489550\" width=\"960\" height=\"639\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  AFP or licensors\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The BBC has banned the words of Land of Hope and Glory and Rule, Britannia! from The Last Night of the Proms[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490394\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602126204-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490394\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  AFP\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Boris Johnson said ‚Äòwe need to tackle the substance of problems, not the symbols‚Äô[/caption] \n<p>Beeb bosses instead announced they would feature ‚Äî but only as orchestral versions amid fears of a backlash from <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/black-lives-matter/\">Black Lives Matter</a> campaigners due to lyrical connotations about the British Empire.</p> \n<p>But Tory MP David Morris said: ‚ÄúWe cannot erase our history. We have got to be proud to be British. It does not matter what colour, creed or religion you are.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Brexit Party leader <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/nigel-farage/\">Nigel Farage</a> told The Sun: ‚ÄúThe BBC should stop apologising for our history and our heritage. People will be disgusted by this level of political correctness. The only thing that needs cancelling is the BBC itself.‚Äù&nbsp;</p> \n<p>Culture Secretary Oliver Dowden told the BBC that ‚Äúconfident, forward-looking nations don‚Äôt erase their history‚Äù.</p> \n<p>Former Cabinet Minister <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/andrea-leadsom/\">Andrea Leadsom</a> tweeted: ‚ÄúSeriously? Has the Beeb totally lost touch?‚Äù</p> \n<p>And North West Durham MP Richard Holden wrote: ‚ÄúAnother stupid move from the BBC. Just let the people sing! At every turn the BBC just dig the hole they‚Äôre in a bit deeper. They need to stop with this attempt to appease the woke morons.‚Äù</p> \n<p>The annual Royal Albert Hall concert, beamed around the world, traditionally ends with the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/uknews/12476359/rule-britannia-land-hope-glory-black-lives-matter-bbc-proms/\">flag-waving anthems</a>.</p> \n<p>But organisers were said to be concerned about their links to the British Empire, and lyrics including: ‚ÄúBritons never will be slaves.‚Äù&nbsp;</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490400\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000557163455.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490400\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty Images - Getty\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Nigel Farage said: ‚ÄòThe only thing that needs cancelling is the BBC itself‚Äô[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490402\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603899907.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490402\" width=\"960\" height=\"647\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  PA:Press Association\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Last Night of the Proms traditionally ends with Land of Hope and .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>The PM said that while he understands the emotions involved, ‚Äúwe need to tackle the substance of problems, not the symbols‚Äù.</p> \n<p>There will be no audience at the Proms due to Covid restrictions.&nbsp;</p> \n<p>The BBC said a soprano will sing <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/5980126/jerusalem-lyrics-national-anthem-england-hymn-meaning/\">Jerusalem </a>and You‚Äôll Never Walk Alone to create a ‚Äúpoignant and inclusive event‚Äù and capture ‚Äúthe mood of this unique time‚Äù.</p> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div Billy Brown&#8217;s $1.6 million real estate empire in Washington is in ruins after a wildfire destroyed their property.¬†</p>\n<p>The Sun can exclusively reveal <a ‚Äúdevastating loss.‚Äù</a></p>\n<p>He captioned a <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1352139/bear-brown-devastated-familys-washington-ranch-destroyed-wildfires/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">series of photos of a forest fire</a>: ‚ÄúA fire swept through our mountain, our home! The [loss] seems to be great! It‚Äôs still burning! I‚Äôll keep everyone posted! God bless!‚Äù</p>\n<p>He responded to a fan: ‚ÄúIt was beautiful! can.‚Äù</p>\n<p>The Palmer Fire started on Tuesday, burning through 18,077 acres of land.</p>\n<p>The fire is 27 percent contained.&#160;</p>\n<p>The fire will be a storyline for the upcoming season, as <a href=\"https://www.tvinsider.com/945989/alaskan-bush-people-fire-palmer/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">TV Insider</a> reported crew were on site as the fire wrecked havoc on We‚Äôre thinking about barns, horses, cattle.‚Äù</p>\n<p>In a trailer for the current season, the family struggles to make it through the harsh winter, as they also deal with coyotes and bears while building on their vast property.&#160;</p>\n<p>Billy said in a preview: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve gone through great extremes to do things the way we want to do them. Everyone has to bust it more than we‚Äôve ever had. Sunday</a>.¬†</p>\n<p>The episode focused on Bear and his ex-fiancee Raiven Adams preparing for their wedding on the Brown property.</p>\n<p>Bear opened up about his ‚Äúnerves‚Äù before the big day and the two <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1360554/bear-brown-alaskan-bush-people-raiven-adams/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">called their nuptials off days before the wedding</a>.</p>\n<p>Bear and Raiven began dating after meeting at his brother Noah‚Äôs wedding and got engaged in 2019.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489001\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" wedding on the property, which they later called off[/caption]</p>\n<p>\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Did Bear Brown on Alaskan Bush People get married?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tBEAR Brown of Alaskan Bush People was set to wed Raiven Adams, but it was not to be.\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t</p>\n<div>\n<p>They¬†called off their wedding¬†just days before the ceremony after he disappeared and no one could find him.</p>\n<p>Bear Brown and Raiven¬†spent most of the season 12 premiere episode prepping for the big day, but after opening up about how ‚Äúnervous‚Äù he was, Bear split before he could get hitched.</p>\n</div>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col orders of paedophile Jeffrey Epstein.</p> \n<p>Lisa Phillips, 42, said she then confronted the billionaire ‚Äî and he chillingly told her: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs nice to have things on people.‚Äù</p> \n<figure over the incident\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Her bombshell claims will be broadcast on British TV tonight.</p> \n<p>The Sun has spoken to her pal, who was in her early 20s at the time, and she declined to comment.</p> \n<p>But Lisa told The Sun: ‚ÄúMy friend was very upset. She was crying.‚Äù</p> \n<p>There is no suggestion the Prince knew of Epstein‚Äôs demand or was involved in any non-consensual sex. And last night sources close to him branded the allegation ‚Äúbaseless‚Äù.</p> \n<p>Ex-pin up Lisa, who now runs an LA modelling firm, first met Epstein after a Caribbean photoshoot in 2000. He invited her and another pal to his island, Little St James.</p> \n<p>She recalled: ‚ÄúI found Jeffrey very charming and he seemed really nice. I had mentioned I had lived in England and he said, ‚ÄòOh, would you like to meet a prince?‚Äô.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488756\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000540429815-2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488756\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Jae Donnelly\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Andrew and Epstein on a stroll in New York‚Äôs Central Park[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488786\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 859px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000593250503.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=849\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488786\" width=\"849\" height=\"946\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  ¬©Nicholas Razzell\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Virginia Roberts pictured with Andrew in London[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488788\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000540464278.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488788\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  BBC\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Prince Andrew has been accused of sleeping with Virginia Roberts in New York, London and the Caribbean[/caption] \n<p>‚ÄúThis man walked up and I recognised him as Prince Andrew. He was very nice. It was very brief.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Lisa saw nothing untoward on the island and over the next few years met with Epstein at charity events, parties and Broadway shows.</p> \n<p>She added: ‚ÄúHe always wanted to meet friends of mine. He loved young women but none of us suspected he liked underage girls.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Lisa said in 2004 the friend confided about the alleged incident at Epstein‚Äôs New York townhouse.</p> \n<p>Lisa claimed: ‚ÄúShe told me Jeffrey told her to go into a bedroom and have sex with Prince Andrew. She said Andrew had sex with her, and left the room. I think she was confused by Jeffrey ‚Äî manipulated by him. She felt like she had to do it.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why she was so angry, so upset. She thought they had a different relationship.‚Äù</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488839\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000550752094.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488839\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  PA:Press Association\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Prince Andrew spoke for the first time about his links to Jeffrey Epstein in an interview with BBC Newsnight‚Äôs Emily Maitlis in 2019[/caption] \n<p>Lisa went on: ‚ÄúI had one last conversation with Jeffrey. I said, ‚ÄòMy friend told me about you instructing her to have sex with Prince Andrew‚Äô. He said something like it wasn‚Äôt a big deal, that she was OK with it.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI said. ‚ÄòNobody‚Äôs OK with that ‚Äî why would you do that?‚Äô.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúHe grinned and said, ‚ÄòOh it‚Äôs nice to have things on people‚Äô. That wasn‚Äôt the first time he‚Äôd said that to me.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúHe had a lot of cameras in the house and I used to ask him about it and he used to say the same thing.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Prince Andrew has been accused of sleeping with ‚Äúsex slave‚Äù Virginia Roberts in New York, London and the Caribbean. He denies it.</p> \n<p>Epstein admitted soliciting an underage prostitute in 2008 and served 13 months. The 66-year-old was arrested again last year on child sex trafficking charges but died in his cell.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488832\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 644px\">\n secure a ¬£27million deal for Lille defender Gabriel Magalhaes.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196653/arsenal/\">Gunners</a> will recoup most of the fee by <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12487876/wolves-ainsley-maitland-niles-transfer/\">selling Ainsley Maitland-Niles to Wolves</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488919\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/5d6b1430-bc51-46d5-ba1c-67cd15ada9e8.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488919\" width=\"960\" height=\"763\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Gabriel is on the verge of joining Arsenal after passing his medical[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Gabriel, 22, flew to London yesterday and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12483430/gabriel-magalhaes-lands-in-london-arsenal-transfer-man-utd/\">went straight to Arsenal‚Äôs London Colney training ground</a> for his medical.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He has now entered a strict 14-day quarantine period to comply with Government restrictions for anyone coming into the country from France.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>That means he will not be eligible to play in Saturday‚Äôs Community Shield clash with <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196659/liverpool/\">Liverpool</a> at Wembley.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And he cannot even meet his new team-mates until four days before Arsenal‚Äôs opening Premier League fixture at¬†Fulham on September 12.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12116744/arsenal-transfer-news-live-willian-aubameyang-partey/\"><strong>ARSENAL NEWS LIVE: Click here for the latest Gunners news</strong></a></h3>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Gabriel has been training with Lille for the past four weeks so has undergone twice-weekly coronavirus tests.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Yet he was still only allowed to visit London Colney under strict medical supervision.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It is understood he has agreed a five-year contract.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Toffees and Italians Napoli both matched Lille‚Äôs ¬£27m asking price but Gabriel chose the Emirates after chatting with fellow Brazilian Edu, Arsenal‚Äôs technical director.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The club can now turn their attention to strengthening the midfield but boss Mikel Arteta has been warned he needs to sell some players first.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container Maitland-Niles, who is in talks with Wolves over a ¬£20m move.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The versatile midfielder, 22, feels his opportunities will be restricted if he stays put.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Arsenal‚Äôs backroom shake-up has continued, with assistant goalkeeping coach Sal Bibbo and football operations manager Ameesh Manek leaving.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Thiago Silva transfer could be key to fixing Chelsea‚Äôs leaky defence but Blues may have to ditch philosophy","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12489172/thiago-silva-chelsea-transfer-comment/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>THIAGO SILVA is 36 next month but insists he wants to play for ‚Äúthree or four more years‚Äù.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Which should make <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196660/chelsea/\">Chelsea</a> the last place on earth for him to try his luck.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489187\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603496230-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489187\" width=\"960\" height=\"591\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Thiago Silva can fix Chelsea&#8217;s defence but his deal goes against the club&#8217;s usual philosophy with players over 30[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The club have just seen his fellow Brazilian, winger Willian ‚Äî 32 and still one of their best performers ‚Äî <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12400669/arsenal-transfer-news-willian-free-chelsea/\">quit to join Arsenal because of ageism</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He wanted a three-year contract but was only offered two, so walked into the welcoming arms of a major rival.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Spanish forward Pedro, 33, one of the most highly decorated players in the world,<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12232107/pedro-leaves-chelsea-roma/\"> left last month and has since joined Roma</a> on a free.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Stamford Bridge is no country for old men ‚Äî unless your defence is an embarrassment and needs a quick fix.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And this explains why Chelsea are so <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488259/chelsea-agree-thiago-silva-deal/\">keen to wave ‚ÄòHello‚Äô to Thiago Silva</a> before the door has even shut behind Willian and Pedro.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AD-SPORT-GRAPHIC-Chelsea-Top-Fixtures.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AD-SPORT-GRAPHIC-Chelsea-Top-Fixtures.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12451067\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>Silva would be to Chelsea‚Äôs erratic defence what 33-year-old Olivier Giroud is to their unreliable attack.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Experienced feet and a wise head, battle-scarred but refusing to call it quits.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Frank Lampard does not have an issue with age.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He was desperate to keep Willian but it is the people upstairs who dig in when &#160;it comes to holding on to old soldiers. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>To be closer to 40 than 30 and playing all 90 minutes of a Champions League final says more than any commentator could.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The fact PSG manager Thomas Tuchel wants Silva to stay, when the defender‚Äôs age could be trumped up as a reason behind the defeat by Bayern Munich, is another tell-tale sign.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12287166/chelsea-transfer-news-live-kai-havertz-reguilon-chilwell-zaha/\">CHELSEA NEWS LIVE: Click here for the latest Blues news</a></strong></h3>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>The faith still placed in his weary bones at such an ambitious club as PSG means Blues boss Lampard is not losing his mind by making a play for him.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Chelsea‚Äôs defence tired towards the end of the last, elongated season and mistakes crept in.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They were done over by West Ham, humiliated at Sheffield United, taken to the brink by Crystal Palace.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Antonio Rudiger remains highly regarded but a freak injury led to a twisted groin and time on the sidelines.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He was supposed to be the mainstay at the back but became more unreliable as the season went on.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Andreas Christensen has failed to convince Lamps on a consistent basis that he can lead the defence into the next ten years.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col photo","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12490101/jacqueline-jossa-dan-osborne-children-photo/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>JACQUELINE Jossa thanked &#8220;god&#8221; for her husband Dan Osborne and their children in a sweet holiday photo on Instagram.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The star posed for a photo with their five-year-old Ella and Mia, two, and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12487131/jacqueline-jossa-husband-dan-osborne-family-time/\">Dan</a>&#8216;s son Teddy in Crete and looked so happy, with the I&#8217;m A Celeb star branding her family &#8220;loves of my life&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490119\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img praised her for her display of emotion, with one writing: &#8220;This is what we love to see, a happy couple that have got through all their trauma no matter how bad it got it‚Äôs so nice to see you both finally happy.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another said: &#8220;You have such a beautiful family @jacjossa you‚Äôre sooo lucky&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dan, 29, also shared a snap of the clan, with his Amazing place, even more amazing company.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Been real quiet on here, just wanted to leave my phone alone and enjoy family time and I have loved it.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Although Dan stepped back from social media during his break, Jacqueline has been keeping fans updated.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Despite their past issues, they look happier than ever after <a a way to sign Lionel Messi this summer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Barcelona superstar has indicated that he may decide to leave Camp Nou, if he concludes that he can&#8217;t win the game&#8217;s biggest trophies there in the remainder of his peak.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489703\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601996726-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489703\" width=\"960\" height=\"651\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>Lionel Messi is considering his Barcelona future[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>And City bosses are looking into whether they could feasibly pounce to sign the 33-year-old within the rules of Financial Fair Play.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>While Barca have so far indicated that they would demand his ¬£631million release clause to be paid in full in order to let him go, <a href=\"https://www.espn.co.uk/football/manchester-city/story/4166134/manchester-city-crunching-numbers-for-possible-lionel-messi-deal-sources\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">ESPN</a> report that City chiefs are looking into the numbers that would be involved, should the Catalan giants&#8217; stance soften.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Some <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1232720/barcelona/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Barca</a> board members are also said to be open to selling their Argentine talisman, should it allow them to reinvest in the rest of their team.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Messi last week met with new coach Ronald Koeman, amid his frustration at their recent Champions League exits at the hands of AS Roma, Liverpool and worst of all Bayern Munich.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And with just a year remaining on his contract, his future hangs in the balance.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Financial experts believe that the deal would be impossible to do, however, given the current situation with the coronavirus pandemic.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But City will leave no stone unturned &#8211; even given the scrutiny they are under following their triumph over Uefa in the Court of Arbitration for Sport.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, Barcelona wait nervously as Messi continues to remain silent publicly in the wake of his side&#8217;s <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12407371/barca-2-bayern-munich-8-lionel-messi-germans-batter-barcelona/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">8-2 humbling by Bayern</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"wp-block-group\"><div class=\"wp-block-group__inner-container\">\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h2><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12371286/transfer-news-live-winks-man-city-cristiano-ronaldo-barcelona-spurs-liverpool/\">TRANSFER NEWS LIVE: Breaking news, juicy gossip and the biggest deals</a></h2>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n</div></div>\n\n\n\n<p>While he has also appeared settled with his family in the city, for the first time he appears to genuinely be considering an exit.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>City supremo Khaldoon Al Mubarak today said: &#8220;I think you‚Äôve seen when it comes to the two acquisitions we have made, Ake and Ferran Torres. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;We moved quickly, we knew the players clearly, these were our targets and when the opportunity came, we were able to come in very quickly and swiftly and do that business.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;There are additional players we will be bringing in and we will stick to the plan obviously within the realities of the market that we live in today.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489707\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000004186702.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489707\" width=\"960\" height=\"653\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Times Newspapers Ltd</figcredit></figure>Messi worked under Guardiola at Barcelona[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489709\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000502255360.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489709\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP or licensors</figcredit></figure>The Argentine is good friends with compatriot Sergio Aguero[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container with boss Thomas Tuchel having admitted that he&#8217;d be &#8220;very welcome&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The German, 46, said: &#8220;He&#8217;s very welcome. What coach says no to Messi?&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But he also conceded that he doubts he&#8217;ll actually leave Barcelona, continuing: &#8220;I think Messi finishes his career in Barcelona. viral","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12489129/britney-spears-fans-paris-eiffel-tower-2000-meme-viral/","description":"<p><strong>BRITNEY Spears unintentionally sent the internet into a frenzy on Monday after a viral meme that claimed she designed and built the Eiffel Tower was believed by many fans.</strong></p>\n<p>The 38-year-old pop star has been <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1345360/britney-spears-fans-conservatorship/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">flooded with support from her loyal fanbase</a> as she <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1358088/britney-spears-dad-conservatorship-more-children/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">continues to battle her dad</a>, Jamie Spears, for <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1349371/britney-spears-conservatorship-extended-february-fans-fear-demand-freedom/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">control of her ongoing conservatorship</a>.&#160;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489202\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001236358.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489202\" width=\"960\" height=\"700\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Britney posed in front of the Eiffel Tower while promoting Oops! I Did It Again in 2000[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489203\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 642px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000319010885.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=632\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489203\" width=\"632\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty - Contributor</figcredit></figure>The pop star&#8217;s photoshoot in front of the iconic Parisian landmark was used for the viral meme [/caption]</p>\n<p>To show the Toxic singer some more love, one Twitter use created a meme of the singer standing in front of the iconic landmark in <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/paris/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Paris</a> &#8211; which was completed in¬†1889.</p>\n<p>Britney made a press tour stop and posed in front of the Eiffel Tower while promoting Oops! I Did It Again more than a century later in 2000.¬†</p>\n<p>She wore a wrap crop top that showed off her belly button ring and rocked a short layered bob at the time.&#160;</p>\n<p>The dancer glowed in the snaps &#8211; where she flashed a big smile throughout the photoshoot.&#160;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489204\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603889008.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489204\" width=\"960\" height=\"854\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter</figcredit></figure>A Twitter user&#8217;s claim Britney designer the Eiffel Tower went viral this week[/caption]</p>\n<p>The meme creator posted two side-by-side images where <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1101300/does-britney-spears-have-custody-of-her-kids-sean-and-jayden-federline/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">the mom-of-two</a> proudly posed on a terrace that overlooked the City of Love.</p>\n<p>Alongside the 20-year-old throwbacks was the caption: ‚ÄúBritney Spears after the completion of the Eiffel Tower, which she designed and oversaw the construction of, in 2000.‚Äù</p>\n<p>The fan was met with thousands of replies and nearly 200,000 likes‚Ä¶ and counting.</p>\n<p>While most people were in on the joke and appreciated the sarcasm, some appeared to genuinely question the statement and fell for the claim.&#160;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489205\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603889011.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489205\" width=\"960\" height=\"277\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489206\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603889010.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489206\" width=\"960\" height=\"333\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489207\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603889013.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489207\" width=\"960\" height=\"636\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>One person tweeted: ‚ÄúWhy didn‚Äôt I know that Britney Spears designed &#38; paid for the construction of the Eiffel Tower?‚Äù</p>\n<p>‚ÄúWow I just read somewhere that Britney Spears designed and built the Eiffel Tower. Her talent is truly unparalleled,‚Äù another wrote.&#160;</p>\n<p>A curious fan questioned: ‚ÄúWait wasn‚Äôt the tower built in 1889?‚Äù Which warranted the reply: ‚ÄúThere was a model-sized prototype designed in 1899 but it was physically impossible for it to be built at scale until Britney made a few changes to the underlying rules of our universe.‚Äù</p>\n<p>Someone else who had doubts about the sincerity said: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm&#8230; Pretty sure the tweet is sarcasm as the eiffel tower was not built in 2000 lol.‚Äù</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489208\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 480px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000599950839-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=470\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489208\" width=\"470\" height=\"591\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Britney&#8217;s fans have been supporting her amid the ongoing #FreeBritney movement [/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489209\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 441px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603153220-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=431\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489209\" width=\"431\" height=\"538\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram/Britney Spears</figcredit></figure>The singer thanked her supporters and gushed she could &#8216;feel the love&#8217; online [/caption]</p>\n<p>However, someone tried to clear up the confusion: ‚ÄúNo, Britney Spears definitely managed and completed that project in July of 2000, after the previous eiffel tower was demolished in ‚Äô65.‚Äù</p>\n<p>Fans of the Crossroads star have created memes or shown love to Britney in other ways online in recent months as she continues to <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1346299/britney-spears-dad-jamie-conservator/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">fight her father in her ongoing conservatorship</a>.</p>\n<p>Hordes of&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1092280/britney-spears-conservatorship-father-jamie-estate-joke/\">#FreeBritney supporters</a>&#160;attended the star‚Äôs latest hearing at a LA courthouse last Wednesday as they held banners demanding for the singer to be &#8220;freed&#8221; from her conservatorship.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489210\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602734349-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489210\" width=\"960\" height=\"666\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Britney&#8217;s dad, Jamie, continues to have control of her conservatorship[/caption]</p>\n<p>\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Why is #freebritney trending and what does the star have to say about her conservatorship?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t</p>\n<div>\n<p>Britney Spears&#8217; conservatorship has sparked outrage among fans, particularly since she herself has made it clear she does not want it to continue in its current form.</p>\n<p>It was implemented in 2008 after a series of public meltdowns.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/britney-spears/\">Britney</a>&#8216;s conservatorship prevents her from controlling her life or having any access to her million-dollar fortune.</p>\n<p>Britney&#8217;s lawyer, Samuel D Ingham III has said that she is &#8220;strongly opposed&#8221; to Jamie Spears continuing to control her affairs.</p>\n<p>Due to health issues last year &#8211; which are came after claims of a physical altercation with his grandson Sean Preston &#8211; Jamie had stepped down temporarily from his role in Britney&#8217;s conservatorship.</p>\n<p>Britney instead wants Jodi Montgomery, who is a trained conservator, to have permanent control.</p>\n<p>Fans of Britney say the 38-year-old superstar is being manipulated and controlled under the grounds of her conservatorship.</p>\n<p>Under the hashtag #freebritney, they&#8217;re calling for the end of her conservatorship</p>\n<p>Jamie Spears says Britney&#8217;s conservatorship is&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1239037/britney-spears-dad-jamie-conservatorship/\">&#8220;no one else&#8217;s business&#8221;</a>&#160;and #FreeBritney movement &#8220;is a joke.&#8221;</p>\n</div>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t</p>\n<p>However, the judge ruled she will&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1346299/britney-spears-dad-jamie-conservator/\">remain under the legal control</a>&#160;of her father,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1329961/britney-spears-wants-father-jamie-out-as-sole-conservator/\">Jamie Spears</a>, indefinitely, according to documents obtained by&#160;<a href=\"https://variety.com/2020/biz/news/britney-spears-conservatorship-extended-1234743380/\">Variety</a>.&#160;</p>\n<p>Despite&#160;<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/britney-spears/\">Britney</a>&#160;filing a request last week asking for <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1330297/britney-spears-does-not-want-to-perform-live/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">her dad to be removed from the conservatorship</a>, the extension remains until at least February 1, 2021.</p>\n<p>The outlet reported that the singer‚Äôs dad and mom, Lynne Spears &#8211; <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1290561/britney-spears-lawyers-dad-conservatorship/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">as well as four attorney‚Äôs</a> &#8211; all took part in the <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1189530/what-did-britney-spears-brother-bryan-say-freebritney/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">discussions during the hearing</a>.&#160;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489211\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/a892c987-1f9e-4799-a0a7-708580a798f0.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489211\" width=\"960\" height=\"685\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Fans were furious after the conservatorship was extended until &#8216;at least&#8217; February [/caption]</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col daughters  Princess and Amelia are begging for another sibling.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Peter, 47, and his wife, 31, are parents to Amelia, six, and Theo, three, while The Mysterious Girl singer also has son Junior, 15, and daughter Princess, 13, with ex-wife <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12425212/emily-andre-katie-price-texts-princess-junior/\">Katie Price</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure revealed she&#8217;s planning to expand her brood when her youngest son Theo begins school in September next year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And she&#8217;s got the backing of Pete&#8217;s two girls.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Emily wrote about her future with the star in her column for¬†<a href=\"https://www.ok.co.uk/celebrity-news/emily-peter-andre-baby-children-22570373\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">OK!</a>¬†magazine.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She penned: &#8220;Pete has said Princess really wants us to have another baby, and I think Millie (Amelia) would also say yes to another sibling, too.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;At the moment, I&#8217;m happy with the way things are and am in no rush for another baby.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption Gallagher","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000568598910-1.jpg?strip=all&w=767":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn9@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-41-47-864_dd72b19195030892.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602316411-2.jpg?strip=all&w=768":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn22@2020_2/2020/08/25/00-41-56-378_7318fcbdb3836aff.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000586944424.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn2@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-53-573_a499fff0b101641a.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600899575-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn84@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-42-03-526_c10a66db0e11893b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602302137.jpg?strip=all&w=684":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn66@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-50-868_5eae724f339fa435.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106299},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"American Idol‚Äôs Antonella Barba writing tell-all book from prison as she serves four-year sentence for selling drugs","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12490358/american-idol-antonella-barba-writing-tell-all-book-prison-drugs/","description":"<p><strong>AMERICAN Idol contestant Antonella Barba&#160;exclusively revealed to The Sun that she is writing a tell-all book from a jail cell while serving her prison sentence.&#160;</strong></p>\n<p>The 33-year-old singer was <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/82515/american-idols-antonella-barba-jailed-for-four-years-for-trafficking-enough-fentanyl-to-kill-400000-people/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">sentenced to four-years in November 2019</a> after she pleaded guilty to trafficking 830 grams of fentanyl during her role in a <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/virginia/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Virginia</a> drug operation.&#160;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490375\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 564px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603908046.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=554\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490375\" width=\"554\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images</figcredit></figure>The American Idol contestant is writing a tell-all book from prison [/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490376\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 461px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000469376998.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=451\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490376\" width=\"451\" height=\"562\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Norfolk Sheriff Deparment</figcredit></figure>Antonella is serving a four-year sentence for drug trafficking [/caption]</p>\n<p>The former reality star &#8211; who competed on season six of the hit show in 2007 &#8211; was arrested in October 2018 and pleaded guilty last July.&#160;</p>\n<p>In the months since she was sentenced in November, Antonella said she has worked on her novel that included her time on <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/american-idol/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">American Idol</a>.&#160;</p>\n<p>‚ÄúMy book focuses on my life experience and what I&#8217;ve learned&#8230;everything from my childhood, to my American Idol experience, to my arrest,‚Äù she told The Sun.&#160;</p>\n<p>She continued: ‚ÄúI have made some bad choices, but I came out better, healthier, and living a more stress-free lifestyle than before.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490377\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 910px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603908730.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=900\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490377\" width=\"900\" height=\"643\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>YouTube</figcredit></figure>Antonella competed on the sixth season of American Idol in 2007[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490378\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000469371218.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490378\" width=\"960\" height=\"502\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>YouTube</figcredit></figure>NINTCHDBPICT000469371218[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490379\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603911848.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490379\" width=\"960\" height=\"723\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Fox</figcredit></figure>The reality show contestant blamed the show in court documents for her change of behavior [/caption]</p>\n<p>‚ÄúI was so busy, caught up in the hustle and bustle of being successful, making money, the industry, that I got off course and wasn&#8217;t focusing on the right things anymore.‚Äù</p>\n<p>The performer added the tell-all will focus on the ‚Äúhard lessons‚Äù she‚Äôs learned along the way and how she is bringing herself to ‚Äúthe right frame of mind.‚Äù</p>\n<p>Though she does not go into further detail about what she will expose about the series, Antonella previously stated in the past that her time on Idol was part of the reason she ended up behind bars.&#160;</p>\n<p>Documents show that in court her legal team tried to attribute her criminal behavior to her time on American Idol, saying: &#8220;One of the common themes is that the American Idol experience brought about a detrimental change in Ms. Barba&#8217;s life.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490380\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 631px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603908047.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=621\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490380\" width=\"621\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images</figcredit></figure>Antonella said her book will cover her time on Idol and the lessons she&#8217;s learned along the way[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490381\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000469370808.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490381\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty - Contributor</figcredit></figure>The LA native said she is focusing on her career and is writing songs in jail[/caption]</p>\n<p>&#8220;Ms. Barba&#8217;s mother believes when American Idol happened and &#8216;the world intruded and interrupted her&#8230; dream of a career in architecture&#8217; that this is &#8216;where it all went wrong.&#8217;</p>\n<p>&#8220;Ms. Barba&#8217;s sudden move to Hollywood following American Idol &#8216;was a recipe for disaster&#8217; and when it came to pass that Ms. Barba was unable to &#8216;achieve the results she wanted, it was devastating to her.&#8217;‚Äù</p>\n<p>Her attorney‚Äôs also argued she had minimal knowledge of the operation, saying: &#8220;The extent of Ms. Barba&#8217;s involvement in this case is limited to delivering one shipment of drugs and that single instance forms the sum total of her relevant conduct.‚Äù</p>\n<p>Antonella is reported to have been arrested after police waiting outside a stash house spotted her sitting in a car on her own.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490382\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 969px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000542024658.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=959\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490382\" width=\"959\" height=\"959\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The 33-year-old auditioned for the series when she was 19-years-old in 2007[/caption]</p>\n<p>A search of the vehicle later uncovered 830 grams of fentanyl in a shoebox in the footwell in front of the passenger seat.</p>\n<p>Fentanyl is a drug intended for use as a painkiller, but is also used as a recreational drug &#8211; often mixed with heroin or cocaine.</p>\n<p>The Los Angeles native appeared on the sixth season of American Idol in 2007 &#8211; when she was 19-years-old &#8211; and made it to the Top 16.</p>\n<p>At the time, the <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1286624/kelly-clarkson-simon-cowell-americas-got-talent-judge-back-bike/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">original superstar trio of judges</a> &#8211; <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/simon-cowell/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Simon Cowell</a>, Paula Abdul and Randy Jackson &#8211; were still on the show.</p>\n<p>Antonella also told The Sun that she has since been ‚Äúfocusing on career plans.‚Äù</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12490383\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 689px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000469370950.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=679\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490383\" width=\"679\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>The singer admitted to having &#8220;nothing but time&#8221; to write new songs in prison [/caption]</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>‚ÄúI&#8217;ve written some of my best songs in prison.&#160;I can&#8217;t wait for them to be heard,‚Äù she said, adding: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve got nothing but time.‚Äù</p>\n<p>The reality show alum said she would not have been able to get through this trying time without her family.&#160;</p>\n<p>‚ÄúThey have stuck by me through everything and I&#8217;m in communication with them daily. &#160;</p>\n<p>‚ÄúI also have incredible friends, who have been there since day one,‚Äù she gushed.</p>\n<p>\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div wingsuit","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489784/daredevil-jumps-off-uk-mountain-wingsuit/","description":"<p><strong>DAREDEVIL Tim Howell leaps into the unknown as he becomes the first to jump off the top of a UK mountain in a wingsuit.</strong></p> \n<p>The ex-Royal Marine, 31, leapt from 4,000ft An Teallach in the north-west Highlands and glided down a gully for 30 seconds before deploying his parachute and landing.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489875\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603813062.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489875\" width=\"960\" top of a UK mountain in a wingsuit[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489888\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img Highlands, Scotland[/caption] \n<p>Tim said: ‚ÄúBefore the jump, I was just trying to calm my nerves.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI‚Äôm so happy it went smoothly. It‚Äôs one thing to pull something off but it‚Äôs another to pull it off with enough of a safe margin.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Wingsuits have fabric between the arms and legs to let wearers glide.</p> \n<p>The UK is challenging for wingsuit jumps because our mountains lack the altitude, vertical profile and safe landing spots needed to perform a safe jump.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div over 200 known to enthusiasts.</p> \n<p>Tim believes there will be other locations in the UK that are suitable for wingsuit base jumps ‚Äì but is not in a hurry to try them out.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúYes, there may be other locations, but they might be even more technical than this one though ‚Äì so I‚Äôm not rushing to do them,‚Äù he said.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489894\" class=\"wp-caption photo","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12488767/bloke-banned-tinder-catfishing-baby-yoda-photo/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>THERE&#8217;S a lot at stake when it comes to your online dating profile with nothing more than your profile pic and a couple of words determining the all important first impression. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But one bloke learnt the hard way that your choice of snap is everything after a harmless pic with Baby Yoda had him banned from Tinder. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488969\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 536px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603866159.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=526\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488969\" width=\"526\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>@carterhambley/Twitter</figcredit></figure>Carter Hambley had a snap of himself with Baby Yoda as his Tinder profile pic [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Carter Hambley, a comedian from Chicago, posted a seemingly innocent snap of himself with what looked to be the much-loved¬†Star Wars<em>¬†</em>character sitting on his lap.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Obvious to many, the little guy was craftily Photoshopped in &#8211; but is seems that was a deal breaker for some. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>When the 21-year-old matched with someone on the dating app, he was asked: &#8220;Where did you get that Yoda doll?&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Chuffed he may have found a fellow Star Wars fan he explained that it was Photoshopped and that it wasn&#8217;t actually a doll. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488980\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 610px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000548596938.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=600\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488980\" width=\"600\" height=\"200\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Disney</figcredit></figure>The fictional character is from the hit Sci-Fi franchise Star Wars[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Still confused, the woman hit back: &#8220;No not the photo. I mean the Yoda doll.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>To which Carter explained again that it wasn&#8217;t an actual doll, and took the chance to strike up a fun conversation. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;Yeah it&#8217;s not a doll, unfortunately! anyways! what kinda movies do you like, besides Star Wars, presumably <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f642.png\" alt=\"üôÇ\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> &#8220;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But clearly not a fan his humorous attempt at making conversation, the woman took offence to his use of Photoshop and called him out for &#8220;catfishing&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488970\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 334px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603866161.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=324\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488970\" width=\"324\" height=\"680\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>@carterhambley/Twitter</figcredit></figure>The girl he matched with wasn&#8217;t too pleased about his use of Photoshop[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>She wrote: &#8220;So you just&#8230; put a fake image on your profile? That&#8217;s literally the definition of catfishing.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;You&#8217;re a liar and a sneak and i&#8217;m reporting you. Not letting you fool anyone else with your little tricks.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And it seems she had every intention of doing just that as the unlucky in love bloke had his dating profile blocked &#8211; perhaps she REALLY wanted to meet Baby Yoda? </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Posting screengrabs of the chat on Twitter, Carter wrote: &#8220;God I hate this app.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488981\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 410px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603866157.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=400\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488981\" width=\"400\" height=\"400\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>@carterhambley/Twitter</figcredit></figure>Carter was left shocked and confused after his Tinder profile got blocked[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489077\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 389px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603866156.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=379\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489077\" width=\"379\" height=\"680\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>@carterhambley/Twitter</figcredit></figure>His account had been reported and blocked[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Many flocked to the comments to share their own similar experiences, with many admitting to giving up on online dating altogether. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>One unlucky bachelor commented: &#8220;It&#8217;s just impossible to date nowadays. After 5 terrible years attempting to use Tinder and other apps&#8230; I&#8217;m now preparing to hire a surrogate to carry my child.&#8221; </p>\n\n\n\n<p>And another person wrote: &#8220;Wow, they did NOT realise that the image was a real image Photoshopped to have a fake image on it&#8230; Sometimes I wish bad things, but I honestly hope that person runs out of their favourite food items and the means to make their favourite foods.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>While a third asked: &#8220;My question is, why did he get banned if he didn&#8217;t break any rules? There&#8217;s no way in f**king hell that is catfishing.&#8221; </p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Council fines kind-hearted nurse ¬£150 for leaving free apples outside her home for passers-by","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489173/council-fine-nurse-150-pounds-apples-outside-home/","description":"<p><strong>A CARING nurse who left boxes of apples outside her home for passers-by to eat was fined ¬£150 by council jobsworths for ‚Äúfly tipping‚Äù.</strong></p> \n<p>Lydia Farrell, 33, piled the fruit from a tree in her garden against a wall with a sign saying ‚Äúfree eating apples‚Äù.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489260\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 392px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/f74b2d85-64d4-4b1e-b759-54d105f0d7b7.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=382\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489260\" width=\"382\" height=\"700\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Lydia Farrell, 33, was fined ¬£150 for fly-tipping\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489200\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 550px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603828656.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=540\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489200\" width=\"540\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  A nurse was fined for leaving ‚Äòfree eating apples‚Äô outside her home\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>But she was stunned when she received a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/motors/3575740/difference-private-parking-ticket-penalty-charge-notice-how-to-challenge/\">fine notice</a> accusing her of littering. She was ordered to pay the sum or face court.</p> \n<p>Shocked Lydia, who lives with her partner, said: ‚ÄúThe apples have been dropping on to our decking where they rot away.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúWe got the idea of picking them from the tree and putting them outside for people to take.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThen I received a ¬£150 fine through my letterbox.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Lydia, of Ealing, West London, added: ‚ÄúI just felt it was quite sad that the council would fine me for doing a good deed.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Ealing Council was inundated with furious complaints from locals after Lydia revealed what had happened on Facebook.</p> \n<div class=\"article-boxout\"> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\"> \n  <h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">The Sun Says</h3> \n </div> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\"> \n  <p class=\"article__content--intro\"> THEY say no good deed goes unpunished. </p> \n  <div> \n   <p>That‚Äôs especially so when councils employ jobsworths who revel in their power to dish out fines.</p> \n   <p>Imagine seeing thoughtful nurse Lydia Farrell giving away apples, then deciding she was littering.&nbsp;</p> \n   <p>Real fly-tipping soared during lockdown. There are plenty of genuine offenders officials could target.</p> \n   <p><strong>But it‚Äôs always the low-hanging fruit.</strong></p> \n  </div> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n  <div class=\"col sun-col-6\"> \n   <div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\"> \n    <div class=\"swiper-container\"> \n     <div class=\"rail__header\"> \n      <h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in UK slams 'racist' cyclist who accuses him of stealing from his OWN car </span> \n       </div>\n       <!-- .rail__item-content --> \n       <div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\"> \n       </div> \n
