U-15, U-17 and U-18 level, he now looks set to become a fixture in the senior squad after just four appearances for the U-21s.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As the adage goes, If you are good enough, you are old enough. And Greenwood certainly seems that.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dig out the bunting, the nation might end up actually being thankful that Euro 2020 was delayed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><em>Watch the return of the Premier League live on BT Sport. -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 21:30:00 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603843771.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"22a00e3533b3ea61be85735b372ee619","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn69@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-47-865_ae75fb46981db1eb.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":65538,"destBytes":65538,"author":"Etienne Fermie","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603843771.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn69@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-47-865_ae75fb46981db1eb.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602676400.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn76@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-42-02-557_b45fba9cc2a3004a.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000475929716.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn77@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-57-946_65aad114d363aabc.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106288},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Teabag in shoes & hairspray for stains ‚Äî 20 ways to keep your kid‚Äôs kit tidy","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12490093/parents-20-hacks-children-clean-tidy-term/","description":"<p>NEW uniforms, stationery, bags and shoes‚Äâ‚Äì preparing for the return to school can be costly and time-consuming.</p> \n<p>Keeping kit clean and in one piece is then the next challenge.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490043\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294149.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294149.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12490043\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Here are 20 hacks to keep your tots staying clean and tidy all term long\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Shutterstock\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Fortunately, parents are sharing their tried-and-tested tips online to make life easier.</p> \n<p>Here, Rebecca Pascoe and Abby McHale pick out 20 of the best suggestions‚Äâ.‚Äâ.‚Äâ.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490067\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294219.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294219.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12490067\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Use baking soda to clean Tupperware ‚Äì it‚Äôll remove all yellow stains from plastic lunchboxes\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Shutterstock\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p><strong>1) REMOVE PEN STAINS WITH HAIRSPRAY</strong>: Spray a generous amount on to the ink then rub it with a damp cloth until it disappears. Or dab the stain with milk, let it soak for a few hours and put in the washing machine as normal.</p> \n<p><strong>2) DYE FADED UNIFORMS</strong>: Refresh clothes with inexpensive dyes in your washing machine. Cotton and nylon show the best results, whereas polyester and acetate are more difficult to colour.</p> \n<p><strong>3) CLEAN TUPPERWARE WITH BAKING SODA</strong>: This magical household essential removes yellow stains from <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/food/8720946/lunchbox-plastic-stains-minutes-cleaning-hack/\">plastic lunchboxes</a>.</p> \n<p>Add water to make a thick paste and rub it into the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12268637/clean-tupperware-stains-under-a-minute-no-scrubbing/\">Tupperware</a>, leave overnight, then rinse.</p> \n<p><strong>4) FRESHEN SMELLY BOOTS WITH</strong> <strong>TEABAGS</strong>: Place a dry teabag into shoes then leave them in a warm place overnight.</p> \n<p>Put one at the bottom of a school bag to absorb any odours. Change weekly. Or try cleaning the bag with a mix of baking soda, vinegar and water.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490039\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294185.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294185.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12490039\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Help your tot put their shoes on the correct feet all by taking a large sticker of their favourite character, and placing one part on each shoe\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Shutterstock\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p><strong>5) TRACE AROUND KIDS‚Äô FEET TO MEASURE FOR NEW SHOES:</strong> You can then take the drawings with you to the shoe shop to get the right pair ‚Äì and may not even need your child with you.</p> \n<p><strong>6) USE VELCRO TO TEMPORARILY REPAIR A DROPPED HEM:</strong> If you are in a rush, use double-sided sticky <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sun-selects/11499012/best-reusable-cable-ties/\">velcro pads</a> to hold the hem in place until you have time to repair it fully.</p> \n<p><strong>7) FREEZE AWAY CHEWING GUM: </strong>It‚Äôs always a whole lot easier to remove gum from uniforms when it has set hard so you are best to put the item of clothing into the freezer in a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12419935/morrisons-ditches-plastic-bags-for-life/\">plastic bag</a>, or apply ice cubes to the gum. Then you can chip it off.</p> \n<p><strong>8) SHINE SHOES WITH VASELINE:</strong> Apply the vaseline with a cloth, over the front of the shoes, the night before your little one heads out to school. ou can also paint patent shoes with clear nail varnish to prevent scuffs and scrapes.</p> \n<p><strong>9) USE TOOTHPASTE TO REMOVE SCUFF MARKS:</strong> For <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/10612256/dirty-clean-white-trainers-spray-elbow-grease/\">white trainers</a>, rub some white, non-gel toothpaste into the marks using an old toothbrush, then wipe with a damp cloth and leave to sit in the sunlight.</p> \n<p>For black shoes, raid your kids‚Äô craft box and find a crayon to match the shoes ‚Äì then just draw over the marks before carefully dabbing away excess crayon with a tissue.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490040\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294211.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294211.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12490040\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Cover your child‚Äôs head with a thick coat of conditioner, mixed with around ten drops of tea-tree oil ‚Äì then comb out the pesky lice and nits\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Shutterstock\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p><strong>10) MAKE AN ICE PACK WITH A SPONGE:</strong> Soak a clean sponge in water, then pop it in the freezer overnight. In the morning, put it into your child‚Äôs lunchbox. When it starts to defrost, the sponge will retain the water.</p> \n<p><strong>11) WEAR IN NEW SHOES IN WITH HAIRDRYER:</strong> To help stretch the shoes, get your child to put them on while wearing a pair of thick socks, then gently heat them with a hairdryer as your child wiggles their feet and toes.</p> \n<p>Make sure the shoes have cooled down before your child removes them.</p> \n<p><strong>12) TREAT LICE WITH TEA-TREE OIL:</strong> Cover your child‚Äôs head with a thick coat of conditioner, mixed with around ten drops of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/9803635/women-tea-tree-oil-vaginas-banish-smells/\">tea-tree oil</a>. Leave on for 20 minutes, then comb out the lice and nits.</p> \n<p><strong>13) REMOVE GRASS STAINS WITH VINEGAR:</strong> Apply a paste of baking soda and water to the stains, then scrub with a brush dipped in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11365458/paul-ogrady-coronavirus-vinegar/\">vinegar</a>. The products will fizz and the bubbles should tackle the stain.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490041\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294024.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603294024.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12490041\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Buy trousers and skirts longer than your children need and hem them yourself\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Shutterstock\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p><strong>14) BAKING SODA CAN BRIGHTEN WHITES:</strong> Give shirts a new lease of life by soaking in soda crystals and hanging them to dry in sunlight. Or pop a dishwasher tablet in with the dirty white shirts on a hot wash and they‚Äôll come out stain-free.</p> \n<p>For really pesky stains, crumble a dishwasher tablet in hot water with the clothing for an hour then put into the washing machine.</p> \n<p><strong>15) SEPARATE CLOTHES FOR EACH DAY:</strong> Use hanging storage compartments to organise all the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12349319/poundland-enters-school-uniform-price-war-with-clothing-from-1/\">uniform</a> and sports kit your children will need for the week. The dividers will help you get at what you need quickly and easily.</p> \n<p><strong>16) NAIL VARNISH STOPS BUTTONS PINGING OFF:</strong> Put away your sewing kit and instead dab clear nail varnish over the front of the buttons to strengthen the thread. Let the varnish harden overnight.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490037\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603296044.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603296044.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12490037\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  You can remove stains with hairspray by spraying a generous amount on to the ink then rubbing it in with a damp cloth until it disappears\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Alamy\n </figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p><strong>17)&nbsp; WRITE INITIALS ON CLOTHES‚Äô LABELS, USING A SHARPIE:</strong> Or just tie a recognisable piece of material or ribbon to the hanging hoop on the item of clothing.</p> \n<p><strong>18) WRAP BOOKS TO PROTECT THEM:</strong> Use old wrapping paper to cover books and prevent them from getting damaged. The books will last longer, and making them identifiable could also stop them from getting lost.</p> \n<p><strong>19) BUY OVERSIZED UNIFORMS AND HEM UP</strong>: Buy trousers and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sun-selects/12107318/best-maxi-skirts/\">skirts</a> longer than your children need and hem them yourself.</p> \n<p>It‚Äôs not at all as tricky as it may sound ‚Äì hemming tape helps ‚Äì and the trousers and skirts can be let down when a child has a growth spurt.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n  <div class=\"col sun-col-6\"> \n   <div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-fabulous\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\"> \n    <div .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p><strong>20) STICKERS TO IDENTIFY LEFT AND RIGHT SHOE:</strong> Help your child to put their shoes on the correct feet all by themselves by taking a large sticker of their favourite TV or book character, cutting it in half and placing one part on each shoe.</p> \n<p>When the shoes are the right way round, the sticker will look whole.</p> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div match","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12487026/liverpool-salzburg-lives-stream-tv-channel-kick-off-time-team-news-friendly/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>LIVERPOOL head to Salzburg as they continue their pre-season tour in Austria.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Reds will want to continue in the vein of form that saw them sweep comfortably past VfB Stuttgart with a 3-0 victory.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12487612\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598455013.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" Association</figcredit></figure>Liverpool have been in good form in Austria[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The encounter with Salzburg may only be friendly in name as both sides were crowned champions in their respective leagues.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This will definitely up the ante between the two who will surely want bragging rights in saying who is the better champion out of the teams.</p>\n\n\n\n<p> Liverpool have also got other worries going into the match as it has been confirmed that the champions have had a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12432600/liverpool-coronavirus-positive-test-pre-season/\">positive coronavirus test whilst in Austria</a>, although it hasn&#8217;t been said if it&#8217;s a team player, or member of staff who has been struck with the deadly virus.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>When <strong>is Liverpool vs Salzburg?</strong></h2>\n\n\n\n<ul><li>The pre-season friendly will take place on Tuesday August 25, 2020.</li><li>The Reds will play Salzburg at the Red Bull Arena, Salzburg&#8217;s home stadium.</li><li>Coverage for the  match will begin at 2.30pm, and kick-off will be at 3.00pm BST.</li></ul>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12487636\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598027043.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12487636\" width=\"960\" height=\"670\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>It&#8217;ll be the clash of the champions when the two clubs meet[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>What channel will it be shown on and can I live stream?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>To watch the match you&#8217;ll have to subscribe to <a href=\"https://www.liverpoolfc.com/lfctv\">LFC TV</a>, Liverpool&#8217;s own channel, where you&#8217;ll be able to enjoy live coverage.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Subscription to the channel costs ¬£7, and is available on both Sky and Virgin.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Subscribers can also watch the game on the move via the LFC TV GO app, which is compatible with most smart devices.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div Lawrence","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598455013.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn73@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-48-501_a015d95b629da49b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598027043.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn31@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-42-01-184_87177ecae1ffa4c3.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106189},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"‚ÄòClaw hammer killer‚Äô who dismembered girl ‚Äòsuffered the most excruciating feelings known to man‚Äô during execution","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489349/claw-hammer-killer-wesley-ira-purkey-excruciating-execution/","description":"<p>A CHILD killer who raped and dismembered a girl with a chainsaw suffered an &#8220;excruciating&#8221; death when he was executed, according to new court filings.</p>\n<p>Wesley Ira Purkey was put to death by an injection of pentobarbital in Terre Haute federal penitentiary, Indiana, last month.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489346\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000595684928-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489346\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Wesley Purkey was executed last month[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12131816\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 219px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/07/FE-Jennifer-Long-149513043_1437347065-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=209\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12131816\" width=\"209\" height=\"240\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">After raping 16-year-old Jennifer Long, Purkey murdered, dismembered, and dumped her remains</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>An autopsy performed on Purkey, revealed he suffered ‚Äúsevere bilateral acute pulmonary oedema‚Äù and ‚Äúfrothy pulmonary oedema in the trachea and main stem bronchi‚Äù, according to new documents lodged by lawyers representing death row inmate Keith Nelson, who is scheduled to be executed on Friday.</p>\n<p>Those findings mean fluid quickly filled Purkey‚Äôs lungs and entered his airway up to his trachea, causing ‚Äúa near-drowning‚Äù sensation and ‚Äúextreme pain, terror and panic&#8221;, said Gail Van Norman, a medical expert retained by Nelson‚Äôs lawyers to interpret the autopsy.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúThese are among the most excruciating feelings known to man,‚Äù she said in a filing obtained by The Sun.</p>\n<p>According to Dr Van Norman, flash pulmonary edema, where fluid enters the lungs and airways, can only occur when someone is alive.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúIt is a virtual medical certainty, that most, if not all, prisoners will experience excruciating suffering, including sensations of drowning and suffocation‚Äù from pentobarbital, she added.</p>\n<p>Dr Van Norman said the report indicated that &#8220;Purkey‚Äôs lungs filled with fluid and that he suffered excruciating air hunger while still alive&#8221;, the documents allege.</p>\n<p>The unofficial autopsy was performed by a Western Michigan University pathologist, Dr Joyce L. deJong, at the request of Purkey relatives.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12105767\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 963px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/07/jd_gurney__2_jpg-JS535954774-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=953\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12105767\" width=\"953\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The State of Texas adopted lethal injection as a means of execution in 1977.  Picture: Andrew Lichtenstein/Corbis via Getty Images.</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Purkey was sentenced to death in January 2004 after he was convicted in federal court for the interstate kidnapping, raping and killing of 16-year-old Jennifer Long in 1998.  He dismembered her body with a chainsaw then dumped it in a septic pond after luring the teen into his car outside a grocery store.</p>\n<p>Nine months later, in October 1998, Purkey beat an 80-year-old polio sufferer to death with a claw hammer, earning himself the &#8220;claw hammer killer&#8221; moniker.</p>\n<p>Purkey had been working for a plumbing company and had gone to the home of Mary Ruth Bales to fix a kitchen tap.</p>\n<p>Neighbors saw him trying to burn the woman‚Äôs body and he was arrested.</p>\n<p>Purkey pleaded guilty to Ms Bale‚Äôs murder and was sentenced to life in prison where, years later, he confessed to murdering Ms Long and was given the death penalty.</p>\n<p>The killer made a final statement shortly before his death: &#8220;I deeply regret the pain and suffering I caused to Jennifer&#8217;s family,&#8221; he said.</p>\n<p>&#8220;I am deeply sorry. I deeply regret the pain I caused to my daughter, who I love so very much.</p>\n<p>&#8220;This sanitized murder really does not serve no purpose whatsoever.&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489347\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 325px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/8d46e03e-b973-441b-b5ee-80d814fb06fe.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=315\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489347\" width=\"315\" height=\"352\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Keith Nelson doesn&#8217;t want to be executed by lethal injection</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489348\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 322px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/db161f07-676e-4204-9ae2-7c3ac29bf6c1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=312\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489348\" width=\"312\" height=\"358\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Pamela Butler was raped and murdered by Nelson</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>This month‚Äôs filings were part of motions to halt the execution of Keith Nelson, convicted in the 1999 rape and strangulation of 10-year-old Pamela Butler. Prosecutors said he pulled her into his truck as she skated on rollerblades back to her Kansas home after buying some cookies.</p>\n<p>Nelson‚Äôs execution is scheduled for August 28. The execution of Lezmond Mitchell, the only Native American on federal death row, is set for August 26. His lawyers have made similar arguments.</p>\n<p>The American Civil Liberties Union called the recent re-start of federal executions &#8220;a truly dark period for our country,&#8221; and criticized the federal government for executing Purkey.</p>\n<p>&#8220;There was no reason for this administration to restart federal executions now &#8212; after a nearly two-decade hiatus, during the worst public health crisis of our lifetime &#8212; except to distract from its mainly failings, particularly its failure to keep people safe during this pandemic,&#8221; Cassandra Stubbs, director of the ACLU&#8217;s Capital Punishment Project said.</p>\n<p>Department of Justice spokesperson Kerri Kupec defended the administration&#8217;s resumption of the federal death penalty, saying: &#8220;After many years of litigation following the death of his victims, in which he lived and was afforded every due process of law under our Constitution, Purkey has finally faced justice.&#8221;</p>\n<p>&#8220;The death penalty has been upheld by the federal courts, supported on a bipartisan basis by Congress, and approved by Attorneys General under both Democratic and Republican administrations as the appropriate sentence for the most egregious federal crimes,&#8221; Kupec said.</p>\n<p>Previous court rulings have concluded pentobarbital injections are humane.</p>\n<p>And even if some pain is involved, that doesn‚Äôt render an execution method inhumane, government attorneys argued, citing a 2008 Supreme Court ruling.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúSimply because an execution method may result in pain, either by accident or as an inescapable consequence of death, does not establish the sort of ‚Äòobjectively intolerable risk of harm‚Äô that qualifies as cruel and unusual,‚Äù the high court said.</p>\n<p>\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; But legal precedent requires, when arguing one form of execution is cruel, that they offer what they believe are more humane alternatives.</p>\n<p>Among those they suggested: a firing squad.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúHistorically, the firing squad has resulted in significantly fewer ‚Äòbotched‚Äô executions,‚Äù they say in one filing. </p>\n<p>‚ÄúExecution by firing squad is both swift and virtually painless.‚Äù</p>\n<p>Purkey‚Äôs execution was carried out two days after the US government conducted its first federal execution in 17 years, also at Terre Haute, of white supremacist Daniel Lewis Lee.</p>\n<p>Lee was convicted of killing an Arkansas family in a 1990s plot to build a whites-only America.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 20:57:57 jackpot","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12488642/national-lottery-monday-august-24/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>THE National Lottery Set For Life numbers are in and it&#8217;s time to find out if you&#8217;ve won the top prize of ¬£10,000 every month for 30 years.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Could tonight&#8217;s jackpot see you start ticking off that bucket list every month or building your own start-up as a budding entrepreneur?</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_8665672\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/as-graphic-lotto-teaser.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-8665672\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Can you imagine what you could enjoy if you had ¬£10,000 every month for 30 years?</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>You can find out by checking your ticket against tonight&#8217;s numbers below.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Good luck!</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Tonight‚Äôs¬†<strong>National Lottery Set For Life</strong> winning numbers are:<strong> 10, 24, 25, 41, 42 and the Life Ball is 06</strong>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Monday 18 March 2019 saw the inaugural draw of Camelot‚Äôs newest National Lottery game.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The jackpot is an annuity-style prize ‚Äî a guaranteed &#8216;fat salary&#8217; of ¬£10,000 every month for 30 years.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>While the way the top prize is paid out is new to National Lottery players, the way to play Set For Life is straightforward.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div year* if you get all the main numbers and not the ‚ÄòLife Ball‚Äô, to ¬£5 for matching just two main numbers.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Set For Life game costs ¬£1.50 per line and will be drawn every Monday and Thursday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><em>*Subject to prize capping &#8211; more information about prize capping will be available in the Set For Life Games Procedures.</em></p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 19:49:43 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/as-graphic-lotto-teaser.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"ccfce4ff8207a6fda7b43b65e42f0098","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn41@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-41-46-619_2c106527817aa819.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":144460,"destBytes":144460,"author":"Sean Gallen","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/as-graphic-lotto-teaser.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn41@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-41-46-619_2c106527817aa819.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106300},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"From light fittings to climbing plants ‚Äî tips on turning your humble bookcase into statement shelves","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12489928/turning-humble-bookcase-statement-shelves/","description":"<p><strong>THE humble bookcase is having a moment, now that more of us are on video calls ‚Äì and our shelves of books and ornaments are there for all the world to inspect or admire.</strong></p> \n<p>Turn on the TV and there is bound to be a celebrity, policitian or reporter showing off what a reader they are or what amazing artistic taste they possess.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490020\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603288096.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490020\" width=\"960\" height=\"548\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Actress Cate Blanchett showed off her book shelves on The Late Show\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490021\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603285802.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490021\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  BARACK OBAMA\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Barack Obama is another star who has statement shelves in his home[/caption] \n<p>From the actress <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/5398966/cate-blanchett-husband-andrew-upton/\">Cate Blanchett </a>and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/rishi-sunak/\">Chancellor Rishi Sunak</a>, to the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/camilla-parker-bowles/\">Duchess of Cornwall</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/barack-obama/\">Barack Obama</a>, everyone is at it.</p> \n<p>Here, interior designer Faye Robinson-Hey gives her tips on how to create your own statement shelves.</p> \n<h3><strong>SLIDING DOORS</strong></h3> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490009\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 410px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603284758.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=400\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490009\" width=\"400\" height=\"400\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Barn door-style fixings can be simply attached to existing bookcases\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Add a simple sliding door or a pair of drawers for a design edge and to house a television or hide clutter.</p> \n<p>Barn door-style fixings mean you can simply fix to the front of an existing bookcase frame and the door slides along. Add a pop of colour or beautiful handles.</p> \n<ul>\n <li><strong>Sliding door fixture, ¬£79.95 from <a href=\"https://www.ironmongerydirect.co.uk/\">ironmongerydirect.co.uk</a></strong></li>\n</ul> \n<h3>PAINT JOB</h3> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490017\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603284759.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490017\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Transform your bookcase with a lick of paint\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Give your tired old bookcase a lick of paint to transform it.</p> \n<p>Go for a dark, dramatic, inky colour to really make the books stand out, a pretty pop of colour to make a statement or a neutral grey for a smart, contemporary look.</p> \n<ul>\n <li><strong>Paint, ¬£21.95 from <a href=\"https://www.anniesloan.com/\">anniesloan.com</a></strong></li>\n</ul> \n<h3>PAPER BACKS</h3> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490013\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 590px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603284760.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=580\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490013\" width=\"580\" height=\"580\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Go to town on the design\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Add self-adhesive stick-on wallpaper to the back of the shelves.</p> \n<p>Go to town on the design, with large-scale mono-chrome or a floral pattern. Or add gold leaf to the back of the bookcase.</p> \n<p>Simply apply adhesive to the bookcase back panel, add mock gold leaf which can be bought from eBay for around ¬£5 for 100 sheets, then dust off any excess and apply varnish to finish.</p> \n<ul>\n <li><strong>Self-adhesive wallpaper, ¬£24 from <a href=\"https://www.dunelm.com/\">Dunelm</a></strong></li>\n</ul> \n<h3>LIGHT IT UP</h3> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490016\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603284757.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490016\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Small LED spotlights can help to illuminate your shelves\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Adding wall-mounted light fittings to the frame can give an expensive look for less.</p> \n<p>Go for contemporary black or stylish brass.</p> \n<p>Alternatively, you can add LED tapelight to the underside of the shelves, or small LED spotlights, to illuminate your shelves.</p> \n<p>But always use a qualified electrician.</p> \n<ul>\n <li><strong>Omlopp LED spotlight, ¬£10 from <a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/gb/en/\">Ikea</a></strong></li>\n</ul> \n<h3>LOSE THE BOOKS</h3> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490014\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 710px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603285082.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=700\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490014\" width=\"700\" height=\"700\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Add pictures and mirrors to keep your shelves exciting\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>The shelves don‚Äôt have to be just for your books. Mount artwork or mirrors to the front of the book-case to make a quirky design statement.</p> \n<p>Head to <a href=\"https://desenio.co.uk/\">desenio.co.uk </a>for a wide range of affordable prints.</p> \n<h3>BOX AWAY</h3> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490015\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 375px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603284754.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=365\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490015\" width=\"365\" height=\"400\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Stacked baskets are great for storage\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>For an inexpensive and stylish storage solution, use stacked boxes, or woven or fabric baskets on shelves.</p> \n<ul>\n <li><strong>Byholma basket, ¬£6 from<a href=\"https://www.ikea.com/gb/en/\"> Ikea</a></strong></li>\n</ul> \n<h3>LEAF THROUGH</h3> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12490010\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 760px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603284755.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=750\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490010\" width=\"750\" height=\"440\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Hanging plants can help to break up rows of books\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Dress any gaps with climbing plants which will cascade down.</p> \n<p>Add faux foliage with pretty florals to the top of your bookcase and drape it down the sides for a relaxed country vibe.</p> \n<ul>\n <li><strong>Artificial trailing plant, ¬£8 from <a href=\"https://www.argos.co.uk/\">Argos</a></strong></li>\n</ul> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div &#8211; forcing her to reevaluate her life, revealed actress Luisa Bradshaw-White.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Luisa shared what her Walford alter-ego had been up to during tonight&#8217;s episode of Secrets From The Square, which also featured Linda Henry who plays her onscreen sister Shirley.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488880\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img Dooley, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11620834/inside-eastenders-star-luisa-bradshaw-whites-colourful-home/\">Luisa </a>explained that when <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/eastenders/\">EastEnders </a>returns to our screens next month fans will discover that Tina fell ill with the deadly disease.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She shared: &#8220;Tina got <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">coronavirus </a>and was living with Ash and Iqra.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Tina comes out really wanting a relationship and love, so we start really from there with Tina.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, Shirley is set for an emotional time as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10574406/eastenders-shirley-carter-two-roles-linda-henry/\">Linda </a>teased an &#8220;exciting&#8221; storyline for her character.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488878\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000551834643.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" back to bite Shirley on the bum.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Luisa added: &#8220;It&#8217;s a really exciting storyline, she [Linda] cried!&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Addressing her co-star directly she continued: &#8220;Because you do cry.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;She gets really emotional.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488912\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img how emotional Linda really is &#8211; making her world&#8217;s apart from her hardfaced character.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The star broke down in tears at the beginning of tonight&#8217;s special as she reflected on missing her grandson in lockdown.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She also repeatedly choked up throughout the interview with Stacey, and viewers flocked to Twitter to share their reaction to the sensitive right-back","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488701/arsenal-star-hector-bellerin-offered-to-psg-as-beaten-finalists-chase-right-back/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>HECTOR BELLERIN has been offered to Paris Saint-Germain, according to reports.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The beaten Champions League finalists are on the hunt for a new right-back.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12488873\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/cf7f4587-a532-4b87-aba9-5dc6403b09a8.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488873\" width=\"960\" height=\"626\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Arsenal vice-captain Hector Bellerin is reportedly a summer transfer target for Paris Saint-Germain[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Thilo Kehrer played the position in the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12479502/psg-bayern-coman-champions-league-neymar/\">defeat to Bayern Munich in Lisbon</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Thomas Meunier left as a free agent upon the end of his contract in June before <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/11954473/thomas-meunier-borussia-dortmund-free-transfer-four-year-deal/\">joining Borussia Dortmund</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1250213/paris-saint-germain/\">PSG</a> boss Thomas Tuchel does have France Under-21 international Colin Dagba in his squad. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, according to <a href=\"https://rmcsport.bfmtv.com/football/mercato-en-direct-les-infos-et-rumeurs-du-lundi-24-aout-4641.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">RMC Sport</a>, Arsenal star <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/hector-bellerin/\">Bellerin</a> is one name on the Ligue 1 champions&#8217; radar.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Spanish defender, 25, joined <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196653/arsenal/\">Arsenal</a> from the Barcelona academy in 2011, and has gone on to make 204 appearances in all competitions.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But he has endured a difficult time in recent seasons with lengthy injury lay-offs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12065419/arsenal-transfer-news-bellerin-sevilla-juventus-inter-milan/\">Bellerin was also linked with Atletico Madrid, Juventus, Sevilla, Inter Milan and Bayern Munich</a> this summer &#8211; although the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12105499/arsenal-bellerin-desperate-transfer-bayern-munich/\">Germans reportedly snubbed him over concerns about his defensive qualities</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the Arsenal vice-captain &#8211; under contract until 2023 &#8211; is Mikel Arteta&#8217;s first-choice right-back, in both a back four and a back five.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12116744/arsenal-transfer-news-live-willian-aubameyang-partey/\"><strong>ARSENAL NEWS LIVE: Click here for the latest Gunners news</strong></a></h3>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>So it is unlikely the Gunners boss would be willing to let Bellerin go, especially with only Cedric Soares the only direct replacement.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Ainsley Maitland-Niles previously filled in at right-back but will leave the Emirates in the current transfer window, with Wolves closing in on a deal</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, Arsenal hero <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12464849/arsenal-transfer-hector-bellerin-charlie-nicholas/\">Charlie Nicholas believes his former side should consider flogging Bellerin</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Raheem Sterling hit with Covid scare after partying with Usain Bolt before sprinter ‚Äòtested positive‚Äô","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12489286/raheem-sterling-covid-usain-bolt/","description":"<p><strong>RAHEEM Sterling is at the centre of a coronavirus scare after partying with Usain Bolt ‚Äî just before the sprinter allegedly tested positive.</strong></p> \n<p>Manchester City star <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/raheem-sterling/\">Sterling, 25 </a>‚Äî due to be named today in the England squad to face Iceland on September 5 ‚Äî was pictured at Bolt‚Äôs 34th birthday celebrations in Jamaica on Friday.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489445\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 343px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603883994-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=333\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489445\" width=\"333\" height=\"284\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Raheem Sterling has been hit with a Covid scare after partying with Usain Bolt\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489459\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 648px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603870590-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=638\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489459\" width=\"638\" height=\"888\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Videos from the party showed guests dancing close together without masks and ignoring social distancing\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Videos from the party showed guests dancing close together without masks and ignoring social distancing.</p> \n<p>A Jamaica radio station claimed today that<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/usain-bolt/\"> Olympic legend Bolt</a> had tested positive for Covid-19.</p> \n<p>Hours later he posted a video on social media to say he was self-isolating after taking a test, although he did not confirm the positive result.</p> \n<p>A source close to Sterling said: ‚ÄúRaheem feels fine and is showing no <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">Covid-19</a> symptoms.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúBut he‚Äôs in close contact with medical experts from both <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196654/manchester-city/\">Manchester City</a> and England.‚Äù</p> \n<h2>NIGHTMARE</h2> \n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12489159/england-squad-covid-19-crisis/\">virus scare is a nightmare </a>for England manager <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/gareth-southgate/\">Gareth Southgate</a>.</p> \n<p>He will today name forward Sterling in the squad for the Nations League game in Iceland ‚Äî and a second in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/denmark/\">Denmark</a> three days later.</p> \n<p>But Sterling will have to pass a Covid-19 test before he is allowed to join up with the other players. The 25-man squad is due to meet up from Sunday before going into a protective ‚Äúbubble‚Äù for the games.</p> \n<p>A source said: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a real headache for Gareth. Raheem‚Äôs a key player but he‚Äôs now relying on medical experts to ensure there‚Äôs a safe way for him to join the squad.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489450\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603874849-2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489450\" width=\"640\" height=\"480\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Olympic legend Bolt has reportedly tested positive for Covid-19\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489551\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 520px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/e62154dd-2ac5-4607-81c8-ef146f17a5b3.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=510\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489551\" width=\"510\" height=\"565\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Bolt is seen singing along to Adele tunes and dancing enthusiastically next to guests\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489552\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 555px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/acd22168-9bbc-470d-b7aa-a8f58e1a2ace.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=545\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489552\" width=\"545\" height=\"899\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Bolt was given the surprise birthday party by his girlfriend, model Kasi Bennett\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>‚ÄúHe‚Äôll be tested as quickly as possible but everyone knows it can take 14 days for symptoms to develop. The squad meets up in less than a week.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Sterling, who was born in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/jamaica/\">Jamaica</a>, flew out to his home there after City lost the Champions League quarter-final. He spends each summer on the island seeing friends and family.</p> \n<p>Bolt was given the surprise birthday party by his girlfriend, model Kasi Bennett.</p> \n<p>Other famous guests included Bayer Leverkusen attacker Leon Bailey, 23, and West Indies cricket star Chris Gayle, 40.</p> \n<h2>‚ÄòI‚ÄôM TRYING TO BE RESPONSIBLE‚Äô</h2> \n<p>Videos show guests holding drinks and partying without masks or social distancing. Jamaica has urged islanders to restrict gatherings to 20 people.<br>Bolt is seen singing along to Adele tunes and dancing enthusiastically next to guests.</br></p> \n<p>Sterling, in T-shirt and shorts, is seen clutching a bottle as he is embraced by one partygoer.</p> \n<p>Eight-time Olympic gold medallist Bolt today said he was self-isolating after taking a test because he had to go abroad.</p> \n<p>He added: ‚ÄúI saw that social media saying I‚Äôm confirmed to have Covid-19.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div I‚Äôm trying to be responsible so I am going to stay in and stay here.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI‚Äôm having no symptoms so I‚Äôm going to quarantine myself and wait on the confirmation to see what is the protocol.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Jamaica has had 1,529 coronavirus cases and 16 deaths. But after just 174 cases in July, there have been 267 in the past four days.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489583\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/7a3ed24c-015e-41fb-9e78-02a721ff7b3f.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489583\" width=\"960\" height=\"635\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty Images - Getty\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Sterling is due to be named in the England squad to face Iceland[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489470\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000570163875-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489470\" width=\"960\" height=\"617\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty Images - Getty\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The sprinter posted a video on social media to say he was self-isolating[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489475\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 657px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000588235924-3.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=647\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489475\" width=\"647\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  PA:Press Association\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The virus scare is a nightmare for England manager Gareth Southgate[/caption] \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Gareth Southgate faces biggest selection dilemma of England reign with Harry Maguire arrest and clubs piling on pressure","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12489324/gareth-southgate-faces-biggest-selection-dilemma-of-england-reign-with-harry-maguire-arrest-and-clubs-piling-on-pressure/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>GARETH SOUTHGATE is facing his biggest headache today since taking over as England manager.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196702/england/\">Three Lions</a> boss names &#160;his squad for the forthcoming &#160;Uefa Nations League games against Iceland and Denmark at 2pm.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489560\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 822px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/f8a5e4b4-12b8-4438-a7fe-027d2c4e84ee.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=812\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489560\" width=\"812\" height=\"619\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Gareth Southgate faces a call-up headache for his England squad[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>But he is set to make a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488943/man-utd-harry-maguire-man-people-reputation-lethal-mix/\">late call on selecting Harry Maguire</a> who is desperate to be picked but has a court case in Greece over an alleged fight with a policeman.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Southgate faces the prospect of not being able to select him due to the uncertainty of the situation.&#160; </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He also has three other key players missing and is under pressure from both Manchester clubs not to over-play the stars who have only just returned from their European competitions.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Yet for Southgate, the trip to Iceland on September 5 and a match in Denmark three days later are both vital. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489562\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/f3f01a69-03b3-43d0-a119-4b2cac6759ce.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489562\" width=\"960\" height=\"786\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>EPA</figcredit></figure>Southgate will make a late decision on Man Utd star Harry Maguire[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The Maguire situation is the most difficult one for Southgate. He is keen for the Manchester United centre-back to feature but there is no way he could be selected if found guilty.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Liverpool duo&#160;Jordan Henderson and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain &#160;have both been sidelined with knee injuries, while Ben Chilwell of Leicester has a foot problem.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12478592/kyle-walker-england-foden-man-city-recall-southgate/\">Kyle Walker could make an England return</a> as the Manchester City defender has made his first squad in 15 months.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Southgate has not ruled out once again using a back three in the same way he did in the 2018 World Cup, when England reached the semi-finals.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And the Three Lions chief will look to youth.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489565\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601211912.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489565\" width=\"960\" height=\"654\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>Mason Greenwood and Phil Foden are set for call-ups[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>There will be first call-ups for City midfielder Phil Foden and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488646/man-utd-mason-greenwood-euros/\">Mason Greenwood of United</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Due to the left-back issue, with Chilwell crocked and Luke Shaw returning from injury, there could be a shock selection for United‚Äôs Brandon Williams.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Aston Villa skipper Jack Grealish will hope to get a call-up by Southgate, who has also been checking with Arsenal regarding the medical record of Ainsley Maitland-Niles.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The England boss was given another headache with Raheem Sterling attending a Covid-hit party in Jamaica for sprint legend Usain Bolt‚Äôs birthday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The City forward, 25, will be named in the squad but will be tested before he is allowed to join up with the group.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col HERE FOR ALL THE LATEST CELTIC, RANGERS AND PREMIERSHIP NEWS</a></h2>\n<hr />\n<p>&#160;</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 21:33:28 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"dc7c704fafee6ffb35c8c3990f4034a7","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"James Orr","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106287},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Man Utd skipper Harry Maguire‚Äôs ‚Äòman-of-the-people‚Äô reputation saw him hit with lethal mix","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488943/man-utd-harry-maguire-man-people-reputation-lethal-mix/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>HARRY MAGUIRE is an authentic man of the people, a cracking bloke, a folk hero for England‚Äôs drinking classes.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>They sing his name to the tune of La Bamba: ‚ÄúHe drinks the vodka, he drinks the Jager, his head‚Äôs f***ing massive!‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489025\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268519-5.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489025\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Harry Maguire was arrested on the Greek island of Mykonos after a drinking session with friends and family</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Although, apparently, Maguire doesn‚Äôt have a taste for the shorts and shots.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>According to a piece about the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12473969/harry-maguire-bar-bill-mykonos-arrest-punching-cop-sister-stabbed/\">bar bill amassed before his arrest on the Greek island of Mykonos</a>, while his pals quaff Dom Perignon, Maguire sticks mainly to beer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Like a proper salt-of-the-earth bloke.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>During the summer of 2018, when old ‚ÄòSlab Head‚Äôs‚Äô massive bonce propelled England towards their first World Cup semi-final in 28 years, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">Maguire</a> was rivalling his manager Gareth Southgate for the title of ‚Äògreatest living Englishman‚Äô.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>England were far better at that tournament than they had been since Euro 2004 or even Euro 96.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They didn‚Äôt beat any genuine world-class opposition, though, and yet the wide-held feeling that their campaign had been an absolute triumph was partly down to the likeability of Southgate‚Äôs players and their connection with the public.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The manager enjoyed telling his players, and the wider world, that they were a bunch of genuine lads, many of whom had played in the lower leagues, and had not lost touch with their roots.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Many current England players enjoy ‚Äòconnecting‚Äô with fans and come across well on social media.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h2><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12390714/man-utd-transfer-news-live-jadon-sancho-dembele-pogba/\">MAN UTD NEWS LIVE: Click here for the latest United news</a></strong></h2>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>For instance, it was Kyle Walker who originally took the mick out of a photo of Maguire‚Äôs girlfriend looking adoringly at the defender after England‚Äôs win over Tunisia, which then went viral.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>All good ‚Äòbantz‚Äô, if you like that kind of thing.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Now the tail-end of Southgate‚Äôs England playing career coincided with the rise of the ‚ÄòGolden Generation‚Äô and the media circus which surrounded them and, in particular, David Beckham.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Southgate hated all of that and was acutely aware that those <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196702/england/\">England</a> players were often regarded as sneering, roped-off poseurs ‚Äî even though he did not believe that was true of many of them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And he has been keen for his own squad to be viewed more favourably.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Hence, Maguire enjoying his&#160;status as a ‚Äòman of the people‚Äô. Even after he became the world‚Äôs most expensive defender at ¬£85million and captain of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196656/manchester-united/\">Manchester United</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But there is a problem with being a ‚Äòman of the people‚Äô ‚Äî <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12482644/harry-maguire-security-idiots-mykonos-brawl-danny-murphy/\">a significant minority of ‚Äòthe people‚Äô can be absolute toerags</a>, especially after drinking heavily in the sun.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This appears to be one issue which led to <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12468340/harry-maguire-arrested-greece-police-man-utd/\">Maguire‚Äôs arrest</a>. Friendly ‚Äòbanter‚Äô turns to taunts which turn to bother.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489033\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603441812-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489033\" width=\"960\" height=\"641\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>The Mega Agency</figcredit></figure>Maguire spent two nights in a cell and now Gareth Southgate must make a decision whether to include him in the next England squad[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>DRINKING CULTURE</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Then there‚Äôs the fact that a significant part of English working-class culture is the idea that you work hard, then reward yourself with a blow-out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire, 27, is part of that culture and, while many in the media sneer at it, some of us are part of that culture too and would be hypocritical to completely condemn it.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>If you ever went drinking with top-flight English footballers before Arsene Wenger transformed the culture, you would know that it took a significant amount of alcohol to get most of them drunk.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But current Premier League players tend to drink remarkably little, if anything, during the season, and therefore do not have the same levels of tolerance when they ‚Äòget on it‚Äô during a brief break.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Having not been out with Maguire, I don‚Äôt know if that is true of him personally but reports suggest he had a major thirst on in Mykonos last week.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire strenuously denies all allegations against him ‚Äî as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12479403/harry-maguire-england-gareth-southgate-mykonos/\">Southgate names his first England squad of the year</a> today to face Iceland and Denmark next month.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>We should resist too much judgment until a judge judges.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But at the very least, Maguire has allowed himself to get into a situation where he has ended up in jail for two nights, leaving Southgate and United boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer in invidious positions.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-map-harry-maguire-mykonos-v3.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-map-harry-maguire-mykonos-v3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12466574\" width=\"960\" height=\"767\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/gareth-southgate/\">Southgate</a> has the especially difficult task of naming a squad without knowing the full facts, or fall-out, surrounding Maguire‚Äôs arrest.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Pick Maguire and risk being seen as weak and inconsistent? Drop him and risk suggesting he may be guilty?</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This is not the first time one of Southgate‚Äôs 2018 heroes has got himself into trouble by being a ‚Äòman of the people‚Äô.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Keeper Jordan Pickford was involved in a bar brawl in Sunderland last year, having apparently been taunted and provoked.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489119\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/69249f0b-8605-41b5-b653-c08d9fff59bb.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489119\" width=\"960\" height=\"751\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>He earned a fine reputation among the British public for his performances on and off the pitch during the 2018 World Cup [/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Who is Scott Peterson and how long has he been in prison for?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489031/scott-peterson-wife-laci-death-penalty-unborn-child/","description":"<p>SCOTT Peterson was convicted of murdering his wife and unborn child in 2002, a crime for which he was given the death penalty.</p>\n<p>On Monday, <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1361790/scott-peterson-death-penalty-overturned-laci-peterson/\">Peterson&#8217;s death penalty conviction was overturned</a> &#8211; although he is still considered guilty.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489021\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881128-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489021\" width=\"960\" height=\"636\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Scott Peterson was convicted of murder in 2004[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Who is Scott Peterson?</h2>\n<p>Scott Peterson, 47, has been on death row since November 12, 2004 for the murder of his wife and unborn child. Prior to his conviction, Peterson was a fertilizer salesman, according to <a href=\"https://wcfcourier.com/news/breaking_news/expert-scott-peterson-s-debts-rose-sharply-before-laci-s/article_2a87a9da-52c8-5f3b-9d6c-4603b6d27ea0.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">The Courier</a>.</p>\n<p>He has continually maintained that he is innocent. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489023\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 722px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000002653430-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=712\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489023\" width=\"712\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>Peterson&#8217;s death penalty conviction was recently overturned[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Why was he arrested and charged?</h2>\n<p>Peterson was charged with murdering his wife and child, and dumping their bodies in the San Francisco bay. </p>\n<p>He was arrested after his girlfriend Amber Frey talked to the police. </p>\n<p>He had told Frey that his wife had died when they started dating &#8211; a month before the murders took place, according to the <a href=\"https://apnews.com/517ed79bec37923594db894a80807c45\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Associated Press</a>.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489024\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 569px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001668211-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=559\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489024\" width=\"559\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>He was arrested for the murder of his wife, who was 8 months pregnant with his child, Connor[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Who was his wife?</h2>\n<p>Laci Peterson was a Modesto schoolteacher eight months pregnant with Scott&#8217;s child. </p>\n<p>Prosecutors asserted that Peterson had killed them on Christmas Eve, 2002, by suffocating Laci. </p>\n<p>Her body was found in the San Francisco Bay months later.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489026\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 739px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884221-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=729\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489026\" width=\"729\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Laci Peterson was a 27-year-old Modesto schoolteacher[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Did Scott have an affair?</h2>\n<p>Peterson had started a relationship with Amber Frey, a Fresno massage therapist, a month BEFORE the slaying, and had told her that his wife was dead. </p>\n<p>This eventually proved to be his undoing, when Frey spoke to police.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489028\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 718px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000003501977-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=708\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489028\" width=\"708\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP</figcredit></figure>Scott had begun dating Amber Frey a month before he killed his wife &#8211; this proved to be his undoing[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Will he be executed?</h2>\n<p>A death penalty sentencing is still not off the table for the killer, despite Monday&#8217;s ruling. </p>\n<p>However, Stanislaus County District Attorney Birgit Fladager has not yet say whether they will for for the death penalty to be reinstated.  </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489029\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 780px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000003227084-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=770\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489029\" width=\"770\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Times Newspapers Ltd</figcredit></figure>Although he is safe for now, prosecutors may once again attempt to secure a death penalty conviction for Peterson[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Why was his execution overturned?</h2>\n<p>Peterson&#8217;s lawyer Cliff Gardner filed a <a href=\"https://sanfrancisco.cbslocal.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/15116056/2020/06/scottsbrief.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">423 page document</a> contesting the ruling, according to <a href=\"https://sanfrancisco.cbslocal.com/2020/08/24/state-supreme-court-reverses-scott-peterson-death-sentence/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">KPIX</a>. </p>\n<p>In the document the lawyer complained that the trial had received too much publicity, investigators didn&#8217;t prove &#8220;how, where or when&#8221; the murder took place, and that investigators did not have sufficient evidence to back the theory that Laci was suffocated.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489030\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884720-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489030\" width=\"960\" height=\"636\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Pictured is Richelle Nice, a juror for the Peterson trial. The CA Supreme Court found that many jurors were wrongly dismissed[/caption]</p>\n<p>Although the complaint did not successfully convince the justices to overturn the guilty sentence, they did agree with one point, unanimously &#8211; jurors who were personally against the death penalty but who were willing to enforce had been wrongly dismissed.</p>\n<p>&#8220;While a court may dismiss a prospective juror as unqualified to sit on a capital case if the juror‚Äôs views on capital punishment would substantially impair his or her ability to follow the law, a juror may not be dismissed merely because he or she has expressed opposition to the death penalty as a general matter,&#8221; the justices said.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__header\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in News</h3>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-wrapper\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n<div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-image\">\n\t\t\t<a -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 20:03:02 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881128-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"af65235ed33747355b326a00e0862431","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn30@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-48-208_df4aab5ee758ab10.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":636,"sourceBytes":77514,"destBytes":77514,"author":"Max Wilson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881128-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn30@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-48-208_df4aab5ee758ab10.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000002653430-1.jpg?strip=all&w=712":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn90@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-41-57-527_14b8d4b8034fa673.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001668211-1.jpg?strip=all&w=559":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn57@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-41-52-569_e04e88be97fe032e.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884221-1.jpg?strip=all&w=729":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn22@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-55-111_b505be20fb2d8322.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000003501977-1.jpg?strip=all&w=708":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn52@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-42-04-107_66bae5c2a1f58874.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000003227084-1.jpg?strip=all&w=770":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn6@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-59-792_160e89c82c29b4b6.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884720-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn85@2020_2/2020/08/25/00-41-52-086_759951a6fa2570b8.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106299},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Drinking coffee or tea during pregnancy ‚Äòputs unborn baby‚Äôs health at risk‚Äô","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489604/pregnancy-tea-coffee-baby-risk/","description":"<p><strong>PREGNANT women should avoid tea and coffee or risk the life and health of their unborn child, a major review warns.</strong></p> \n<p>Researchers say there is ‚Äúno safe level‚Äù of caffeine consumption for those who are expecting or trying for a baby.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489681\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881414.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489681\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Alamy\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Drinking coffee or tea during pregnancy puts the unborn child‚Äôs health at risk, according to new research[/caption] \n<p>They found the mind-altering substance is linked to an increased risk of miscarriage, stillbirth, low birth weight and leukaemia.</p> \n<p>It may also raise the odds of childhood obesity.</p> \n<p>NHS guidelines say 200mg of caffeine a day ‚Äì equivalent to two cups of instant coffee ‚Äì will not cause harm.</p> \n<p>But Prof Jack James, from Reykjavik University, in Iceland, has called for the advice to be ‚Äúradically revised‚Äù following his appraisal.</p> \n<p>He analysed 48 previous studies from the past two decades that looked at <a href=\"https://www.thesun.ie/fabulous/3618214/drinking-tea-while-pregnant-harms-your-unborn-baby/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">the impact of caffeine on pregnancy outcomes</a>.</p> \n<p>Any caffeine risks harming the baby but the dangers increase as more is consumed, the study suggests.</p> \n<p>Even 200mg a day appeared to <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/7813526/drinking-tea-coffee-pregnant-reduces-baby-size-increases-premature-birth/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">raise the risk of miscarriage </a>by up 28 per cent and stillbirth by up to 38 per cent.</p> \n<p>Prof James said: ‚ÄúCurrent evidence does not support assumptions about safe levels of maternal caffeine consumption.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThe cumulative scientific evidence supports advice to pregnant women and women contemplating pregnancy to avoid caffeine.‚Äù </p> \n<p>The expert admits women who consume caffeine may be more likely to have other harmful habits, such as smoking.</p> \n<h2>‚ÄòAVOID CAFFEINE‚Äô</h2> \n<p>Caffeine is found naturally in some foods and drinks, such as tea, coffee and chocolate.</p> \n<p>It is also added to some energy drinks, cold and flu remedies and some soft drinks.</p> \n<p>Medics warn many substances in a normal diet can be harmful in high doses and there is little evidence a small amount of caffeine is dangerous.</p> \n<p>Dr Daghni Rajasingham, from the Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists, said: ‚ÄúThe findings of this study add to the large body of evidence that supports limited caffeine intake during pregnancy.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúBut pregnant <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/5568064/coffee-when-pregnant-how-many-cups/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">women do not need to completely cut out caffeine</a>, as this paper suggests.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúHigh levels of caffeine during pregnancy can lead to miscarriage and babies having a low birth weight and may lead to excess weight gain in the child‚Äôs early years, which can increase risk of health problems later in life.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúHowever, as other ‚Äì and potentially more reliable ‚Äì research has found, pregnant women do not need to cut caffeine out entirely because these risks are extremely small, even if the recommended caffeine limits are exceeded.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n  <div class=\"col sun-col-6\"> \n   <div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\"> \n    <div class=\"swiper-container\"> \n     <div class=\"rail__header\"> \n      <h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in Health News</h3> \n     </div> \n     <div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div> \n     <div class=\"swiper-wrapper\"> \n      <div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\"> \n       <div class=\"rail__item-image\"> \n        <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12485742/brit-schoolgirl-nora-quoirin-not-kidnapped-inquest-told/\"> \n         <div class=\"delayed-image-load-landscape\" data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/dk-comp-nora.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=300&amp;h=192&amp;crop=1\"></div> \n         <div class=\"delayed-image-load-mobile\" data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/dk-comp-nora.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=300&amp;h=192&amp;crop=1\"></div> </a> \n        <!-- Add video indicator if article has feature video. --> \n        <div class=\"rail__item-play theme__background-color-rgba-80\"> \n         <span></span> \n        </div> \n       </div>\n       <!-- .rail__item-image --> \n       <div class=\"rail__item-content\"> \n        <h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\"> JUNGLE RIDDLE </h3> \n        <span class=\"rail__item-sub\"> Brit girl found dead naked in Malaysian jungle WASN'T kidnapped, inquest told </span> \n       </div>\n       <!-- .rail__item-content --> \n       <div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\"> \n       </div> \n       <a \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>‚ÄúRCOG‚Äôs advice to limit caffeine intake to 200mg per day ‚Äì the equivalent to two cups of instant coffee ‚Äì still stands.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThis paper does not supersede all the other evidence that has found that a limited intake of caffeine is safe for the majority of pregnancy women.‚Äù </p> \n<p>The findings are published in the journal BMJ Evidence Based Medicine.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489690\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000412728298.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489690\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty - Contributor\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Caffeine may also raise the odds of childhood obesity[/caption]
