audience","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12488199/alfie-boe-secret-dates-lover-audience-wife/","description":"<p>LOVE-rift singer Alfie Boe took a woman on secret dates while married, invited her to his show at the Royal Albert Hall ‚Äî then left her feeling ‚Äúworthless‚Äù by dedicating a song to his wife.</p> \n<p>The woman, a broadcaster 16 years his junior, had swapped affectionate messages for five months after he said his marriage was on the rocks.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488288\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 633px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/b2856db1-77aa-4737-a313-304a6ac31bb7.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=623\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488288\" married[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488289\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/b9d90837-297e-4c93-8d72-405b288e5205.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488289\" width=\"960\" height=\"623\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Alfie, pictured in Les Miserables, invited the woman to his show at the Royal Albert Hall ‚Äì but his wife Sarah was in the audience too[/caption] \n<p>But wife Sarah was in the audience too, and it was their wedding anniversary.</p> \n<p>A friend of the woman said: ‚ÄúShe was sat in the friends and family section, and when Alfie said he was dedicating The Way You Look Tonight to ‚Äòsomeone special‚Äô she nudged her pal thinking he meant her.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúWhen he paid tribute to Sarah ‚Äî after claiming for months that he wasn‚Äôt happy ‚Äî and then blocked her that same night, it made her feel worthless.‚Äù</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12478880/alfie-boe-split-wife-younger-women-dating-app-raya/\">The Sun revealed yesterday mums‚Äô favourite Alfie, 46, had now split from Sarah and has gone on celebrity dating app Raya.</a></p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488285\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000525527992-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488285\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Getty Images - Getty\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Alfie, 46, has now split from Sarah and has gone on celebrity dating app Raya[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488283\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 668px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000476216072-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=658\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488283\" width=\"658\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Paul Edwards - The Sun\n </figcredit>\n</figure>He said Sarah had been ‚Äòan incredible partner‚Äô and ‚Äòamazing mother‚Äô to their two children[/caption] \n<p>He and the woman began texting in December 2018 after Alfie sent his phone number in an Instagram message. They split after the show in April last year</p> \n<p>The friend said: ‚ÄúAlfie was so charming that she fell for him completely. He even rang her at midnight on New Year‚Äôs Eve, which she really appreciated.</p> \n<p>But that was what made his antics at the show hurt even more.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThe impression Alfie gave in his messages was that he felt pressure to be seen as a family man and a doting father.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row now struggles to read his Match of the Day notes.</strong></p> \n<p><a href=\"http://GARY Lineker has admitted his eyesight is getting so bad that he now struggles to read his Match of the Day notes. The former England ace, 59, has resorted to   bigger writing  but even then finds it hard. Gary, right, admits he  has to wear his glasses more and more. The presenter said: ‚ÄúAt first, I put them on just to read if there was a breaking news story or something like that.  ‚ÄúAnd then it came to the point that, however big I wrote my notes, I can‚Äôt see them any more. ‚ÄúEvery time I glanced down, I couldn‚Äôt read them. And I just thought, ‚ÄòWell, I‚Äôll just put the glasses on‚Äô.‚Äù Gary  has to wear special  varifocal lenses which allow him to view things at various distances ‚Äî including the MotD  pundits. The father of four, who also fronts BT Sport‚Äôs live Champions League coverage, told talkSPORT‚Äôs Hawksbee and Jacobs Daily podcast: ‚ÄúIf I just kept my reading glasses on, the guys would all be blurred.‚Äù He added: ‚ÄúThe other day I was looking for my glasses everywhere and, after about five minutes, I realised I was wearing them.‚Äù Gary  has previously said he has had to quit golf because of   arthritis in his fingers.\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">The former England ace, 59,</a> has resorted to bigger writing but even then finds it hard.</p> \n<figure 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Who was Laci Peterson and why did her husband Scott murder her?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489635/scott-peterson-laci-peterson-death-penalty-overturned/","description":"<p>LACI Peterson was murdered by her husband Scott Peterson on Christmas eve, 2002.</p>\n<p>California Supreme Court justices <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1361790/scott-peterson-death-penalty-overturned-laci-peterson/\">recently overturned Scott&#8217;s death penalty sentencing</a> on the basis that the original trial was &#8220;flawed for multiple reasons.&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489630\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 569px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001668211-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=559\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489630\" width=\"559\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Laci Peterson[/caption]</p>\n<p>Scott maintains his innocence in the case, according to a phone call interview recorded for six-part A&#38;E series The Murder of Laci Peterson that aired in 2017.</p>\n<h2>Who was Laci Peterson? </h2>\n<p>Laci Peterson was the wife of Scott Peterson.</p>\n<p>Scott murdered Laci on Christmas eve in 2002 in <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/california\">California</a>. Prosecutors told jurors that Scott either suffocated or strangled his wife before he wrapped her body up in a blue tarp.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489631\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884192-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489631\" width=\"960\" height=\"709\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Laci was heavily pregnant before she died[/caption]</p>\n<p>Investigators said that Scott then dumped her body from his fishing boat into San Francisco Bay, where she surfaced months later.</p>\n<p>Laci was eight months pregnant with their unborn son at the time she was killed.</p>\n<h2>Who is her husband Scott Peterson?</h2>\n<p>Scott was arrested for Laci&#8217;s murder after Amber Frey, a massage therapist living in Fresno, told police that they had begun dating a month before his wife‚Äôs death and that he had told her his wife was already dead.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489632\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881146-3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489632\" width=\"960\" height=\"741\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Scott Peterson[/caption]</p>\n<p>At trial, Scott was convicted of first-degree murder in the death of his wife and the second-degree murder of their unborn son.</p>\n<h2>When is he being executed? </h2>\n<p>Scott recently had his 2005 death sentence scrapped by the California Supreme Court.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúPeterson contends his trial was flawed for multiple reasons, beginning with the unusual amount of pretrial publicity that surrounded the case,‚Äù the court said.</p>\n<p>The justices said the trial judge ‚Äúmade a series of clear and significant errors in jury selection that, under long-standing United States Supreme Court precedent, undermined Peterson‚Äôs right to an impartial jury at the penalty phase.‚Äù </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489633\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881128-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489633\" width=\"960\" height=\"636\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>California justices said that there were jury selection errors in Scott&#8217;s initial trial[/caption]</p>\n<p>It agreed with his argument that potential jurors were improperly dismissed from the jury pool after saying they personally disagreed with the death penalty but would be willing to follow the law and impose it.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúWhile a court may dismiss a prospective juror as unqualified to sit on a capital case if the juror‚Äôs views on capital punishment would substantially impair his or her ability to follow the law, a juror may not be dismissed merely because he or she has expressed opposition to the death penalty as a general matter,‚Äù the justices said in a unanimous decision.</p>\n<p>Prosecutors say they may try again for the same sentence in the high-profile case.</p>\n<h2>Did they have kids together? </h2>\n<p>Scott and Laci had one child together, a son named Conner, who was murdered by Scott while he was still in the womb.</p>\n<h2>Was Scott having an affair?</h2>\n<p>Scott was a &#8220;serial philanderer&#8221; who cheated on his wife at least three times before she disappeared, according to the <a href=\"https://www.eastbaytimes.com/2004/09/28/defense-scott-cheated-on-laci-before/#:~:text=REDWOOD%20CITY%20%E2%80%94%20Scott%20Peterson%20was,in%20Peterson's%20capital%20murder%20trial.&#38;text=them%20%E2%80%94%20Geragos%20tried%20to%20show,Frey%20was%20not%20abnormal%20behavior.\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">East Bay Times</a>.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489634\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 948px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000002674745-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=938\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489634\" width=\"938\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Scott is now 47-years-old [/caption]</p>\n<p>Defense attorney Mark -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>Scott had already been on at least four dates with massage therapist Frey before his wife&#8217;s murder.</p>\n<p>Geragos asserted that Scott was forthcoming about his infidelities, presenting email evidence to that court.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúI never took the time to apologize for my infidelities. I‚Äôm truly sorry I was not forthcoming with you,‚Äù Scott wrote to Laci&#8217;s mother in January 2003.</p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 21:43:01 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001668211-2.jpg?strip=all&w=559","linkMd5":"588f4837851465615c4c1e67795022bc","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn18@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-47-796_1edb84e23689818d.webp","destWidth":559,"destHeight":960,"sourceBytes":49320,"destBytes":49320,"author":"katrina.schollenberger@the-sun.com","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000001668211-2.jpg?strip=all&w=559":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn18@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-47-796_1edb84e23689818d.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884192-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn49@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-41-56-242_090535bbfbdd41a6.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881146-3.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn73@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-41-50-832_2378ce7c96cf790d.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881128-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn61@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-41-50-722_db1805910b777896.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000002674745-2.jpg?strip=all&w=938":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn7@2020_1/2020/08/25/00-42-00-872_c951f106e52eb02c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106286},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Military chiefs could SCRAP British Army‚Äôs tanks in move to prioritise cyberwarfare","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489736/military-chiefs-scrap-tanks-british-army/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>MILITARY chiefs could scrap the British Army tanks in order to prioritise cyberwarefare.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The idea of getting rid of the ageing fleet of armoured vehicles is reportedly being explored by the government.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489855\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603904728.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489855\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure>British Army Challenger 2 Main Battle Tank on the Salisbury Plain Military Training Area in Wiltshire[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489852\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603905303.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489852\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure>A Warrior armoured carrier and tank used by the British Army[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The Times reports it comes as costs to upgrade the 227 Challenger 2 tanks and 366 Warriors has soared.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Last year the Ministry of Defence said cybercapabilities, space and other technologies should get more investment.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A government source told The Times: ‚ÄúWe know that a number of bold decisions need to be taken in order to properly protect British security and rebalance defence interests to meet the new threats we face.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It is thought the idea to scrap a number of tanks has been floated with senior US army members and Nato.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the option of upgrading the Challenger 2 or purchasing German Leopard 2 tanks still remains.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Discussions are also said to have taken place on shutting down the British Army&#8217;s training base in Canada.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>¬†A Ministry of Defence spokesperson said: ‚ÄúOur commitment to NATO is unwavering, and the UK recognises that as a global military power our greatest strength remains our alliances.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúWe are engaging our international allies and industry partners as we develop and shape defence‚Äôs contribution to the Integrated Review.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>TANKED UP</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The Challenger 2 is the British Army&#8217;s main battle tank &#8211; it is based on the Challenger 1 tank, which served in the Gulf War and the Balkans.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>These tanks have thermal imaging, a laser range finder and a chain gun that can fire 4,000 rounds.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Warrior infantry fighting vehicle is fast, heavily armoured and can keep up on the most difficult terrain.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They have heat rockets, a mounted cannon and a chain gun.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container cost-saving plans.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Only 148 of our 227 Challenger 2 tanks were set for an upgrade, with the rest mothballed or used for parts.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Britain had almost 800 tanks in 1990, with critics saying the lack could leave us vulnerable in a¬†<a war</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489854\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Nine boys and two men arrested over ‚Äògang-rape of 16-year-old girl by 30 males at Red Sea hotel‚Äô","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489512/nine-boys-two-men-arrested-gang-red-sea-hotel/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>NINE teenage boys and two men have been arrested in connection with the gang rape of a 16-year-old girl in the Red Sea resort of Eilat.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Two men aged 27 were detained after the alleged rape last week &#8211; which witnesses said involved 30 males &#8211; and the 17-year-olds were arrested over the weekend.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489766\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 861px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603903717.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=851\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489766\" width=\"851\" height=\"529\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The alleged attack occurred in a room in this hotel in the town of Eilat, Israel</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12461050\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/8eb3dffc-71cf-4714-831a-36a622f8ad6e.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12461050\" width=\"960\" height=\"654\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>National outrage swept Israel over the alleged attack[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/israel\">Israeli</a> prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu has branded the attack as a &#8220;crime against humanity&#8221; and it has sparked nationwide outrage as well as protests.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The attackers are alleged to have filmed the rape with one even reportedly threatening to send the footage to the victim</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"http://thesun.co.uk/topic/crime\">Police</a> said the victim is believed to have been intoxicated and was raped after going to use the bathroom at the Red Sea Hotel. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The hotel manager has been arrested as police charged her with obstructing their investigation and failing to prevent a crime.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A 19-year-old woman was also questioned by police and released after allegedly encouraging people to share video of the attack via WhatsApp.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>&#8216;RAPE FILMED&#8217;</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>She is alleged to have written in a WhatsApp group asking if anyone had footage of the rape and said: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt be stingy, share.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The victim is said to be traumatised by the experience but is cooperating with police and has said she is willing to face her alleged attackers in court, <a href=\"https://www.haaretz.com/israel-news/.premium-police-arrest-fourth-suspect-in-alleged-gang-rape-of-16-year-old-girl-at-hotel-1.9093344\">Haaretz reports.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The teenager been placed under police protection after her personal information began spreading online, amid fears she could be intimidated by the men she is accusing.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She is thought not to have been a guest at the hotel, but to have been socialising there with a group of friends.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A fellow guest at the hotel said people were drinking and smoking throughout the hotel in breach of rules.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>People were smoking and drinking in the pool, including throwing their cigarette butts in the water, despite signs banning smoking in the area but management were uninterested in stopping them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A large number of young people were gathered in the hallway outside his room.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>PROTESTS</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúThere were crazy levels of music and alcohol,‚Äù he added.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúThe lifeguard himself brought out a food container, filled it with ice so the young folks had somewhere to put their alcohol bottles. They simply opened a bar at the pool.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúI approached the hotel manager to tell her that it was over the top. Her response was: ‚ÄòIf you have a problem, you can complain to the municipal inspectors. I don&#8217;t check what they&#8217;re doing‚Äô.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Thousands of people have taken to the streets protesting as they called for justice for the teenager.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They carried banners saying &#8220;we won&#8217;t be silent anymore&#8221; and &#8220;we believe you&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12461065\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/3781f81d-6a96-43da-9ec3-1f5f8fc0f167.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12461065\" width=\"960\" height=\"645\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Fury is mounting over the attack as thousands hit the streets[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12461093\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img width=\"960\" height=\"662\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Nine out of 10 rape cases in Israel are¬†closed by prosecutors without charge[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12461086\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/d29b41c4-7a33-4ab7-b14a-d9748bd8bc16.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12461086\" width=\"960\" height=\"656\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Protesters show they are &#8216;gagged&#8217; in a message to the authorities[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12458506\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000219248414.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12458506\" width=\"960\" height=\"604\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure>Eilat is a resort on the Red Sea in Israel[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The girl reported the attack on Friday,  when two 27-year-old men from Hadera have been arrested.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One of the men reportedly told investigators that more than 30 men had sex with the girl, but he denied rape. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Men allegedly lined up outside the hotel room and patiently waited for their turn to rape the victim.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One of the girl&#8217;s friends is said to have tried but failed to intervene to stop the alleged rape, and other witnesses allegedly simply ignored the attack.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.haaretz.com/israel-news/.premium-police-probing-suspected-gang-rape-of-16-year-old-in-israeli-resort-town-1.9086617\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Haaretz</a> reports that some of the alleged perpetrators filmed the attack using the mobile phones. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Video of the assault is reported to have featured in a later exchange of messages between the girl and one of the men who has been arrested. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The man denied sending the messages and said another person had sent them using his mobile phone. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She told police: &#8220;The following day, one of the young men approached me and told me that he has videos. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;He asked if I wanted him to send them to me, but I wasn‚Äôt capable of handling it.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The victim has said she is encouraged by the support from the public as protests sweep Israel, but is unable to ignore trolls online who have jumped on the case, reports <a href=\"https://www.timesofisrael.com/teen-victim-tells-police-gang-rape-suspect-offered-her-videos-report/\">Times of Israel</a>. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;No one knows what I went through, so how can you pass judgement and ask me questions?&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12461179\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/9110620e-4793-4d1a-a7ee-0afc31307a3f.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12461179\" width=\"960\" height=\"652\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Protesters wore face covings as they called for justice[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12461075\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ef927573-47e9-427b-8e0c-830c979007c5.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12461075\" width=\"960\" height=\"647\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Protesters gather in Tel Aviv after the alleged attack[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12461087\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img width=\"960\" height=\"648\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Signs of &#8216;we believe you&#8217; are waved by demonstrators[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>One of the girl&#8217;s friends said one the suspects claimed he was a &#8220;medic and wanted to help&#8221; after coming across the victim.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But when it became clear she had been drinking, the suspect &#8220;took advantage of her and slept with her when she was out of control&#8221;, reports Channel 13. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>One of the arrested men claimed the security cameras would show it was consensual sex.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He claimed the men did line up outside the room, while the girl would call for them to come in. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Nine out of 10 rape cases in Israel are&#160;closed by prosecutors without charge, according to an annual survey released at the end 2019.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And shocking figures showed in 2018 some 63 per cent of alleged gang rape victims were aged between 12 and 18 in the country. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12458503\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602510458.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12458503\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Israeli prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu said the alleged attack was a &#8216;crime against humanity&#8217;[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Hotel owner Pnina Maman has claimed there is no evidence the assault took place in her establishment &#8211; saying CCTV doesn&#8217;t show men in the hallways waiting to rape the victim.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Ms Maman said: &#8220;We are a hotel, not an educational institution. I‚Äôm not guilty of what happened. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col This could have happened, unfortunately, in any hotel.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;We have no way of knowing what happens inside the rooms.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Police officials said they had &#8220;indication that there were several people in the same room&#8221; and that this is a &#8220;complex investigation&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 &w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn99@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-42-05-228_b8d387f020874f15.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106185},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"‚ÄòCreepy men‚Äô target and harass women by private message on Scrabble Go app","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489521/scrabble-go-creepy-messages-scam/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>SCRABBLE GO fans are being targeted by &#8220;creepy men&#8221; who appear to be trying to flirt with them, charm them and then scam them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Women who play the popular game claim they have been targeted by the suspicious users who appear to purposefully lose games.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489698\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000584583119-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489698\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Scopely</figcredit></figure>Women have spoke of being messaged by &#8220;creepy men&#8221; on the Scrabble Go[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The mysterious men start up a match with the potential victim before starting to quiz them about where they live and if they are married, reports the <a href=\"https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-53888148\">BBC</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They then attempt to talk the women into moving from the game <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/app/\">app</a> onto other messaging services such as WhatsApp.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It appears the men are what are known as &#8220;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2690578/online-dating-scam-victims/\">romance</a> <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/scams-and-fraud/\">scammers</a>&#8220;, fraudsters who attempt to charm their way into getting victims to send cash.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Potential victims have questioned whether the users are even human, with many of them seemingly acting like &#8220;bots&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Bots are automated accounts which respond to real users&#8217; messages with a pre-programmed script. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>One woman, from Croydon, told The Sun Online she has received messages from a handful of men &#8211; all who appear to say the same thing over and over. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She started using Scrabble Go to beat boredom during lockdown while on furlough, but was disturbed when she was bombarded with messages. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 24-year-old said: &#8220;Its creepy, you are just trying to play a game and then you get messages from these weird people.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;They seem like bots, they just say &#8216;hi&#8217; repeatedly. It makes me feel uncomfortable, and makes me want to delete the app.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Scopley &#8211; the company behind the game &#8211; said the chat function can be restricted so only friends can message you.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489700\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 409px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603900770.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=399\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489700\" width=\"399\" height=\"448\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Scopely</figcredit></figure>Scrabble Go users can play with people across the world[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489699\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 477px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000584583029.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=467\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489699\" width=\"467\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Scopely</figcredit></figure>Scrabble Go is the official Scrabble app[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Another woman, in her 60s, told the BBC she was messaged by three men claiming to be from the US and speaking in broken English. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;It&#8217;s almost like a script. They start with, &#8216;How you doing?&#8217; They match you to start a game, then start messaging.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;They play very badly, so you win the game. And then they big you up.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Regularly, they say, &#8216;I just want to check, can&#8217;t we be friends?'&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She added: &#8220;When you say, &#8216;No,&#8217; some of them disappear, they resign from the game.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;If you don&#8217;t reply at all, most of them resign from the game. This is not a dating site&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In one unusual message, one apparently human scammer confessed to using his son&#8217;s picture on the app as he was &#8220;more attractive&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489701\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000584750368.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489701\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure>Many popular gaming apps are targeted by romance scammers[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Scrabble Go launched in March 2020 and became the official Scrabble app in June when Mattel ended its partnership with games giant EA.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Scopley has boasted the app has 2.5million daily users.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Australia&#8217;s Competition and Consumer Commission also said it had receives reports of romance scams on Scrabble Go.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Romance scams feature across gaming apps and social media, being difficult to police as the attempted swindle takes place inprivate messages.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__header\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in News</h3>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-wrapper\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n<div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-image\">\n\t\t\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12485742/brit-schoolgirl-nora-quoirin-not-kidnapped-inquest-told/\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-landscape\" data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/dk-comp-nora.jpg?strip=all&#038;w=300&#038;h=192&#038;crop=1\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-mobile\" games against Iceland on September 5 and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/denmark/\">Denmark</a> three days later.</p> \n<p>But the <a before joining the rest of the squad.</p> \n<p>A source said: ‚ÄúThis double blow has given Gareth a real headache.‚Äù</p> \n<p>The 25-man squad is due to meet up on Sunday and Monday.</p> record after agreeing a ¬£90million fee for Kai Havertz.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>And the Blues are on the brink of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12488259/chelsea-agree-thiago-silva-deal/\">wrapping up the free transfer of Paris Saint-Germain centre-back Thiago Silva</a>, 35.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489273\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 729px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600944283-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=719\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489273\" width=\"719\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Kai Havertz is on the brink of signing for Chelsea in a ¬£90m transfer which will see him pocket ¬£310,000 a week[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>German Havertz, 21, will bust the club‚Äôs pay policy with a ¬£310,000-A-WEEK pay deal ‚Äî worth ¬£80.6m over five years.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Chelsea have taken a big step forward in their pursuit of the Bayer Leverkusen star and could announce the signing this week.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sources claim paperwork and signatures are all that is needed to make <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/kai-havertz/\">Havertz</a> the third major transfer of 2020 for the Blues.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He follows Hakim Ziyech and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/11893091/chelsea-timo-werner-confirmed/\">Timo Werner through the door at Stamford Bridge</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/DD-COMPOSITE-KAI-STATS-NEW.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12374162\" width=\"960\" height=\"641\" />\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196660/chelsea/\">Chelsea</a> will fork out an initial ¬£72.2m, followed by ¬£9m in add-ons if they qualify for the Champions League and then reach the knockouts.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Winning trophies will trigger further payments.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The total racks up to more than ¬£90m, beating the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/6973319/kepa-arrizabalaga-chelsea-athletic-bilbao-thibaut-courtoism-real-madrid/\">¬£76m paid for keeper Kepa two years ago</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><strong><a 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Who is Carl Beech‚Äôs ex-wife Dawn?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12485329/who-is-carl-beechs-ex-wife-dawn/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>CARL Beech falsely accused some of the most powerful people in Britain of child sex abuse during the 1970s and 1980s.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But who is Carl&#8217;s ex-wife Dawn Beech?</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12485380\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000508827186.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12485380\" width=\"960\" height=\"953\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Refer to Caption</figcredit></figure>Dawn beech was married to Carl for 22 years[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Who is Dawn Beech?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Dawn Beech is the ex-wife of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/9589392/carl-beech-faces-jail-today/\">sex abuse fantasist Carl Beech</a>, who placed himself in the centre of a false sex abuse scandal which implemented some of the most powerful people in Britain.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dawn and Carl divorced in 2012, just a few years before <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11075990/carl-beech-cost-takpayers-legal-aid/\">Beech was arrested and imprisoned for 18 years</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dawn is a nurse by profession &#8211; having trained at Royal Berkshire Hospital in Reading. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She gave a testimony through a screen at Newcastle Crown Court in 2019  which helped to convict her former husband.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They had one son together &#8211; who allegedly collapsed when he heard that his dad was going to prison.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The first she knew of the child sex abuse charges was when a social worker called her at work in December 2016.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12485378\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000508827192.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12485378\" width=\"960\" height=\"955\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Refer to Caption</figcredit></figure>Dawn Beech is a sister at Gloucester Royal Hospital.[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Where is she now?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Dawn is a sister at Gloucester Royal Hospital.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Beech‚Äôs family suffered as a result of his crimes, which ex-wife Dawn is set to delve into during the documentary The Unbelievable Story Of Carl Beech, airing on BBC Two.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She told RadioTimes: ‚ÄúI think Carl has got to realise what he‚Äôs put me through, what he‚Äôs put his mother through and what he‚Äôs put our son through.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúIt‚Äôs his mum and his son that are really the people who have been seriously damaged by this.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000534391882.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=736\" alt=\"Carl Beech orchestrated the web of lies which cost the police ¬£2.5 million in investigations\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Carl and Dawn were married for 22 years</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<h2>When was she married to Carl Beech?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Dawn met Beech in 1988 when they were both student nurses at the Royal Berkshire Hospital, Reading. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He was, she remembers, a bubbly, friendly individual who, once they became lovers, showered her with gifts, meals at expensive restaurants and holidays to New York and Menorca.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Beech proposed to Dawn in 1991 and got married in May 1992 and she believed them to be &#8220;happy enough&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dawn said it &#8220;wasn‚Äôt a happy marriage&#8221; &#8211; but she never suspected he was a paedophile and fantasist.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div relationship and sex therapy in the early 2000s when things weren&#8217;t going well.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The pair split in 2010, and formally divorced in 2012, sharing custody over their son.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In February 2017, she was called in by Northumbria Police to speak about her ex-husband&#8217;s crimes &#8211; where she was interviewed for five and a half hours.</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 19:45:00 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000508827186.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"66067f91804352887ab922efbd767156","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn97@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-41-48-679_517da1595b274338.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":953,"sourceBytes":68646,"destBytes":68646,"author":"Claudia Aoraha","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000508827186.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn97@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-41-48-679_517da1595b274338.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000508827192.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn3@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-42-06-222_269dcc5420b2eb47.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000534391882.jpg?strip=all&w=736":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn34@2020_5/2020/08/25/00-41-53-404_53f4e3e9f247c535.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106301},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Donald Trump investigated over claims he ‚Äòinflated assets for loans‚Äô as NY AG tries to force Eric to testify","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12488940/donald-trump-eric-trump-investigated-inflated-assets-loans/","description":"<p>THE New York Attorney General&#8217;s Office is investigating Donald Trump&#8217;s private business for allegedly misleading lenders by inflating assets, according to legal papers filed on Monday. </p>\n<p>The papers ask a <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/new-york/\">New York</a> judge to compel the Trump Organization to give up information it has been withholding from investigators &#8211; and demands that the president&#8217;s son, Eric Trump, submit to an interview.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12488936\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000591137070.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488936\" width=\"960\" height=\"607\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP or licensors</figcredit></figure>Papers filed in New York ask a judge to compel the Trump Organization to give up financial information [/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12488937\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 800px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/4760335e-4688-4086-8e84-dc42faa29278.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=790\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488937\" width=\"790\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Times Newspapers Ltd</figcredit></figure>Eric Trump was reportedly supposed to be interviewed by investigators, but canceled abruptly[/caption]</p>\n<p>Attorney General Letitia James <a href=\"https://twitter.com/NewYorkStateAG/status/1297949682816225282?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Etweet\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">took to Twitter</a> on Monday to announce the move, and to slam the Trump Organization for its failure to cooperate.</p>\n<p>&#8220;I took action to force the Trump Organization, and specifically EVP Eric Trump, to comply with my office&#8217;s ongoing investigation into its financial dealings,&#8221; James wrote.</p>\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\">\n<blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\">\n<p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\">I took action to force the Trump Organization, and specifically EVP Eric Trump, to comply with my office‚Äôs ongoing investigation into its financial dealings. </p>\n<p>For months, the Trump Organization has failed to fully comply with our subpoenas in this investigation.</p>\n<p>&#8212; NY AG James (@NewYorkStateAG) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/NewYorkStateAG/status/1297949682816225282?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 24, 2020</a></p></blockquote>\n<p><script async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script></div>\n<p>&#8220;For months, the Trump Organization has failed to fully comply with our subpoenas in this investigation.&#8221;</p>\n<p>The investigation began, James said, when Trump&#8217;s former lawyer <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/michael-cohen/\">Michael Cohen</a> testified in 2019 that the president&#8217;s annual financial statements &#8220;inflated the values of his assets to obtain favorable terms for loans &#38; insurance coverage, while also deflating the value of other assets to reduce real estate taxes.&#8221; </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12488938\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881136.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488938\" width=\"960\" height=\"627\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Financial reports on Trump&#8217;s Seven Springs property in Westchester County, New York, have been questioned in the past[/caption]</p>\n<p>Many of the details of the ongoing investigation were left out of the filing, but <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/new-york-ag-trump-organization-lawsuit/2020/08/24/882c03a8-e60e-11ea-bc79-834454439a44_story.html?tidr=a_breakingnews&#38;hpid=hp_no-name_hp-breaking-news%3Apage%2Fbreaking-news-bar\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">The Washington Post reported</a> that three Trump properties &#8211; a <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/los-angeles/\">Los Angeles</a> golf course, an office building at 40 Wall Street in Manhattan, and a country estate called Seven Springs in Westchester County, New York &#8211; were mentioned. </p>\n<p>The Post reported last year that <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/donald-trump/\">Trump</a> had inflated the potential sale value of Seven Springs in a Statement of Financial Condition &#8211; which is given to potential lenders to demonstrate wealth. </p>\n<p>A 2011 financial statement reportedly claimed that the property had been &#8220;zoned for luxurious homes&#8221; and that the value of the lot would rise to $261million from $20million due to the value of the homes.</p>\n<p>The Post reported that Trump received preliminary approval for the homes, but none were ever built. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12488939\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602342080-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488939\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP or licensors</figcredit></figure>Trump&#8217;s legal team has dismissed the legal filing as politically-motivated[/caption]</p>\n<p>In James&#8217; announcement, she also noted that the investigation is seeking testimony from several witnesses with knowledge of the organization&#8217;s financial dealings, including Trump&#8217;s son.</p>\n<p>&#8220;We are seeking thousands of documents and testimony from multiple witnesses regarding several Trump Organization properties and transactions, including from Eric Trump, who was intimately involved in one or more transactions under review,&#8221; she said. </p>\n<p>\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; Winward shocked her fans with a picture of her lookalike daughter, who could pass for her twin.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 34-year-old actress welcomed 15-year-old Mia when she was 19 years old, and the resemblance between them is uncanny.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490089\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img soap</a> between 2001 and 2015.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Taking to her Instagram page yesterday, the star shared a photo of herself with the teen.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In the photo, the two women look almost identical as they pose with matching smiles and their blonde locks tied tied into a topknot.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Both are in swimwear as they relax in what appears to be a hot tub.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure She‚Äôs growing up way too fast for my liking! <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f496.png\" alt=\"üíñ\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />Shmee<img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f496.png\" alt=\"üíñ\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Once again, her fans were stunned by their likeness, with one writing: &#8220;Literally like looking at you, Sammy!&#8221;</p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 23:31:52 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603865068.jpg?strip=all&w=768","linkMd5":"f14349d29a269b702d53bceb39fc806b","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn50@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-47-112_c50b1f2f657a9c36.webp","destWidth":768,"destHeight":960,"sourceBytes":90616,"destBytes":90616,"author":"Stephanie Soteriou","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603865068.jpg?strip=all&w=768":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn50@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-47-112_c50b1f2f657a9c36.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/sammy3.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn55@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-42-03-364_dbc81beaa79bc7b4.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/sammy2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn82@2020_3/2020/08/25/00-41-53-179_f882ad7e36cd7c35.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f496.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn90@2020_4/2020/08/25/00-41-52-113_ff36a50fb0e5d135.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/sammy.jpg?strip=all&w=781":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn46@2020_2/2020/08/25/00-41-54-384_b7168bf396ad73f0.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000005178684.jpg?strip=all&w=804":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn63@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-42-01-344_965e0a1f1ae8b814.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598316106181},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Last three weeks of Brexit talks will be crucial to securing a trade deal, warns top Tory","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489673/last-three-weeks-of-brexit-talks-crucial-deal/","description":"<p>BRUSSELS is gloomy about clinching a trade deal before Brexit ‚Äî as a top Tory warns the last three weeks of talks will be critical.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/7775453/michel-barnier-eu-brexit-negotiator/\">EU negotiating chief Michel Barnier</a> is braced for a major bust-up next month, vowing to be ‚Äúcold blooded‚Äù with Britain.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_11806156\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000459325086.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11806156\" width=\"960\" height=\"644\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Reuters\n </figcredit>\n</figure>David Davis has warned the UK will soon have to be preparing for talks to collapse[/caption] \n<p>Both sides have earmarked October for a deadline. But <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/3985412/david-davis-brexit-secretary-conservative-mp-haltemprice-howden-tory/\">former Brexit Secretary David Davis</a> has warned it is a critical endgame and the UK will soon have to be preparing for talks to collapse.</p> \n<p>He said Brussels will try to take things to the wire, adding: ‚ÄúThe last three weeks will matter more than the first three years.‚Äù </p> \n<p>One Eurocrat admitted ‚Äúoutsiders don‚Äôt realise how pessimistic we‚Äôve become‚Äù about getting a trade deal.</p> \n<p>The UK is holding firm on a refusal to accept EU red tape or cave in on fishing rights. Mr Barnier fears talks are headed for a bitter breakdown.</p> \n<p>He believes <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/downing-street/\">Downing Street</a> is laying the ground for a vicious ‚Äúblame game‚Äù over who is responsible for the stalemate.</p> \n<p>In a gloomy briefing to diplomats, the grumpy Frenchman claimed that last week‚Äôs tetchy round of talks have made things worse.</p> \n<h2>‚ÄòCOLD BLOODED‚Äô APPROACH</h2> \n<p>The UK‚Äôs negotiator David Frost had put forward a draft text last week in the hope of speeding up the discussions. But <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/michel-barnier/\">Mr Barnier</a> dismissed it as ‚Äúunrealistic‚Äù and urged EU states to stay ‚Äúcold blooded‚Äù.</p> \n<p>He insisted that the UK‚Äôs ‚Äúclear strategy‚Äù will be to ‚Äútrade off‚Äù fishing access for freedom from <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12425148/brexit-bosses-gear-up-fight/\">EU rules</a> at the last minute.</p> \n<p>An EU source said: ‚ÄúWe expect the mood to switch rapidly to contingency planning in expectation the UK will throw itself into the blame game rather than the endgame.‚Äù</p> \n<p>A British official hit back, saying: ‚ÄúThe UK has consistently pushed for detailed textual discussions on the core elements of a trade agreement.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúIf the EU continues to stall progress because of its unrealistic asks on fish and subsidies, we will quickly run out of time.‚Äù</p> \n<h2 class=\"has-text-align-center\">Barnier ploy will cost EU big time</h2> \n<p class=\"has-text-align-center\"><strong>By David Davis, Ex Brexit Secretary</strong></p> \n<p>WELL now I‚Äôve seen everything. The gullible British Remainer Press report breathlessly that Michel Barnier is telling us (yet again) the Brexit negotiations are ‚Äúrunning out of time‚Äù.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/michel-barnier/\">Barnier</a> is desperate to resolve his red line issues before we get to the critical endgame. I‚Äôve always said the last three weeks will matter more than the first three years.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489645\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000432213479-2.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000432213479-2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=620\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12489645\" /></a>\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Michel Barnier‚Äôs ploy will cost the EU big time, warns David Davis\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>But there will come a time very shortly when we will have to shift the thrust of our preparations towards No Deal. The reason for this is that the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2099807/what-is-brexit-uk-eu/\">European Union</a> always runs out the clock.</p> \n<p>When it is bullying some smaller state this works to its advantage. In the Brexit negotiation what will happen in the last few weeks is that the nation states of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/europe/\">Europe</a> will have to come to terms with the size of the risks that Barnier is taking.</p> \n<p>If we end up with a no deal scenario ‚Äî and it is possible ‚Äî the Europeans stand to lose a large and very profitable marketplace, namely the UK.</p> \n<p>It is clear that there are only two options now for leaving at the end of the transition period, a no deal exit or a zero-tariff deal. All sensible business owners will be preparing for both.</p> \n<p>Deferral and delay is the only thing that affects certainty. Certainty is what business and the country as a whole require.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n  <div \n    </div>\n    <!-- .swiper-container --> \n   </div>\n   <!-- .rail .{rail} .swiper-video-rail .{theme-slug} --> \n  </div>\n  <!-- .col .sun-col-6 --> \n </div>\n <!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index--> \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>We already know there has been no ‚ÄúGreat British Exodus‚Äù nor immediate <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12379434/uk-recession-meaning/\">recession</a> ‚Äî despite what certain pundits predicted.</p> \n<p>As long as we leave on time, there is no reason why this should change.</p> \n<p>Indeed, if we deliver the certainty of the end of the transition period, there is every reason business and the economy will bounce back.</p> \n<div class=\"article-boxout\"> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\"> \n  <h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">The Sun Says</h3> \n </div> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\"> \n  <p class=\"article__content--intro\"> OUR hearts go out, really they do, to the Eurocrats apparently now downcast over the prospect of us leaving the EU with no trade deal. But what did they expect? </p> \n  <div> \n   <p>It is incredible after all this time to see Brussels still bent on ensuring that Britain somehow loses out, so fixated are they on deterring others from ¬≠abandoning their club.</p> \n   <p>They are still making patently unreasonable power grabs even their europhile fans struggle to defend. They still want newly-independent Britain to surrender full control of our fishing waters. To agree economic restrictions to prevent us undercutting them and keep us under their thumb.</p> \n   <p>They simply must change the record if they‚Äôre genuinely worried about the potential hardship of us trading on WTO terms ‚Äî and them copping the blame. No objective person will fault Britain for sticking to its guns on principles so fundamental.</p> \n   <p>Michel Barnier won‚Äôt get his way. He and those pulling his strings seem strangely unable to digest that the Theresa May regime is gone, that voters threw out the Remainer Parliament and installed committed Brexiteers instead.</p> \n   <p>We do agree with Barnier that negotiations seem dead in the water and a ‚Äúno deal‚Äù looks nailed on. But the blame for the lost jobs, there and here, will fall squarely at Brussels‚Äô feet.</p> \n   <p><strong>They are wedded to impossible demands no sovereign nation could meet.</strong></p> \n  </div> \n </div> \n</div> \n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/DD-COMPOSITE-BREXIT-TIMELINE.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/DD-COMPOSITE-BREXIT-TIMELINE.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12205221\" width=\"960\" height=\"791\" /></a> \n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/e2ce6136-176d-44b3-838f-eb01971b24ef.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"Boris Johnson has told workers to ask bosses to bring them back\" class=\"alignnone\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Both sides have earmarked October for a deadline\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n  <video data-video-id=\"6183251383001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\" data-player=\"default\" data-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\" data-embed=\"default\" class=\"video-js\" controls=\"\" style=\"width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; right: 0; left: 0;\"> \n  </video> \n  <script src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- End of Brightcove Player --> \n<p><strong>GOT a story? Google Doodle celebrates English abstract sculptor","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489914/barbara-hepworth-google-doodle-celebrate/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>BARBARA Hepworth&#8217;s life is being celebrated by today&#8217;s Google Doodle.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The English abstract sculptor was known and widely considered as one of the mid-20th century‚Äôs most impactful sculptors.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490081\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 719px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000174769755.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=709\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490081\" width=\"709\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Today‚Äôs Google Doodle celebrates the life and work of English abstract sculptor Dame Barbara[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Who was Barbara Hepworth?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Today‚Äôs Google Doodle celebrates the life and work of English abstract sculptor Dame Barbara Hepworth.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Jocelyn Barbara Hepworth was born on January 10th, 1903 in Wakefield, West Yorkshire, England.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>By the age of 15, she knew she wanted to become a sculptor.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She enrolled at the Leeds School of Art, where she sparked a friendship with fellow sculptor Henry Moore, and then attended the Royal College of Art in London.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Her early work featured classic elements but by the 1930s she was solely doing abstract pieces.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490138\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000578659824.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490138\" width=\"960\" height=\"756\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>On this day in 1939, Hepworth arrived in St. Ives and lived for the remainder of her career[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>These were among the earliest sculptures crafted in Britain.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>On August 25 1939, Ms Hepworth arrived a town on England‚Äôs southern coast called St. Ives where she created her studio and lived for the remainder of her career.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As shown in today‚Äôs Google Doodle, Ms Hepworth was one of the leading practitioners of ‚Äúdirect carving,‚Äù a technique which the sculpting process is influenced by the qualities of the raw materials.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Among her many accomplishments, Ms Hepworth was awarded the Grand Prix at the 1959 S√£o Paulo Bienal, and for her invaluable contribution to British art was named Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire in 1965. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Hepworth created over 600 sculptures.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Google said: &#8220;Thank you, Dame Barbara Hepworth, for using your art to help carve a path toward greater harmony within our society and environment.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490136\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000394740328.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490136\" width=\"960\" height=\"767\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Corbis - Getty</figcredit></figure>Jocelyn Barbara Hepworth was born on January 10th[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>What is a Google Doodle?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>In 1998, the search engine founders Larry and Sergey drew a stick figure behind the second &#8220;o&#8221; of Google as a message that they were out of office at the Burning Man festival and with that, Google Doodles were born.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The company decided that they should decorate the logo to mark cultural moments and it soon became clear that users really enjoyed the change to the Google homepage.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Now, there is a full team of doodlers, illustrators, graphic designers, animators and classically trained artists who help create what you see on those days.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div revenge hit, a court heard today.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Obina Ezeoke allegedly snuck into the family home after his rivals shared an image of their attack on him on Snapchat.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489197\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 906px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603847749.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=896\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489197\" width=\"896\" height=\"599\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Bervil Kalikaka-Ekofo and his aunt Annie Besala Ekofo died in 2016</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489523\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000266944457.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489523\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>London News Pictures</figcredit></figure>The pair were killed at home in the middle of the night[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The 28-year-old is accused of shooting 21-year-old Bervil Kalikaka-Ekofo in the back of the head before gunning down the student&#8217;s aunt.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Annie Besala Ekofo, 53, ran out of her bedroom in just her underwear in the early hours of September 15, 2016.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Neither Bervil nor Annie were the intended targets, the Old Bailey was told.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The accused double killer is facing his fourth retrial for two counts of murder.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Ezeoke insists he was on the Grahame Park Estate, Edgware, on the night of the killings at the flat in Elmshurst Crescent, East Finchley.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The estate is said to have been the backdrop of a longstanding feud between a group involved with Ms Ekofo&#8217;s son Ryan Efey, 22, and another, linked to Ezeoke.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Prosecutor Mark Heywood told jurors the accused killer had travelled to Elmshurst Crescent in search of Mr Efey but shot his mother and cousin instead.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The accused killer was found by police &#8220;left for dead&#8221; with a broken eye socket during an altercation in 2014 connected to the rivalry, the court heard.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>&#8216;VIOLENCE&#8217;</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Summing up the prosecution case, Mr Heywood said today: &#8220;On 9 February 2014, Mr Ezeoke was attacked, seriously attacked, as were those two who were with him. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;This was no half baked fight, someone went for him in a serious way.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;A photograph was taken to humiliate him and then it was posted and circulated, and one of the phones which received it was that of Kaydean Efey.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The prosecutor urged jurors to see Ezeoke as somebody willing to &#8216;escalate&#8217; the shared hostility in such a deadly way.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr Heywood added: &#8220;It really boils down doesn&#8217;t it to a very small group of people.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It&#8217;s common ground that this arises from Grahame Park estate, from a history of antagonism, violence between people there and the Efey family.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container Pyong-il?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489108/kim-jong-un-uncle-sister-north-korea-health/","description":"<p><strong>KIM Jong-un&#8217;s uncle may be on the verge of taking charge of North Korea.</strong></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/kim-jong-un/\">Kim</a> has rarely been seen in public this year, with rumors circulating in April that he was in a ‚Äúvegetative state‚Äù after a bungled heart operation.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489103\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602941587.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489103\" width=\"960\" height=\"766\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>KIM Jong-un[/caption]</p>\n<p>Here is more on the turbulent developments.</p>\n<h2>Who is Kim Pyong Il and how old is he?</h2>\n<p>Kim Pyong Il, 65, is the last known surviving son of <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/north-korea/\">North Korea</a>‚Äôs founder, Kim Il Sung, who is Jong-un‚Äôs grandfather.</p>\n<p>After losing out in the 1970s to his half-brother, Kim Jong Il &#8211; who ended up running the country from 1994 to 2011 &#8211; Kim Pyong Il spent about four decades overseas in diplomatic posts.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489104\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 806px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/8bf7a67a-dd4c-4a07-bf92-c7d9698cdef5.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=796\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489104\" width=\"796\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Kim Pyong Il[/caption]</p>\n<p>&#160;Some North Korea experts say <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1361411/kim-jong-un-coma-brain-surgery-kim-jong-il-half-brother-kim-pyong-il/\">he could end up taking over from Jong Un</a>, who has never named a successor.&#160;</p>\n<h2>How is he related to Kim Jong-un?</h2>\n<p>Kim Pyong Il is Kim&#8217;s uncle.</p>\n<h2>Will he take over from Kim Jong-un?</h2>\n<p>While some people believe Kim&#8217;s uncle has taken over, others say that <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1356887/kim-jong-un-coma-sister-over-north-korea/\">Kim&#8217;s sister Kim Yo-jong, 33</a>, will become North Korean leader.</p>\n<p>South Korea&#8217;s spy agency, the National Intelligence Service (NIS), reported that Kim will gradually transfer authority to his sister&#160;‚Äú<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1340327/north-korea-kim-jong-un-power-sister-stress/\">to ease stress,&#8221;</a> despite his young age.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489105\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600249235.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489105\" width=\"960\" height=\"631\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP or licensors AFP OR LICENSORS</figcredit></figure>Kim Jong-un[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Is Kim Jong-un in a coma?</h2>\n<p>Pictures emerged recently showing Kim attending a government meeting ‚Äì yet Reuters said it could not ‚Äúindependently verify‚Äù the images as they were released by the secretive country.</p>\n<p>Speculation in April that Kim had died or was in a vegetative state were quickly quashed when the dictator turned up at&#160;the opening of a fertilizer factory&#160;30 miles north of capital Pyongyang.</p>\n<p>It has been claimed that the North Korea strongman has been in a coma for months.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489107\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603872320.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489107\" width=\"960\" height=\"648\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure>North Korean ambassador to the Czech Republic Kim Pyong-il hands his credentials to Czech President Milos Zeman in Prague in 2015[/caption]</p>\n<p>Chang Song-min, a former aide to ex-South Korean president Kim Dae-jung, claims pictures of Kim in North Korean media <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1358196/kim-jong-un-sister-coma-fake-appearances-north-korea/\">in recent months were fake</a>.</p>\n<p>Speaking with local media, Chang Song-min said: ‚ÄúI assess him to be in a coma, but his life has not ended.‚Äù</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div something‚Äù Matt and Caryn are likely ‚Äúinterested‚Äù in attending.</p> \n<p>Chris added: ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre welcome if they‚Äôd like to come.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Caryn worked as Matt‚Äôs assistant for over a decade before they started dating.</p> \n<p>Amy and Matt share four kids: Zachary, Molly, Jeremy and Jacob.</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12489800\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12489800 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000562741574-1.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"641\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Getty Images - Getty\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> Amy and Matt officially divorced in 2016[/caption]</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12489802\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12489802 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000590387989.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"558\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Instagram\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> Matt has moved on with his longtime assistant[/caption]</p> \n<p>The mom-of-four showed off her new house that she shared with Chris in May.</p> \n<p>She moved away from the <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1101620/matt-amy-roloff-little-people-big-world-sell-farm/\">family‚Äôs farm</a>, which Matt still resides on.</p> \n<p>Her new home appears to have been modified with shorter kitchen counters and a large marble counter that allows her to bake and cook.</p> \n<p>Matt and Caryn, 52, plan to stay on the land, but&nbsp;are <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/899686/little-people-matt-roloff-reveals-home-family-farm/\">building a brand new home</a> to make their own.</p> \n<p>\n <figure id=\"attachment_12489803\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n  <img class=\"wp-image-12489803 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000591826609-2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" />\n  <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n  <figcredit>\n   Refer to Caption\n  </figcredit>\n </figure> The former couple share four kids[/caption]</p> \n<p> \n <!--googleoff: all--> \n <div
