08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Headteachers will not fine parents who keep their kids off school from next week, teaching unions say","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12490059/headteachers-will-not-fine-parents-school/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>HEADTEACHERS will not fine parents who fail to send their children to school in September, teaching unions have claimed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Ministers have insisted that all children should be back in their classrooms to&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12479902/boris-johnson-warns-children-life-chances-under-threat/\">repair the damage months of lockdown has done to their education.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"‚ö†\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> Read our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12383728/coronavirus-uk-news-deaths-live-latest-schools/\">coronavirus live blog</a> for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490227\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/780dafe9-d42b-4a4c-9a6f-0a3363d8cb85.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490227\" width=\"960\" height=\"623\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Pupils are already returning to the classroom in parts of the UK[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Headteachers have the power to impose fines of up to ¬£120 per parent &#8211; which can in some extreme cases be inflated to ¬£2,500 and three months jail time.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, unions have said they believe fines are &#8220;counterproductive&#8221; and they won&#8217;t be encouraging their members to use them, reports the <a href=\"https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2020/08/24/exclusive-head-teachers-signal-will-not-fine-parentswhose-children2/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Telegraph</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Paul Whiteman, General Secretary of the National Association of Head Teachers, said: &#8220;We think fines will be counterproductive now. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Where families have deep concerns about coming back, we hope that through engaging with schools, their fears are allayed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Talking about fines now is unhelpful. They have always been there and have always been used sparingly. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Members cannot say don&#8217;t use them but they are more motivated by cooperation rather than coercion.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added it was premature to talk about fines, saying we need to see &#8220;how successful we are in getting children back, then review where we are&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Patrick Roach, general secretary of the NAS/UWT, the second biggest teaching union, said: ‚ÄúThe Government needs to support schools to apply a sensitive approach that recognises the unprecedented nature of the pandemic, and that&#160;some parents will have genuine safety concerns.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>‚ÄúSchools will need to be supported to apply the rules in a way which encourages children to attend school while working constructively with parents to overcome their concerns.‚Äù</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Downing Street has reminded the nation that education is &#8220;compulsory&#8221; and warned parents risk fines if they <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/schools-reopening/\">keep their children home</a> despite the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">pandemic</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490196\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603850458-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490196\" width=\"960\" height=\"605\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>New hygiene measures are being rolled out to keep kids safe[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490195\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603852823.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490195\" width=\"960\" height=\"635\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Schools have been closed since March[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Prime Minister Boris Johnson has said he understands that parents are &#8220;a bit worried about their children&#8221; but stressed the danger is &#8220;very, very, very small&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added: &#8220;I think it&#8217;s vital that parents understand that schools are safe and that teachers have gone to great lengths to get schools ready.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Education Secretary Gavin Williamson &#8211; <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12407041/education-secretary-gavin-williamson-fighting-for-job-a-levels/\">who has come under fire for the exams fiasco</a> &#8211;  said fines would only be used as a &#8220;last resort&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;In terms of fining we would ask all schools to work with those parents and encourage them to bring those children back.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Schools standards minister <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/politics/12482418/fines-school-next-week-last-resort/\">Nick Gibb stressed that going to school was not optional</a> and also warned mums and dads they will face fines.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;We live in a country where education is compulsory and I think parents can be reassured that the measures that schools are taking to make sure that we minimise the risk of the transmission of the virus are very effective.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12486897\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12486970\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Downing Street considers the reopening of schools key to getting Britain moving again and it has launched a huge blitz to reassure parents its safe.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Masks on the way into school, extra handwashing, sanitiser and other measures are being put into place to help the smooth return.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Children will be in classroom bubbles as much as possible and will stay 2m away from their teachers.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>At the weekend the four chief medical officers across&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12475154/medical-expert-chris-whitty-green-light-schools-reopen-september/\">the UK issued a joint statement stressing that kids should be back in classrooms.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>They gave it the green light because absence from the classroom fuels inequality across Britain.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Evidence shows there is an ‚Äúexceptionally small risk‚Äù of child deaths from Covid-19, with there being a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12481835/higher-risk-road-accident-coronavirus/\">higher risk of suffering a car crash</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The fatality rate for those aged five to 14 is lower than most seasonal flu infections.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490213\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602122267-3.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490213\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP</figcredit></figure>Boris Johnson has said the risk to children is &#8220;very, very, very small&#8221;[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Before the pandemic fines were ¬£60 if paid within 21 days, and ¬£120 after that, but during the health crisis they were effectively suspended.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But it will be up to individual heads to decide if they want to use them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Parents with concerns about coronavirus and schools have been encouraged to talk to their kids&#8217; teachers and leaders to try and allay their concerns.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr Johnson today released a video clip making the argument for the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12479469/coronavirus-schools-phe-report-small-risk/\">safe opening of all schools next week</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div murdered‚Äô","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489734/family-of-couple-victims-of-serial-killer-said-it-was-murder/","description":"<p><strong>THE FAMILY of an elderly couple feared victims of a serial killer have said: ‚ÄúWe always believed they were murdered.‚Äù</strong></p> \n<p>The deaths of Michael and Violet Higgins are among five cases involving couples that were originally ruled as murder-suicide.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489774\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 713px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603512350-2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=703\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489774\" width=\"703\" Gtr Manchester[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489777\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 795px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603512347-2.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=785\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489777\" width=\"785\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  PA:Press Association\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Violet and her husband Michael, 59, are feared to be among victims of a serial killer[/caption] \n<p>But a coroner‚Äôs officer investigation has now suggested they may all be victims of a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12480174/serial-killer-five-couples-cheshire-murder-suicides/\">serial killer who preys on older couples</a>.</p> \n<p>Retired security guard Michael, 59, and ex-police officer Violet, 76, were found dead at home in Didsbury, Gtr Manchester, in February 2000.</p> \n<p>At the time the coroner agreed with police that it was a murder-suicide but said he was puzzled why Michael had battered the wife he was dedicated to with a rolling pin before strangling himself.</p> \n<p>Michael‚Äôs niece Adele Street, 50, and brother Daniel, 74, said they always knew the couple were murdered.</p> \n<!--googleoff: all--> \n<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\"> \n <div class=\"sun-row \"> \n  <div class=\"col sun-col-6\"> \n   <div \n</div> \n<!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} --> \n<!--googleon: all--> \n<p>Adele said: ‚ÄúHe had severe Parkinson‚Äôs disease ‚Äî he was really shaky.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúHe just was not capable of doing such things. He did not have the strength.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Adele‚Äôs mum Lily Higgins said: ‚ÄúWe want the truth to come out.‚Äù</p> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n  <video data-video-id=\"6183857845001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\" data-player=\"default\" data-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\" data-embed=\"default\" class=\"video-js\" controls=\"\" style=\"width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; right: 0; left: 0;\"> \n  </video> \n  <script src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- End of Brightcove Player --> \n<p><strong>GOT a story? if you vote for Donald Trump over him and accused the president of denigrating African Americans. </strong></p>\n<p>The Democratic presidential nominee made the confession <a href=\"https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/biden-abcs-robin-roberts-black-comment-fundamental-difference/story?id=72554097\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">during an interview with ABC News</a> filmed on Friday.</p>\n<p><strong><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"‚ö†\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /></strong></strong>&#160;<strong>Follow our<a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1186278/us-election-2020-trump-biden-latest-news/\">&#160;US election 2020 live blog&#160;</a>for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489526\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603882247.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489526\" width=\"960\" height=\"539\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Joe Biden expressed regrets over &#8216;you ain&#8217;t black&#8217; comment that he made on The Breakfast Club in May</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>‚ÄúI shouldn‚Äôt have said it,‚Äù <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/joe-biden/\">Biden</a> told ABC News&#8217; Robin Roberts after she pressed him on <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/870314/joe-biden-trump-black-charlamagne-tha-god-sorry/\">his controversial remarks he made in May. </a></p>\n<p>‚ÄúBut, the truth is, there‚Äôs a fundamental difference between <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/donald-trump/\">Donald Trump</a> and me on the issue of race across the board.‚Äù</p>\n<p>‚ÄúI was trying to make the point that this is a man who spent his entire career denigrating African Americans. Denigrating them, continuing to denigrate them.</p>\n<p>&#8220;To do nothing but go after race and inflame it. Pour, you know, gasoline on the fire,‚Äù he added.</p>\n<p>Biden&#8217;s running mate <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/kamala-harris/\">Senator Kamala Harris</a> then defended Biden during the interview and praised him for supporting the <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/black-lives-matter/\">Black Lives Matter</a> movement.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489528\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603881779.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489528\" width=\"960\" height=\"542\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>The Mega Agency</figcredit></figure>Biden said that there is a &#8216;fundamental difference&#8217; between him and President Donald Trump[/caption]</p>\n<p>‚ÄúJoe speaks the words and actually knows how to say the words ‚ÄòBlack Lives Matter.‚Äô Contrary to what ‚Ä¶ the current president of the <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/united-states/\">United States</a> does, which is to sow hate and division full time, [he] has never spoken those words and will never speak the words ‚ÄòBlack Lives Matter,‚Äô‚Äù Harris said.</p>\n<p>Finally, Biden said, ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt be here without the African American community.‚Äù</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12162240\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/07/NINTCHDBPICT000588721310.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12162240\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>Biden named¬†Kamala Harris¬†as his running mate in August, making her the first black woman and South Asian American in the role[/caption]</p>\n<p>During the interview in May, The Breakfast Club&#8217;s host Charlamagne tha God talked to Biden about his record on racial issues and the possibility of him choosing a black female¬†running mate¬†heading into November.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúI‚Äôm not acknowledging anybody who is being considered, but I guarantee you: There are multiple black women being considered,&#8221; Biden told the host of a vice presidential pick.</p>\n<p>An aide of Biden&#8217;s is heard chiming in, trying to cut the interview short, to which Charlamagne tha God said: ‚ÄúYou can&#8217;t do that to black media!‚Äù</p>\n<p>‚ÄúI do that to white media and black media because my wife has to go on at 6.00,‚Äù Biden said, and added: ‚ÄúUh oh. I‚Äôm in trouble.‚Äù</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600251308.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"Joe Biden is a practicing Catholic\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">&#8216;If you have a problem figuring out whether you‚Äôre for me or Trump, then you ain‚Äôt black,&#8217; Biden told The Breakfast Club in May</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>‚ÄúListen, you‚Äôve got to come see us when you come to <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/new-york/\">New York</a>, VP Biden,‚Äù Charlamagne tha God said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a long way until November. We&#8217;ve got more questions.‚Äù</p>\n<p>Biden then quipped: ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve got more questions? Well I tell you what, if you have a problem figuring out whether you‚Äôre for me or Trump, then you ain‚Äôt black.‚Äù</p>\n<p>Charlamagne&#160;tha&#160;God responded that &#8220;it has nothing to do with Trump. It has to do with the fact that I want something for my community.‚Äù</p>\n<p>\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; Italy","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12488217/jade-thirlwall-jordan-stephens-romantic-break-italy/","description":"<p><strong>JADE Thirlwall‚Äôs new romance is moving even faster than one of Little Mix‚Äôs energetic pop tunes.</strong></p> \n<p>I first revealed she was growing close to Rizzle Kicks singer Jordan Stephens in May, but just three months after their first date they have jetted off on a romantic getaway.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488320\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 761px\">\n <img \n<p>I‚Äôve learned <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11667222/little-mix-jade-thirlwall-dating-rizzle-kicks-jordan-stephens/\">the fledgling couple</a> are coming to the end of a week-long holiday in the Trento region of Northern Italy.</p> \n<p>A source close to the Little Mix singer said: ‚ÄúJade and Jordan have spent more and more time together in the last few weeks as lockdown eased.&nbsp;</p> \n<p>‚ÄúShe really likes Jordan and although it was quite a last-minute decision to go to Italy, she was really excited to go.&nbsp;</p> \n<p>‚ÄúIt might seem quite quick for some people but they‚Äôve spent so much time talking and getting to know each other that they‚Äôve become really close in a short time. Jade has tried to get off social media a bit too. It‚Äôs been a refreshing break.‚Äù</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12489236\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 680px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000584138092.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=670\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489236\" width=\"670\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Rex Features\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Rizzle Kicks‚Äô Jordan Stephens, 28, has been growing close to Jade since May[/caption] \n<p>While in Italy, they have been on a sailing trip and visited the Arte Sella Nature Trail, which features a series of outdoor exhibits by modern artists.</p> \n<p>Eagle-eyed fans were convinced<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11998463/little-mixs-jade-thirlwall-and-rizzle-kicks-star-jordan-stephens-go-public-with-new-relationship-at-march/\"> Jade had been staying at Jordan‚Äôs London home</a> after watching her in an interview ‚Äî and recognising the background from Jordan‚Äôs Instagram photos.</p> \n<p>Zooming off somewhere sunny is very on-brand for Jade, as Little Mix only released their new single Holiday last month ‚Äî inspired by their love lives.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488612\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 670px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000592601066.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=660\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488612\" Alex Oxlade-chamberlain and Andre Gray.</p> \n<p>And <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12454742/jesy-nelson-loved-up-sean-sagar-brighton/\">Jesy Nelson</a>, who has also struck up a romance in lockdown, visited Cornwall on a mini break with her new beau, Our Girl actor Sean Sagar.</p> \n<p>With their travels over, I hope they can get their sixth album done and dusted.</p> class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h2>READ ON FOR MORE OF SIMON BOYLE‚ÄôS BIZARRE COLUMN</h2> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h2 class=\"has-text-align-center\">‚ÄôBout time for a Bieby?</h2> \n<p>HAILEY Bieber should make the most of her model figure while she still can ‚Äì because her husband Justin seems to be getting broody.</p> \n<p>She posed in a yellow bikini hours after meeting her big sister Alaia‚Äôs newborn daughter, Iris.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488334\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 824px\">\n <img \n<p>Baby singer Justin cradled the tot and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12484809/justin-bieber-wife-hailey-newborn-niece-baby-the-rock/\">called her ‚Äúthe most squishy cute gumdrop ever.‚Äù</a></p> \n<p>Actor Dwayne ‚Äòthe Rock‚Äô Johnson saw Justin‚Äôs Instagram photo, left, and commented: ‚ÄúThis image pretty much seals the deal. Fully expect you and H to have a baby in 2021.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Justin will tour the US next summer, as long as venues reopen, with dates for the rest of the world expected to be added.</p> \n<p>Juggling a newborn with all those shows would certainly make next year a lot busier than his 2020.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488336\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603840520.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488336\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Justin Bieber cradles his niece, Iris, who is the daughter of his wife‚Äôs sister\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h2 class=\"has-text-align-center\">bizbit</h2> \n<p>KANYE West has offended some Muslims after naming his new Yeezy trainers after the faith‚Äôs archangels for music and death, Israfil and Asriel. Some Twitter users accused him of mocking Islam.&nbsp;</p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h2 class=\"has-text-align-center\">George: A-listers? Robots in disguise&nbsp;</h2> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11341828/george-ezra-split-girlfriend-florrie/\">GEORGE Ezra</a> has met his fair share of celebrities in his time but now he‚Äôs claiming some of our favourite stars are actually ROBOTS.</p> \n<p>The Shotgun singer says he has met some big names who he is convinced weren‚Äôt entirely human because they were so weird.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488581\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/5c62fa0c-4b5b-4697-bad7-dea0a7b8fef4.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488581\" width=\"960\" height=\"685\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Splash News\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Shotgun singer George Ezra claims some big names are not entirely human[/caption] \n<p>He explained: ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs definitely one or two A-list celebrities I‚Äôve met that are half android. I don‚Äôt want to get into that whole conspiracy but I‚Äôve met a few people in the public eye that are half bot. It‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòBleep bloop, lovely to meet you, bleep bloop.‚Äô That‚Äôs something I have experienced.‚Äù</p> \n<p>The Brit brought up the topic when claiming he is being punished by his phone for not using it enough.</p> \n<p>He said he had left his device at home during a day out recently but that it started glitching when he returned and tried to use it.</p> \n<p>Speaking on his Phone A Friend podcast, George said: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs as if my phone knows and is punishing me.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúI do find it very peculiar that the one day I neglect this piece of tech, I come home and it‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòApp shutting down,‚Äô and it‚Äôs still wigging out a bit.</p> \n<p>‚ÄúObviously when my phone starts to do this, I‚Äôm equipped for this. I‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòI‚Äôve met your type before‚Äô.‚Äù</p> \n<p>I think George might have spent a bit too much time on his own this year.</p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h2 class=\"has-text-align-center\">bizbit</h2> \n<p>FRANK Turner, Jack Savoretti and Lighthouse Family have been announced as the latest acts to play at the outdoor, socially distanced venue Virgin Money Unity Arena in Newcastle.&nbsp;</p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<h2 class=\"has-text-align-center\">Fans rage at Dua‚Äôs do</h2> \n<p>DUA Lipa must have been exhausted after spending an afternoon bodyboarding, but it was her fans who were feeling sore with her after the star‚Äôs other antics over the weekend.</p> \n<p>She hit the waves in Malibu <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11899310/dua-lipa-anwar-hadid-music-video-writhing-man/\">with boyfriend Anwar Hadid</a> and later threw a huge party at her house in Los Angeles to celebrate her 25th birthday.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488358\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603674197.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488358\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">\n  Dua Lipa celebrates her birthday with friends in Los Angeles, California\n </figcaption>\n <figcredit></figcredit>\n</figure> \n<p>Oblivious to the need for social distancing, Dua ‚Äì who also <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11628491/dua-lipa-breaks-lockdown/\">broke the rules at the height of lockdown in London</a> by visiting her family ‚Äì shared photos of the bash on her Instagram.</p> \n<p>But her followers were quick to scald her for having the party and sharing the images, given she is a role model for so many young people.</p> \n<p>One commented: ‚ÄúGenuinely disappointed in you.&nbsp;</p> \n<p>‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a pandemic going on. All this does is show that pop stars think they‚Äôre above the rules. Travelling, parties, now isn‚Äôt the time. Lead by example.‚Äù</p> \n<p>Well said.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12488359\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603815812.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12488359\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Splash News\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Dua and her boyfriend Anwar Hadid have a blast surfing in Malibu[/caption] Goulding will be joined by guests including Diplo and Blackbear for her Brightest Blue Experience concert at London‚Äôs V&amp;A Museum on Wednesday. The show will be streamed online to fans who have bought tickets, which are still on sale.</p> \n   <p>WITH 122 days to Christmas, Magic Radio launches its pop-up station Magic 100% Christmas today, playing non-stop festive tunes such as Mariah Carey‚Äôs All I Want For Christmas Is You. The station is live from 9am ‚Äì listen via smart speakers or Magic‚Äôs website.</p> \n   <p>ACTRESS Lea Michele ‚Äì who played Rachel Berry in Glee ‚Äì has given birth to a boy with hubby Zandy Reich. According to US sources, the couple have named their son Ever Leo. A pal said: ‚ÄúEveryone‚Äôs happy, healthy and extremely grateful.‚Äù</p> \n   <p>THE new Killers album Imploding The Mirage is outselling the rest of the Top 20 combined, shifting 44,000 in its first three days. It is a dead cert to be their sixth straight UK No1 this Friday and likely to be 2020‚Äôs fastest-selling album.</p> \n  </div> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n  <video data-video-id=\"6175740307001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\" data-player=\"default\" data-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\" data-embed=\"default\" class=\"video-js\" controls=\"\" style=\"width: 100%; height: 100%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; right: 0; left: 0;\"> \n  </video> \n  <script src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- End of Brightcove Player --> \n<p><strong>GOT a story? 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Pastor demands reparations including 200 years of free college for black students and therapy","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489810/pastor-demands-reparations-200-years-free-college/","description":"<p>A PHILADELPHIA pastor has demanded vast reparations be made to African Americans &#8211; including 200 years of free college tuition for black students and therapy to be made available to any who need it. </p>\n<p>Dr. Eric Mason, pastor of Epiphany Fellowship Church, preached a sermon called A Biblical Case for Reparations, in which he argued that black Americans deserve compensation on a massive scale for slavery and racial injustice.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489808\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 818px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884954.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=808\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489808\" width=\"808\" height=\"615\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter</figcredit></figure>Dr. Eric Mason preached a sermon entitled A Biblical Case for Reparations in which he advocated for extensive reparations to be given to descendants of slaves[/caption]</p>\n<p>‚ÄúReparations has to be comprehensive because the offenses were everything from emotional to economic,‚Äù Dr <a href=\"https://twitter.com/skrobtrace/status/1297647473712861186\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Mason said in a video of the sermon posted to Twitter</a>.</p>\n<p>According to Dr Mason, social security was ‚Äúcreated for white people,‚Äù and adequate reparations must include far more extensive measures &#8211; including covering tuition for descendants of slaves, and funding historically black colleges and universities (HBCUs).</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489809\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 885px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884955.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=875\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489809\" width=\"875\" height=\"934\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter</figcredit></figure>Included in Dr Mason&#8217;s list of proposed reparations was 200 YEARS of free tuition for descendants of slaves[/caption]</p>\n<p>‚ÄúHBCUs funded for the next 200 years. Next 200 years. And right after that? You ain‚Äôt get this, did you? Descendants of slaves not paying for college for 200 years,‚Äù Mason said.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúNobody. And canceling every black person‚Äôs student loan debt. And repaying blacks who paid for student loans.‚Äù</p>\n<p>The pastor also called for &#8220;public repentance,&#8221; and &#8220;admitting slavery still affects us.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Dr Mason also called for counseling to be provided as well.</p>\n<p>&#8220;Psychological reparations. You need to pay for counseling for us. We need help,&#8221; Mason said</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>Dr Mason concluded by explaining that while reparations are not the solution to all problems, they would be useful in addressing issues.¬†</p>\n<p>He cautioned that failing to administer them could lead to divine consequences.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúNow, I‚Äôm not saying that reparations is gonna bring peace on earth. Jesus will bring peace on earth,‚Äù Mason said.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúHowever, while we‚Äôre on earth, we gotta make the most of our time, make the most of our minas, so that when the master returns, he said what did you do with the minas I gave you. And you don‚Äôt want him to say ‚Äòdepart from me.‚Äô‚Äù</p>\n<p>‚Äú‚ÄòTo whom was given more, more will be given to him.&#8217;‚Äù</p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603884954.jpg?strip=all&w=808","linkMd5":"59910b840b382d4a5ddfcde476960226","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn46@2020_6/2020/08/25/00-41-46-665_6bbbba468a0e5d88.webp","destWidth":808,"destHeight":615,"sourceBytes":64208,"destBytes":64208,"author":"Max 08:41:46","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 08:41:46","title":"Landlord arrested after harrowing TikTok video shows teens finding couple‚Äôs remains in suitcases near Seattle pier","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12489957/landlord-arrested-couple-bodies-found-suitcases-seattle/","description":"<p>POLICE have arrested the landlord over the killing of a young couple whose bodies were found stuffed into suitcases in Seattle, by teens who were filming a TikTok video.</p>\n<p>Michael Dudley was arrested last week on suspicion murdering Austin Wenner and Jessica Lewis, <a href=\"https://www.king5.com/article/news/crime/suspect-arrested-in-connection-to-2-bodies-found-in-bags/281-c39b019b-6f3c-44dd-a384-b2675cc9cd7a\">local media King5 reported.</a></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489954\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 676px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603902990.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=666\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489954\" width=\"666\" height=\"508\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Austin Wenner and Jessica Lewis</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Court documents indicated Dudley was landlord of Wenner, 27, and Lewis, 35, and they got into a dispute over rent, according to the media outlet.</p>\n<p>Investigators said that 10 days before the bodies were discovered, neighbors heard yelling and gunshots at Dudley&#8217;s home, King5 reported.</p>\n<p>Lewis was found to have died on June 16 from multiple gunshot wounds, while Wenner died the following day of a gunshot wound to the torso.</p>\n<p>The discovery of the pair&#8217;s bodies was made on a Seattle beach by a group of teens who were filming a TikTok video.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489955\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 673px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603902993-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=663\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489955\" width=\"663\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Facebook</figcredit></figure>35-year-old Jessica Lewis[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12489956\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 775px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603902994.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=765\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489956\" width=\"765\" height=\"765\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">27-year-old Austin Wenner</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11920637\" id=\"attachment_11920638\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000590784327.png\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000590784327.png?strip=all&#38;w=478\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-11920638\" /></a><figcaption src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000590784335.png?strip=all&#38;w=478\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-11920639\" /></a><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Another girl is seen calling police to report the find</figcaption><figcredit>TikTok</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>The video, which has since gone viral, shows two teenage girls clambering down a rocky shore where they find a black suitcase at the water&#8217;s edge.</p>\n<p>The teens say they used the Randonautica app, which randomly sent them to the shoreline near the popular tourist attraction Pike‚Äôs Place Market.</p>\n<p>TikTok user &#8216;UghHenry&#8217; posted the footage Saturday, writing: ‚ÄúSomething traumatic happened that changed my life.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúWe found this black suitcase. We were joking that maybe the suitcase would have money.&#8221;</p>\n<p>The eerie footage shows a girl walking over to the suitcase as a friend in the background yells, ‚ÄúOpen it! It stinks, yo!‚Äù</p>\n<p>The girl is then seen cautiously using a stick to pry open the luggage, which contains a black plastic bag.</p>\n<p>&#8220;As soon as she opened it the smell was overwhelming,&#8221; a caption states.</p>\n<p>&#8220;By this point we were getting a little scared and nervous.&#8221;</p>\n<p>The teens say they used the Randonautica app, which randomly sent them to the shoreline near the popular tourist attraction Pike‚Äôs Place Market.</p>\n<p>TikTok user &#8216;UghHenry&#8217; posted the footage Saturday, writing: ‚ÄúSomething traumatic happened that changed my life.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11920640\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000590784276.png\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000590784276.png?strip=all&#38;w=480\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-11920640\" /></a><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The teens say they used the Randonautica app which randomly sent them to the shoreline</figcaption><figcredit>TikTok</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>‚ÄúWe found this black suitcase. We were joking that maybe the suitcase would have money.&#8221;</p>\n<p>The eerie footage shows a girl walking over to the suitcase as a friend in the background yells, ‚ÄúOpen it! It stinks, yo!‚Äù</p>\n<p>The girl is then seen cautiously using a stick to pry open the luggage, which contains a black plastic bag.</p>\n<p>&#8220;As soon as she opened it the smell was overwhelming,&#8221; a caption states.</p>\n<p>&#8220;By this point we were getting a little scared and nervous.&#8221;</p>\n<p>After opening the suitcase, a second girl is seen calling police.</p>\n<p>A male voice is heard saying &#8220;OK so she&#8217;s calling the police so we can see if it&#8217;s actually a dead body or if it&#8217;s just food&#8221;.</p>\n<p>The teens later returned to the beach and filmed police cars at the scene.</p>\n<h2>GRISLY DISCOVERY</h2>\n<p>Later that evening the Seattle Police Department confirmed the discovery.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúDetectives are currently investigating after several bags containing human remains were located near the water in the 1100 block of Alki Avenue SW this afternoon,&#8221; a news release read.</p>\n<p>‚ÄúPolice responded after receiving a call of a suspicious bag on the beach. Another bag was located in the water.</p>\n<p>&#8220;Once the contents were determined to be remains, detectives responded to begin their investigation.</p>\n<p>&#8220;Harbor Patrol is assisting on the call, and detectives will work closely with the King County Medical Examiner‚Äôs Office as the investigation proceeds. This remains an active and on-going investigation.‚Äù</p>\n<p>The identity and possible cause of the death of the human remains is unknown.</p>\n<p>Residents told local news outlets they were unnerved by the discovery.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_11920642\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000590784337.png\"><img
